Several mazura later, that warrior, Kao 't Pst, became the first Спліт to follow the Гонер Way.

Brother Marais had a great sense of humour and while he could publish such masterworks as Philosophical Investigations into the Hidden Universe, he could also produce the famed and much-loved No Joke Left Unturned, acknowledged by many professional comedians as a fund of material. The Гонер Brotherhood is the poorer for his passing but immeasurably richer for his life.

Jo Springer - Social and Culture Correspondent GCN News [/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,60}[/author][title]Mizura of Silence Planned[/title][text cols='2'][justify]One mizura of silence is being planned as a way to remember the passing last wozura of the brave missionary, Rolf Gelden. Rolf was lauded as a simple man, utterly devoted to his faith and to spreading the word of R Gunn around the universe. Constantly pressured to stand for the High Council, he declined on numerous opportunities, saying his preaching work was more important. This won him enormous respect from all Гонер. Rolf is the first missionary for over 3 jazura to die of natural causes \(all others being killed or captured whilst flying\) and he will be well remembered by all of us. Donations for his remembrance will be gratefully received by the temple \(denominations of 10 credits only please\). The High Council will dedicate a new part of the Hanging Gardens to his memory and it is planned that a memorial will be established there. Rolf's life was an example to us all, and new students are encouraged to read his diaries, available soon.\n\nJo Springer, Social and Culture Correspondent, GCN News[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,60}[/author][title]Гонер Support Increasing in Спліт Mines[/title][text cols='2'][justify]It is a sad fact of life that Гонер ships are seen as easy prey, and often both the ship and pilot are captured, the latter often sold off as slaves for the mining corporations in Спліт sectors. Whilst we are completely opposed to slavery, particularly of our own, it is interesting to note that this has resulted in more conversions to our faith. It seems that our captured missionaries have continued to preach the faith to their fellow slaves, who are converting in their droves. Rumour has it that the Спліт mine owners are concerned about this, but cannot stop the religion spreading as every time they try to suppress it, another martyr to the cause is born. It is extremely gratifying to know that the Гонер faith is helping so many slaves come to terms with their conditions now. Of course, the High Council expects that any Гонер pilot captured in future also acts in a similar fashion and continues to spread the word of R Gunn no matter what the circumstances.\n\nJo Springer, Social and Culture Correspondent, GCN News[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,60}[/author][title]Refurbishment of Upper East Atrium almost complete[/title][text cols='2'][justify]The long-awaited rebuilding of the upper east atrium of the Гонер Temple is now less than one wozura away from re-opening. Named after the brave martyr Jes Ramussen, the refurbishment was in danger of becoming something of a white elephant for the Temple. Vastly over budget and behind schedule by over 2 jazura, many had publicly questioned the original designs and costing to be hopelessly inadequate. However, now that completion is close, this reporter has been fortunate enough to take a brief tour of the atrium and the result is breathtaking. So good that the arguments over the refurbishment are breathtaking. A secret that can now be revealed is also the inclusion of a fantastic aquatic section to encourage more Boron visitors to the Temple, the design of which was influenced by none other than Princess Menelaus herself. Tickets for the opening are free, and on a first come first served basis. They are available from the reception in the lower east atrium. No flash photography on the day please - it scares the Boron.\n\nJo Springer, Social and Culture Correspondent, GCN News[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,60}[/author][title]Гонер Win in Аргон 1000 No Surprise[/title][text cols='2'][justify]The recent victory of Per Klint in the Аргон 1000 rally surprised many commentators. It is of course no surprise to the Гонер. Per Klint is one of the Гонер's most celebrated pilots, having been around the universe several times and having only lost his vessel once in over 15 jazura. He is an honorary member of the "Boron Club" and one of the calmest pilots of his generation. A lone Гонер entry, Klint flew a calm, assured and peaceful race in true Гонер fashion, refusing to get into any of the petty squabbles along the way \(it is not Невідомий for contestants to try to push each other into asteroids\). Klint donated the prize money to the Temple, stating "I have no need for credits - my faith is more than enough for me". A model Гонер, I'm sure you'll all agree. Well done Per Klint!\n\nJo Springer, Social and Culture Correspondent, GCN News[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,60}[/author][title]Ghok Deathmatch Experiment not to be Repeated[/title][text cols='2'][justify]A source within the Гонер Temple today has confirmed off the record that the Goners will not consider entering another contestant for the latest series of the popular Спліт sport of Ghok Deathmatch. The High Council had taken all races by surprise when they entered this jazura, the 'honoured' Гонер being Jes Ramussen. It was thought that this experiment would promote greater understanding and conversion within the Спліт race, plus Jes Ramussen was convinced that his faith would allow him to overcome the fearsome Ghok without the need for violence. Entering the arena in an almost trance-like state, the contest ultimately lasted just under one mizura, and then only that long as the Ghok appeared to have trouble swallowing Ramussen's clothing in addition to the rest of his body \(Гонер robes are quite prickly and itchy\). The family of Jes Ramussen are nevertheless proud of him, and pleased that he has now gone to a better place. A memorial day of his martyrdom is planned soon.\n\nJo Springer, Social and Culture Correspondent, GCN News[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,60}[/author][title]Old Debate over sale of Captured Гонер Ships Revived[/title][text cols='2'][justify]The High Council within the Гонер Temple has revived the debate over whether or nor captured Гонер ships should be allowed to be sold at shipyards across the universe. They argue that the sale or purchase of Гонер ships should be made illegal, as they could only have been sourced by illegal means. Shipyard owners disagree, saying that this would stifle the free-market liberal trading economy that the races have worked so hard to establish, and would set a precedent that could lead to other products being banned as well. The debate was sparked after the High Council released the astonishing figures for last jazura, reporting a loss of 207 ships, and after new ship production, a net loss of 45 ships. This has prompted the High Council to demand that captured ships be returned to the Goners and their former owners prosecuted. The shipyard owners have adamantly refused this, in the interests of the confidentiality of their clients.\n\nMiria Gisler, Communications Correspondent, GCN News[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,60}[/author][title]Гонер Intelligence Foils Terror Attack in Home of Light[/title][text cols='2'][justify]It is only now emerging that Гонер Intelligence was involved in the recent interception of mercenary terrorists planning to attack the Аргон Trading Port in Home of Light. The mercenaries, who had all knowledge of their employers chemically wiped out, were to use a matter transporter to deliver a primed Hornet class missile into the main concourse of the station. If such a weapon were to detonate in an unshielded area of that kind it would tear the facility apart.

Goner Intelligence have long monitored the whereabouts of matter transmission devices and became concerned some mazura ago, when a transmat-equipped Теладі vessel was reported lost to a pirate attack. It now appears that agents of Гонер Intelligence were successfully able to trace the device and pass on the information to Аргон authorities.

While the mercenaries have no memory of their employers, they were able to name a numbered account at the Теладі Profit Guild Bank in Гордість Компанії . Аргон agents found the account to be empty after obtaining a warrant from Guild authorities. The Теладі factor in the affair has been noted but seems nothing more than circumstantial at this time. No motive for such a vicious attack on a trading station other than to create sheer terror has been discovered.

Bal Mulligan - Security Correspondent GCN News [/justify][/text]

page.title: Complex stories
page.descr: This page contains news articles that build a story. Every story always can have 10 articles (more if two stories are connected). So a new story must always start with a textid divideable by 10!
page.t:
[article][eval if_race='Аргон'/][/article][author]{1294,10}[/author][title]Military Exercises Commence[/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]All races have been invited to take part in a set of military exercises, but for some reason the Паранід will not be taking part this year. "Not everyone can attend" was their response when asked why they had declined.

Exercises will range from shooting a series of target containers to navigating through an asteroid field in the quickest time possible. Each race will compete in a series of events and will be awarded based on their performance and response to various 'battle scenarios'. 

Hach Burnett - Foreign Affairs Correspondent IBC News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Аргон'/][/article][author]{1294,10}[/author][title]Court Dispute settled[/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]After hearing fourteen hours of detailed time reports, the Royal Boron Senate agreed to a payout in favour of the technicians who helped fix a local plankton farm last week.\n\nHach Burnett - Foreign Affairs Correspondent IBC News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Аргон'/][/article][author]{1294,10}[/author][title]Factory owners taken to court[/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]The station owners of a Plankton Farm in Queens Space have refused to pay for the services of technicians who came to their aid. The owners will appear in court tomorrow, and will be sued an estimated 20,000cr. for service fees. The technicians demand settlement before Mazura-012, and will take the matter to higher authorities if a settlement isn't reached.\n\nHach Burnett - Foreign Affairs Correspondent IBC News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Аргон'/][/article][author]{1294,10}[/author][title]Military Exercise costs lives[/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]Two ships collided in an asteroid scouting exercise, and no one is yet sure as to what caused the collision. It is thought that faulty hardware might have had a part to play in the collision, and engineers are salvaging what's left of the two M4 class fighters.

Both ships belonged to the Теладі, and they have withdrawn from further scheduled exercises for the time being. The two pilots were new recruits, but their names are currently being suppressed. "Our prayers go out for the two pilots, and we hope that they heard the good news before their sudden departure" cited Priest Hamsling. Other exercises will continue in a day's time, in respect to the two lost pilots.

Hach Burnett - Foreign Affairs Correspondent IBC News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Аргон'/][/article][author]{1294,10}[/author][title]Military Exercises Concluded[/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]The Military exercises have drawn to an end after severe competition. The Гонер were judges of the events that took place, and have awarded the races as follows:

Best Navigators: Chu't Hnt (Спліт)
Best Fighter Pilots: Rurandis Yooses Gustiosanis (Теладі)
Best Recon.: Ra't Ktt (Спліт), Janit Cruise (Аргон)
Best Formation: Boso Hi (Boron)

Hach Burnett - Foreign Affairs Correspondent IBC News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Аргон'/][/article][author]{1294,10}[/author][title]Blunder revealed![/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]"We found swamp plant wedged in the turbine generators!" groans one of the technicians. "There's the problem! Now, where's the owner? He, She or They need to be reminded of the operating instructions." Reluctantly he adds, "Don't put swamp plant in your plankton farms! It's in the manual!"\n\nHach Burnett - Foreign Affairs Correspondent IBC News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Аргон'/][/article][author]{1294,10}[/author][title]Sophisticated machinery causes Blunder in Queens Space[/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]A step in the right direction, or a recipe for disaster? Several engineers have been dispatched to a Plankton Farm in distress. It's unclear as to what the problem is at this time, but we'll have more information as the time progresses.\n\nHach Burnett - Foreign Affairs Correspondent IBC News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Спліт'/][/article][author]{1294,30}[/author][title]Спліт Ex-prison Chief to debate the Death Penalty[/title][text cols='2'][justify]After a long heated debate about how the death penalty should be given, it's been finally decided that the Спліт courts will offer this capital punishment less than what it was but "there will still be terrible consequences for breaking the laws." Buyo remarked.

We asked what are these terrible consequences only to get from him: "This information will remain disclosed to people above a certain clearance level, but we can assure you, you wouldn't want to know."

Fui't Plt - Foreign Affairs Correspondent SFN News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Спліт'/][/article][author]{1294,30}[/author][title]Спліт Ex-prison Chief to debate the Death Penalty[/title][text cols='2'][justify]A discussion about the death penalty for criminals and enemies of the Спліт will be taking place in a short while with hopes to make the death penalty a less used sentence then the 79% of times it's given out in cases held in past times. The ex-prison official, Temon Buyo, commented at the press conference prior to the holding of the meeting, that:

"It would be better to keep the sentence as it is. The Спліт aren't feared the way the Ксенон or Boron are... we must make sure that everyone knows that we aren't pushovers".

Fui't Plt - Foreign Affairs Correspondent SFN News[/justify][/text]

[article][eval if_race='Теладі'/][/article][author]{1294,50}[/author][title]Teladianium prices predicted to rise[/title][text cols='1' colwidth='500'][justify]According to the Metal Brokers, Thelisias Pontamonen Arakos, the price of Teladianium is predicted to rise. Demand has skyrocketed since the start of the troubles with the Хаак. It may be a short term effect with more Teladianium Mines coming on-line every Tazura. Aggenmenas Glutamus Fakatos, the chief Broker for the company said "The market shows sign of a shortage that should correct itself in the medium to long term. We are recommending a buy at the moment".

The owner of the Brokers, Thelisias Pontamonen Arakos IV, owns more than half of all Teladianium mines and was unavailable for comment.

Yoyunis Towisaris Yooses IV - Foreign Affairs Correspondent CBNN News[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,80}[/author][title]First impressions from the Intergalactic Meeting of the Secretaries of Space Transport[/title][text cols='2'][justify]The representatives of the races are now negotiating on some new regulations for intergalactic space transport. The most important changes will be made to the rules regarding the Jumpgate Exit Procedure, the placement of satellites and overtaking of slower spacecrafts. It is planned that so called "gate sleepers" are to be fined a high amount of credits. "Gate sleepers" who accelerate too slowly after having passed the gate have caused a lot of accidents in the past, especially in sectors with high traffic density. Still there is a controversial debate on whether to make the use of Boost-Drives mandatory for spacecrafts with low acceleration capability in order to enable them to leave the dangerous area fast enough.

But, as all the races will have to ratify the treaty and integrate the new rules into their national legislation it will take a couple of Jazuras until the new rules become official.

Funfi Pi - Transport and Tourism Correspondent - GalNet[/justify][/text]

[article/][author]{1294,80}[/author][title]More impressions from the Intergalactic Meeting of the Secretaries of Space Transport[/title][text cols='2'][justify]The representatives of the races are still negotiating on some new regulations for intergalactic space transport. We can now present some more details: There will be special areas for the communication satellites to place them into space. This is meant to be a measure against the "wild" placement of satellites as it is being practised nowadays. Satellites get destroyed too often causing increasing troubles for the indemnification insurance business. The Теладі delegation proposed to protect these satellite areas with SQUASH mines. While the Паранід have already agreed to this proposal and the Спліт are expected to follow, the Boron and Аргон are likely to offer some resistance because of their general ban on these weapons. They prefer lasertowers.

But, as already mentioned in another article, because all the races will have to ratify the treaty and integrate the new rules into their national legislation it will take a couple of Jazuras until the new rules become official.

Funfi Pi - Transport and Tourism Correspondent - GalNet[/justify][/text]

page.descr: Your ... Object names (not spoken by Bordcomputer!)

page.descr: Main Menu and some other menus shown from the intro story.

page.title: Mainprogram output
page.descr: EXE strings such as error messages
page.t: There was an error accessing the sound hardware!
This will end the program.\nYou will have to start it again!\nDo you wish to QUIT the program now?
Changing these settings can mess up the graphic quality.\nThe settings you choose will be saved when you quit this program.
Error opening the game with these settings! (DD)\nPlease change them.
Error opening the game with these settings (GFX)!\nPlease change them.
Do you really want to quit?

page.title: Famous quotes
page.t:
"Life is pleasant.
Death is peaceful.
It's the transition that's troublesome."

- Isaac Asimov (1920 - 1992)
"Be nice to people on your way up because you meet them on your way down." \n\n- Jimmy Durante (1893 - 1980)
"If you want to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first create the universe."\n\n- Carl Sagan (1934 - 1996)
"Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens."\n\n- Jimi Hendrix (1942 - 1970)
"Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance."\n\n- Will Durant (1885 - 1981)
"Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal."\n\n- Henry Ford (1863-1947)

"While we are postponing,
life speeds by." 

- Seneca (3BC - 65AD)

"First they ignore you,
then they laugh at you,
then they fight you,
then you win." 

- Mahatma Gandhi (1869-1948)
"It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity. " \n\n- Albert Einstein (1879-1955)
"The mistakes are all waiting to be made. " \n\n- Chessmaster Savielly Grigorievitch Tartakower (1887-1956)

"Try not.
Do, or do not.
There is no 'try'." 

- Yoda

"I may not have gone where I intended to go,
but I think I have ended up where I intended to be." 

- Douglas Adams (1952 - 2001)
"Tell me, o Muse, of that ingenious hero who travelled far and wide..." \n\n- Homer's Odyssey (800BC)
"Whatever trip we start, it is for the search of happiness. But happiness is here." \n\n- Quintus Flaccus (238 - 209)
"Nothing is constant but change." \n\n- Sakyamuni, founder of Buddhism (563 - 483)
"The only ones who fly are the one who dare to fly." \n\n- Luis Sepulveda, Chilean writer (1949 - )
"Stars are holes in the sky from which the light of the infinite shines." \n\n- Confucius (551 - 479)

"While the other animals are prone and fix their gaze on the earth, the god gave man a face uplifted, bade him stand erect and turn his eyes to the stars." \n\n- Publius Ovidius Naso (Metamorphoses I. 84-6)

"The greatest thing
You'll ever learn
Is just to love and
Be loved in return" 

- Eden Ahbez (1908 - 1995)
"May god stand between you and harm, in all the dark places you must walk." \n\n- Ancient Egyptian Proverb
"To win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the highest skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting, is the highest skill." \n\n- Sun-Tsu (500BC)

"There must be something worth living for
There must be something worth trying for
Even some things worth dying for
And if one man can stand tall
There must be some hope for us all
Somewhere, somewhere in the spirit of man
" 

- "War of the Worlds musical by Jeff Wayne"
"Mother, I saw a dream in the night. There were stars in the sky for me." \n\n- The Epic of Gilgamesh (around 800 BC)

"The greatest gain from space travel consists in the extension of our knowledge. In a hundred years this newly won knowledge will pay huge and unexpected dividends." \n\n- Wernher von Braun (1912 - 1977)
"To go places and do things that have never been done before - that's what living is all about." \n\n- Michael Collins (1930 -)
"It's human nature to stretch, to go, to see, to understand. Exploration is not a choice, really; it's an imperative." \n\n- Michael Collins (1930 -)
"Don't tell me that man doesn't belong out there. Man belongs wherever he wants to go - and he'll do plenty well when he gets there." \n\n- Wernher von Braun (1912 - 1977)
"Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken bird that cannot fly." \n\n- Langston Hughes (1902 - 1967)
"Minds are like parachutes - they only function when open." \n\n- Thomas Dewar (1864 - 1930)
"Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars." \n\n- Les Brown (1912 - 2001)
"What is now proved was once only imagined." \n\n- William Blake (1757 - 1827)
"Even a fool knows you can't touch the stars, but it doesn't stop a wise man from trying." \n\n- Harry Anderson (1952 -)
"And if you gaze for long into an abyss, the abyss gazes also into you." \n\n- Friedrich Nietzsche (1844 - 1900)
"Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World." \n\n- Inscription on Columbus' caravels
"Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country." \n\n- Anais Nin (1903 - 1977)
"If you can imagine it,You can achieve it.If you can dream it, You can become it." \n\n- William Arthur Ward (1921 - 1994)
"Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality." \n\n- Jules de Gautier (1811 - 1872)
"The journey is the reward." \n\n- Taoist Saying
"It is good to have an end to journey toward, but it is the journey that matters in the end." \n\n- Ursula K. LeGuin (1929 -)
"The universe is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper." \n\n- Eden Phillpotts (1862 - 1960)
"Your current safe boundaries were once Невідомий frontiers." \n\n- Невідомий
"The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." \n\n- Eleanor Roosevelt (1884 - 1962)
"Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born." \n\n- Dale Turner
"There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere." \n\n- Isaac Asimov (1920 - 1992)
"Reality is that part of the imagination we all agree on." \n\n- Невідомий
"The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science." \n\n- Albert Einstein (1879 - 1955)
"Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." \n\n- Albert Einstein (1879 - 1955)

"When I examine myself and my methods of thought, I come to the conclusion that the gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge." \n\n- Albert Einstein (1879 - 1955)
"As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality." \n\n- Albert Einstein (1879 - 1955)
"Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic." \n\n- Arthur C. Clarke (1917 -)
"Time is the fire in which we burn." \n\n- Delmore Schwartz (1913 - 1966)
"I don't know what you could say about a day in which you have seen four beautiful sunsets." \n\n- John Glenn (1921 -)

"It suddenly struck me that that tiny pea, pretty and blue, was the Earth. I put up my thumb and shut one eye, and my thumb blotted out the planet Earth. I didn't feel like a giant. I felt very, very small." \n\n- Neil Armstrong (1930 -)
"To confine our attention to terrestrial matters would be to limit the human spirit." \n\n- Stephen Hawking (1942 -)
"Science-fiction yesterday, fact today, obsolete tomorrow." \n\n- Otto O. Binder (1911 - 1974)
"There shall be wings! If the accomplishment be not for me, 'tis for some other. The spirit cannot die; and man, who shall know all and shall have wings..." \n\n- Leonardo da Vinci (1452 - 1519)
"Man's mind and spirit grow with the space in which they are allowed to operate." \n\n- Krafft A. Ehricke (1917 - 1984)
"The important thing is not to stop questioning." \n\n- Albert Einstein (1879 - 1955)
"You would make a ship sail against the winds and currents by lighting a bonfire under her deck...I have no time for such nonsense." \n\n- Napoleon Bonaparte (1769-1821)
"The Earth is a cradle of the mind, but we cannot live forever in a cradle." \n\n- Konstantin E. Tsiolkovsky (1857 - 1935)
"Sometimes I think we're alone in the universe, and sometimes I think we're not. In either case the idea is quite staggering." \n\n- Arthur C. Clarke (1917 -)
"Space isn't remote at all. It's only an hour's drive away, if your car could go straight upwards." \n\n- Sir Fred Hoyle (1915 - 2001)
"Space is big. Really big." \n\n- Douglas Adams (1952 - 2001)

"I measured the skies
Now the shadows I measure
Skybound was the mind
Earthbound the body rests." 

- Johannes Kepler (1571 - 1630)
"Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody has thought." \n\n- Albert Szent-Gyorgyi (1893-1986)
"Whether outwardly or inwardly, whether in space or time, the farther we penetrate the Невідомий, the vaster and more marvelous it becomes." \n\n- Charles A.Lindbergh (1902 - 1974)

page.title: Misc
page.t: You are talking to the automated interaction system.
Your ship is too large to land at this station.
On behalf of our President and Senator, the Аргон Federation welcomes you aboard.
Queen Atreus and the Kingdom of Boron bid you a peaceful welcome aboard.
All hail the Сім'я Ронкар. The Спліт dynasty welcomes you onboard.
In the name of Priest Emperor Xaar, our Priest Duke welcomes you aboard.
On behalf of Chairman Ceo, The Теладі Company wishes great profit to you and welcomes you onboard.
Hello matey, welcome aboard this pirate station.
The Goners wish to offer you a peaceful welcome aboard the Гонер Temple.
On behalf of our President and Senator, the Аргон Federation welcomes friends aboard.
Queen Atreus and the Kingdom of Boron bid you a peaceful welcome. It is good to see friends aboard.
All hail the Сім'я Ронкар. The Спліт dynasty welcomes good friends onboard.
In the name of Priest Emperor Xaar, our Priest Duke welcome all friends of the Паранід you aboard.
On behalf of Chairman Ceo, The Теладі Company is pleased to make profits with such as you. Welcome onboard.
On behalf of our President and Senator, the Аргон Federation is honoured to welcome you aboard.
Queen Atreus and the Kingdom of Boron bid you a peaceful welcome. We are greatly honoured that you wish to come onboard.
All hail the Сім'я Ронкар. The Спліт dynasty honours your presence onboard.
In the name of Priest Emperor Xaar, our Priest Duke is delighted to welcome such as you aboard.
On behalf of Chairman Ceo, The Теладі Company are delighted for the opportunity make great profits with such as you. Welcome onboard.
It is a great honour that you wish to visit the Гонер Temple, the Goners welcome you aboard.
Positive. Please dock as soon as you get green position lights.
Negative. You cannot undergo docking procedure at the moment.
Negative. Your presence aboard is neither desirable nor welcome.
Positive! Terracorp will send out a unit to support you.
We are not able to help you at the moment.
Positive! We will send out a unit to support you.
Negative. Terracorp regret that we have no units available right now!
Positive. A Police ship is on its way to help you.
Negative. We have no units available right now!
On behalf of our President and Senator, the Аргон Federation thank you for your help with this invader.
As a reward you get 100 Credits!
As a reward you get a discount on all goods at the local space station!
As a reward you get 200 Credits!
As a reward you get 500 Credits!
As a reward you get 1000 Credits!
As a reward you get 5000 Credits!
As a reward you get 10000 Credits!
As a reward you get 50000 Credits!
Should you dare to attack an installation belonging to the Аргон Federation we will have no choice. We will be forced to strike back.
Fighter ships from the Аргон Federation are now being launched. They have orders to kill!
In the name of Queen Atreus and the Kingdom of Boron, we thank you for your valuable assistance!
Your actions defy our peaceful nature. If you do not stop firing the Kingdom of Boron regrets that it will be forced to take severe action.
In the name of our Queen and the Kingdom of Boron we are now launching our defensive units. It is with regret that they have orders to kill!
In the name of Queen Atreus and the Kingdom of Boron, we thank you for your this service!
The Сім'я Ронкар and the Спліт dynasty are appreciative of your valuable assistance.
Hail the Сім'я Ронкар. Stop firing before we retaliate. The Спліт dynasty will not allow such actions against us!
As you have continued to defy The Спліт dynasty we are now taking defensive action. Prepare to die!
The Сім'я Ронкар and the Спліт dynasty are appreciative of your service.
By the name of Priest Emperor Xaar, and Priest Duke we offer grateful thanks for your aid.
In the name of Priest Emperor Xaar, our Priest Duke wishes you to know that your aggression will not go unpunished.
In the name of Priest Emperor Xaar, we have now launched our defensive units.
By the name of Priest Emperor Xaar, and Priest Duke we offer grateful thanks for your service.
On behalf of Chairman Ceo, The Теладі Company are grateful for your timely help in the saving of much profit!
On behalf of Chairman Ceo and the Теладі Space Company. There can be no profit for you in this enterprise. Stop immediately.
You are about to lose more than profit. Fighters representing the interests of the Теладі Space Company have now been launched!
On behalf of Chairman Ceo, The Теладі Company are grateful for your service!

page.title: Female Atmo
page.descr: Friendly female voice for atmospheric messages (lots of echo)
page.t: We would like to remind all visitors to visit our special sales area close to the casino.
Please note that any spaceweed consumption aboard this station is against the law.
Security Would like to remind all visitors to keep their belongings with them at all times.
Will the parents of the Аргон girl by the name of susie please pick her up at the casino. Thank you!
If you bring any creatures on board, please make sure they are chained. Any loose animals will be vapourised on sight.
Beggars are operating on this Factory, please do NOT encourage these professional beggars, if you have any spare credits, please give them to a registered charity.
Incoming ship, docking crews to standby.
Ladies and Gentlemen, Station Administration would like to remind you to keep children away from the airlocks.
Please remember to read the Bulletin Board - Important messages await your reading.
The departue for the transport to Місяць Рінго has been delayed due to technical problems, we ask all passengers to pay attention to the announcements for an updated flight schedule.
We have reports of an outbreak of Аргон flu in this sector, would all visitors please report to the medicbay for innoculation.
Warning explosive materials can be hazardous, please contact the dock master if you have any on board.
All Ex-Military Personnel please report to Medbay Six For BioWeapons Clearance.
Attention all departing pilots, Пірат have been seen in the sector, be careful.
EGOSOFT would like to thank you for buying their product.
The restaurant is now open for anyone wishing to dine before departing the station.
Please remember to return your depleted Energy Cells to the recycling compound.
We would like to remind visitors that dropping litter anywhere other than an approved recycling station carries an automatic 500 credit fine.
Customers are reminded that wares on this station are sold without warranties.
Please check your cargo is secured before departure.
Do not wave at the stations security cameras, distracted operators leads to undetected crime.
Dear visitors, we are experiencing some minor surges in our power grid, please excuse any inconveniences.
You are reminded that lottery tickets are available from all retail outlets in this station.
Last call for passengers for flight
Flight engineers, report to docking bay(number)
. Until this inconvienence is resolved this area shall remain off-limits.
Will the pilot of the ship ...(slight pause) ID
, please clear the docking bay. Your docking permit has expired.
Repair crews report to docking bay(number...)
The next shuttle to the planet surface will depart in(number)
is now closed due to a station fire brigade drill. Please bypass this area following the marked routes.
All pilots may be requested to have their cargo bay scanned for contraband.
. All first class passengers please board the shuttle from section(number)
Would the owner of the freight container(number)
(would someone)please report to the customs center. Some clearance papers are missing.
Medical emergency crews report to docking bay(number)
Today there is a sale in the
has been cancelled due to Ксенон activities on route. Would all passengers please contact reception
(Spaceport female voice of comm system with lots of echo)Last call for passengers for flight BRA 751 to the inner systems. Repeat last call for passengers to the inner systems.
(Spaceport female voice)Ready for lift off on the flightdeck.

page.title: Numbers for Atmo Voice
page.descr: Numbers for replacement in atmo texts spoken by female atmo voice

page.title: Аргон variation 1
page.t: (00..10: Speaker can be ANYONE, see below for variations. Texts marked with '*' can be used by capital ships, do not use 'I' or 'my' etc. ==== Message after first -possibly accidental- hits)Hey you! Are you nuts? Stop shooting!
(Final warning of fighter, also for Пірат)You're really gonna regret that!
(Final warning of transporter)Are you looking for trouble? One more shot and I'll call in a support ship!
(Starts fighting/defending)Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
(* Requesting help from anyone)This ship is under attack! Somebody please help!
(* Swear words - superior)You're gonna get it now!
(* Shields low - Pilot close to giving up!)Hey! I can't take any more of this! Give me a chance!

(11..19: Variations for capital ships, slightly arrogant! ==== Warning message after some -possibly accidental- hits)I demand you stop firing or you will be in more trouble than you could possibly imagine!
(Final warning)You have received your last official warning. Any more trouble from you and you'll be vaporised.
(Starts fighting)Don't say we didn't warn you. Now prepare to die!
(20..24: General answers ==== Reactions when contacted by player, i.e. Аргон arrogant, Boron friendly)What do you want?
(During fight, or if player is public enemy. Can be said by person in a station too!)Go play with asteroids!
(Busy)Leave me alone - I'm too busy to babysit another spacemonkey!
(Does not want to answer, possibly too low notoriety)Hey, I'm not an information station, find someone else who can help you!
(Always the same sentence - Pilot is not responsible for answering a question)Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
(25..29: Answers on Surrender or Drop freight ==== Fighter or pirate makes fun of player, possible even during fight!)Surrender to the likes of you? Don't make me laugh!
(TS pilot or other people)You must be kidding?
(After being attacked)Never! I would rather die!
(Ship giving up STEP 2 - Pilot now leaves the ship)OK. I give in. Here is my ship, take it, but don't kill me!
(Ship giving up STEP 1 - Dropping some freight)Please spare my life. Here is a part of my freight!
(30..34: Variations of 20..24 for capital ships, slightly arrogant! ==== Captain speaking)Captain speaking. What do you want?
(During fight, or if player is public enemy)We do not communicate with pilots such as you!
(Busy)Can't you see we're a bit busy just now?
(Does not want to answer, possibly too low notoriety)Who do you think you are? We are not an information office!
(35..39: Capital ship answer on Surrender! ==== Captain is amused/annoyed)Hahaha! That's a funny one. I'll have to tell that to the admiral next time I see him!

(40.: Player asking for a way to an object, pilot KNOWS the answer. This can be either a station a factory or a sector so do NOT use an article in these sentences. Keep all sentences as general as possible. Gate direction is added behind this answer)That is easy. Try behind the
(Player asking for a way, player is already there. Sentence can answer questions for all kinds of objects so avoid articles)You are already there.
(Player asked for a way to an object. Pilot can not answer)Sorry, I've no idea.
(45..49: Directions added to sentences above)North gate.
(50..54: Different capital ship answer, slightly arrogant! ==== Player is hero)No problem. You have to fly through the
(After telling player the sector)I'm glad we could help you! Good bye.
(60..69: Speaker is Transportation officer aboard a TL ==== Formatted string, do not change) {,61} {1} {,62} (assembles price sentence, param 1 = xxxx Credits)
(Telling price, part 2)credits for every gate we go through.
(Cannot be hired)I'm sorry. We've got our hands full transporting cargo for someone else. We'll be free once our contract is over!
(Player cannot pay or ran out of money)Give me a call back when you can afford us!
(TL hired)We got a deal. We'll follow and charge for every gate we pass through!
(Not enough space for station)There's no room here to drop your freight. I suggest you try moving somewhere else.
(Job finished)Everything's just fine - we'll start unloading here. (followed by Good bye)
(Good bye when job finished/cancelled)It's been a financial pleasure meeting you. Come back soon.
(70 - 74: 4 different TL fee classes per race, depending on notoriety. Rule for 70 is: A=1000, B=1400, S=1800, P=1200, T=500, Hero)1000
(70 - 74: 4 different TL fee classes per race, depending on notoriety. Rule for 71 is: A=3000, B=3500, S=4000, P=3400, T=1500, Trusted Friend)3000
(70 - 74: 4 different TL fee classes per race, depending on notoriety. Rule for 72 is: A=5000, B=5500, S=6000, P=5600, T=2500, Accepted Friend)5000
(70 - 74: 4 different TL fee classes per race, depending on notoriety. Rule for 73 is: A=10000, B=10800, S=12000, P=11000, T=5000, Suspected Foe)10000
(75..79: Speaker is police ship ==== Illegal goods found)We have detected illegal goods aboard your ship. Drop these items immediately or we will open fire!
(Warning if player does not react) This is your last warning! Drop the illegal goods immediately!
(No illegal goods found) We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods onboard. Thanks for your cooperation.
(80..81: Speaker is passenger aboard player's ship ==== Reminder)Hey, did you forget me, pilot? I have to get to my destination quickly!
(Wants to leave)I demand that you let me off at the next station!
(82..89: Speaker is a pirate ==== Player has good freight)Drop your freight or I will blast you to pieces!
(Player dropped container)Haha, that's what I like! Easy credits..!
(Pirate wants more)Don't play games with me! I want more or I will show you the real meaning of firepower!
(Less loud to third ship)Hey friend. Please help me against this maniac here!
(Less loud, neg.answer)Don't give me that friend crap. Fight for yourself man!
(Less loud, pos.answer)OK. I will come by to support you friend!
(90..99: FOR Аргон PAGES ONLY: Speaker is Гонер, with very gentle voice ==== Preaching)Peace to you my son, have you heard the good news?
(Message after -possibly accidental- hits)Please do not fire. We come in peace.
(Is enemy, further attacks)We came in peace, but you deal in death!
(Requesting help)Despite our peaceful intent you still fire on us. Now we have no option but to call for fighter support.
(During fight, or if player is public enemy)I don't want to talk to you!
(Surrender after being attacked)Never! I would rather die!

page.title: Аргон variation 2
page.t: What's your game then? You tired of living?
Are you looking for trouble? One more shot and I will call in a support ship!
This ship is under attack! Somebody please help!
Damn it my shields are almost gone!
Very good. I enjoyed your little joke. Now go away before we start taking you seriously!
I take it that you are looking for a quick end to your life!
Ok Pilot. You asked for it. Let's see how you like this!
Get lost. I don't want to talk to you!
Can't you see that I'm busy?
I've better things to do than help somebody like you find his way!
Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
I'm leaving my ship, take it!
Ok. I give in. Here is some of my freight!
This is the captain speaking. How can I help?
We are not interested in communicating with the likes of you!
We are rather busy at the moment.
Do you really think our purpose is to help your type of pilot?
I am sorry pilot. There seems to be something wrong with my communications. I thought you used the word surrender, but I must be mistaken!
Pilot, check your navigation, you are already there.
Sorry, I don't seem to know of that.
Navigation says you need to fly through the
I am glad we could help you! Good bye.
credits for every gate we go through.
I'm sorry. Our cargobays are full, but we will be free after we unload!
Transporter Captain speaking. There's a problem - you've run out of credits. You know the deal - no credit no transport. When you can afford us get back in touch.
We have a deal. We'll follow and charge for every gate we pass through!
There's no room here to drop your freight. I suggest you try moving somewhere else.
Everything's just fine - we'll start unloading here.
You're very welcome. I'm looking forward to doing business with you next time.
Pilot - stop immediately! - We have found some illegal goods aboard your ship. Drop all your illegal goods or we will open fire!
Pilot - Drop your freight immediately or suffer the consequences!
We scanned your ship and you are clear of illegal goods. You may continue with your journey.
Pilot, I need to get to my destination quickly, hurry up.
Drop me off as soon as you can pilot.
Guess what... your freights gonna be mine!
Hey I need help here! You going to get this guy off my back?
(Гонер sentences, gentle voice)Peace to you my son, have you heard the good news?
We come in peace. Hold your fire.
We came in peace, and you insist on killing me!
Despite our peaceful intent you still fire on us. Now we have no option but to call for fighter support.
I don't want to talk to you!
In the name of Аргон. I give in.

page.title: Аргон variation 3
page.t: Just don't even think about doing that again!
One more unprovoked attack on our ship and we will launch defence craft.
Some people just don't listen, here we go...
Hey someone get here quick, I am under attack.
Damn it, my shields are almost gone!
That shot spilt my drink! If you persist my next shot will spill your brains!
You sure believe in pushing things to the edge!
I've swatted bigger insects than you!
Hey try again when I'm free!
I'm not a tour guide, find someone else to ask.
Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
I'm in a good mood so I'm going to pretend you never said that!
Go away and stop bothering me!
Don't shoot, I'm leaving my ship, you have just put me out of business!
Don't shoot, I'm releasing it. Any more of this and I'm out of business!
We are receiving your incoming communication. What is it you require?
It is too late for you. We've got nothing to talk about!
Do you really expect me to stop what I'm doing just to talk to you.
I have neither the time nor the inclination to speak to you right now.
It is obvious that we don't share your sense of humour. Now go before we take the appropriate action.
You have to fly through the
Pilot, you must be lost, you are there.
Your fame precedes you. The area you search for is beyond the
I am glad we could help you! Good bye.
credits for every gate we go through.
I'm sorry. We're currently busy transporting for another customer. Try contacting me again, after we've finished this job!
I'm very sorry but you can't afford our services!
No problem Pilot. We'll follow you to the station and await your freight.
Can't you see that there's no space left here to drop the freight? Move somewhere else first!
It's OK to start unloading your freight now.
Police to pilot - you are suspected of carrying illegal goods - stop and drop your illegal freight immediately - or we fire.
Pilot - when we said drop your freight we meant NOW - otherwise we fire!
We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thank you for your cooperation.
Hey, did you forget me, pilot? I have to get to my destination quickly!
I demand that you let me out at the next station!
You know what I want, Drop it or I will blast you to pieces!
You trying to fool me? I want it all!
Hey, I need pirate help to fight this madman!
Ok. Hang in there - here I come!
(Гонер sentences, gentle voice)Peace to you my child, have you heard the good news?
Please do not fire. We come in peace.
We came in peace, but you deal in death!
Despite our peaceful intent you still fire on us. Now we have no option but to call for fighter support.
I don't want to talk to you!

page.title: Аргон variation 4
page.t: Hey! Have you gone crazy? Stop shooting!
Hey! If you are looking for a fight you will get one.
Are you looking for trouble? One more shot and I will call in a support ship!
Ready or not here I come!
My shields are going down... Please someone help me!
I'm not too happy about this. Please stop!
What a unique way to commit suicide!
Either you know something that I don't, or you're very very stupid.
I don't like killing crazy people, but for you I'm making an exception!
Go and fly into a black hole!
Can't you see that I am busy?
Do me a favour - just go away!
Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
Just what are you talking about? I haven't even started to fight yet!
Surrender to the likes of you? Don't make me laugh!
Standby, I am abandoning ship, take it!
You! Hang on I'm releasing it!
Captain speaking. Are you trying to make contact?
Do you really think our purpose is to help your type of pilot?
I am busy. Please do not interrupt me again.
You want what? You are in grave danger of annoying us. Go away for your own safety.
Captain speaking. We rarely meet such a cosmic comedian as yourself. The only reason you're still alive is that we are too busy laughing to shoot you!
I'm not sure, but you could try looking beyond the
Pilot, I'm no expert, but you are already here!
Sorry, I don't know that location myself!
The Аргон are pleased to assist you. Try flying through the
I am happy we could help you! Farewell, pilot.
credits for every gate we go through.
I'm sorry. We've got our hands full transporting stuff for someone else. We'll be free after we've finished!
Give me a call back when you can afford us!
We have a deal. We'll follow and charge for every gate we pass through!
There's no room here to drop you freight. Can I suggest you try deploying somewhere else.

page.title: Аргон variation 5
page.t: Come on now! Why are you picking on me?
Hey! If you are looking for a fight you will get one.
You've pushed my patience too far, I'm calling for help.
Oh boy. You are about to be very sorry about that!
I'm in deep trouble out here - I need help!
This one is just for you!
Hey! This ship is almost destroyed here!
You must be feeling very very lucky!
Have you gone crazy? Are you on spaceweed? There's got to be some reason why your brain's not working!
Time to kiss your controls goodbye!
Go and play with a spacefly swarm.
Contact me when I'm not busy.
Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
Drop my freight? What planet have you just dropped from?
That's it - This freight isn't worth losing my life for!
We do not communicate with pilots such as you!
Can't you see we're otherwise engaged?
We are not obliged to assist you.
This is the captain. Never have we been so insulted. Now leave us alone whilst you can still fly.
I believe it is somewhere far behind the

Sorry, I don't know that sector myself!
We are pleased to help a pilot such as you. Go to the
I am glad we could help you! Good bye.
credits for every gate we go through.

We have a deal. We'll follow and charge for every gate we pass through!

I don't want to talk to you!

Паранід wishes get to destination quickly, if pilot has forgotten!

Паранід pirate know you have more!
Help we cannot give - we too busy ourselves!
Help we give - here come Паранід!

page.title: Tutorials
page.descr: All required text for tutorials (mostly including voice, spoken by Instructor)
page.t: Simulation sessions with extensive training of the most important features.
Exams to test a pilots abilities in battle situations.
First basic simulation introducing the controls of a ship and its weapon systems.
Get an introduction to menus, check out some missiles and learn docking and trading.
See what can be done with monitors and learn how to build a station.

Show your skill as a good manager. At the beginning of this simulation you will already own a factory and enough transporter ships to run the factory autonomously. Get the production going to manufacture a laser just in time for a little fight!
This test throws you right into a battle with several different attackers. You control a little fleet of ships and must show your skill to remotely control and command ships in a battle situation.
Try several ships of different classes.

From the bridge of a large M2 class Аргон Titan destroyer you must defeat a fleet of attackers. Some of the enemies are armed with torpedos dangerous enough to destroy a capital ship making it necessary to also remote control smaller fighters to defend the M2!
Bonus sector with a small battle. Try out various upgrades to win the battle as fast as possible.

page.title: Beginner Tutorial 1
page.descr: Beginner Tutorial 1: Basic Controls (spoken by Instructor)
page.t: (_Voice is a nice yet authoritarian military guide. Male_)Welcome to the Аргон federation space academy simulator. My name is Uri Seldom and I'm your guide in this level of the simulation. -- Since this is only a tutorial session to familiarize you with the controls, you are allowed to skip this simulation at any time by pressing the QUIT key or by selecting QUIT from the menus.
To access the ship computer please press the "main-menu"-key now.

It is time to try out the weapon systems of your ship. A few containers have been deployed around your ship. Do not shoot at them yet! Target one of the containers by using the "target next/previous"-keys. Only objects close to you can be targeted.
Well done! Now go ahead and destroy all containers.

Very good, all containers have been destroyed. A second batch of containers will now appear near you. Please destroy them this time with different laser. -- If you have more than one laser in your ship you can exchange it. To do so now, please open the weapon selection menu either directly or through the main menu.
Good. Now close the menu and destroy all containers with this new laser!

Your task is to pass through all Kessler rings which are still marked with a green light. Your target has been set to one of the rings to make it easy for you to find the first ring. Just follow the arrows.

Good work, the containers are destroyed. Your ship has an automated freight load-and-deploy system which you can use to salvage objects from space. In order to not interfere with operation of the ship shields, the shields are temporarily shut down while the system is active. -- To activate the system and open the loading bay you have to select the menu item "open freight bay doors" in your shipmenu. Then fly over the container to load it into your ship. Shortly after successfully catching the object, the loading system will deposit it in your ship's cargo hold.
Your task is to find and collect one of the containers. Fly over the container after you opened the cargo bay.

When you are very close to the other ship, you can select the "enter ship" item in the shipinfo-menu for the ship you are about to enter. - A personal tip: Look up the hotkeys for actions like opening an info menu or for directly entering or leaving a ship.
Oops, you entered your old ship again! Leave, and fly over to the other ship, please!
You are not close enough yet.
Congratulations pilot. You finished part 1 of the training simulation.

(_used for main menu_)You can select between tutorial and practicing sessions. Tutorials are optional to learn basic as well as advanced features of the game. Practicing sessions however have to be finished successfully to activate further levels of the simulator.
Target one of the containers by using the "target next/previous"-keys.
Good. Now select the item "your current ship".
This is the ship menu for your ship. Please select the item "weapons" now.
You now see an overview of your ships laser bays. You can now select a new laser. Please install the beta particle accelerator cannon in one of the bays.
Please open up the main-menu now.
Choose "your current ship" in the main menu now.

page.title: Beginner Tutorial 2
page.t: The central place from where you can reach every menu is the main-menu. You can enter it by pressing the "main menu"-key.

OK. After this short introduction to some important menus we will get to the real action now. Point the nose of your ship to the space-station and press the "target"-key to select the station as your target.
Good work. You now own two upgrades which we are going to try out now. Please leave the station.
Well done. Now fly into a landing platform to bring up the stations menu.

Your target has been set to an M5-class ship. Don't be afraid, it is completely defenceless and waits to be destroyed by a mosquito-missile. By pressing the "select missile"-key you can cycle through the missiles available. -- Alternatively you can select a missile from the "weapons"-menu of your ship. -- Now select the mosquito missile, fly to the ship, keep it targeted and press the "launch missile"-key.
Transporter successfully destroyed. Congratulation pilot - You have finished the part 2 of the training simulation.
You see the information has been sorted in "Player", "Navigation" and "Target" pages. Select "Message Log" from the "Player"-page.

This is the "Ship-Menu". Using "scroll up/down" keys you can scroll through the passive information part at the top. -- Selecting items in the lower active part of the menu is done with "menu selection Up/Down" keys. -- Please select the item "ship details" now and confirm with "select".

You can now see detailed information about your current ship. You can open this same menu for other, even for enemy ships as well. To scroll use the "scroll up/down" keys. Now press the "back" key to go back to the "ship-menu" and from there select the "command console" menu.

This is the "Command-Console" of your shipcomputer. Here you can program your shipcomputer or that of other ships you own but which you are not sitting in yourself. Please press the "back" key and select the "freight bay"-item.

You are now in the "weapons-menu". From here you can install available lasers into your main cockpit and - in case you sit in a bigger ship - into the ships turrets. Also missiles can be installed. Please press the "back" key and then select the "freight bay"-item.

Here you can see information about your titles and rankings, your statistics and log entries. Use "scroll up/down" keys to scroll. Please press the "back" key now and then go to the "Navigation" tab and select the "universe-map"-item.
The "Universe Map" shows all sectors you already have visited. Not every sector is linked to all of its neighbours! Please press the "back" key and select the "sector map"-item.

This perhaps is the most important source of information. It bears ALL information for objects present in a system which are in range of your scanners plus some static information about stationary objects that you have visited before. -- Moveable objects, like ships, disappear once they are outside the range of your scanners. -- You can zoom in and out with the "zoom in/out" keys. The "switch" key switches between top and side view. -- Additionally objects can be filtered by selecting the "Stations" or "Ships" tab. You can use this map for easier navigation in space by targeting an object first from the map and then flying towards the marked arrows. Now close all menus.

Within your scanner range you can see the object identified as "Теладі Trading Station" which has two yellow arrows next to it, this is the station you have targeted. You can upgrade the range of your scanners at some Equipment Docks by the way. Please close all menus again now.
OK. Now let's dock at the Trading Station! To do this you need to request permission to land. Open the COMM menu either directly using the COMM key or through the menu system.

You see the menu of a station. From here you can see what ships are owned by this station, which are landed and with "station details" you get an overview of the goods the station deals with. But what we want to do now is trade with the station to buy some upgrades. So - select the "trade with station"-item.

Now buy the "docking computer" and the "best buys locator" from this station. To do this, move the bar to the appropriate item and use the "menuselection left/right" keys to select the amount you want to buy or sell. In our case you want to buy one unit of each. Confirm your selection with the "select" key.

It's time to check out the destructive power of some different missiles. But first you'll have to buy them. Using the Best Buys locator, you can now find out where to buy an item as cheap as possible. -- When you open up the ship menu for your ship you can find an additional menu item named "Best Buys Locator". Choose it to activate this upgrade.

You see that there is one station offering the lowest prices for all three missiles we want to use. Dock there! This time you can spare the docking procedure because you already own a "docking computer" upgrade. -- Fly towards the cheapest station and from a distance of about 3.5km a new menu item called "docking computer" appears in the "Target"-tab of the main-menu. Use it or learn the correct hotkey, to dock automatically and safely in the station.
Select "trade with station" and buy one missile of each kind.
Good. Now start from the station.
Your last target is a small transporter. Its actual shield and hull strength are far below the destruction power of the silkworm missile. Try destroying it as well.
You are not supposed to buy missiles right now. The deal was rolled back.
This menu stores all messages you receive during flight. In this and the following simulations you can use it to review the instructions. Press the "back"-key and choose the item "your current ship".

OK. The plankton has been ejected. This way you can also lay out mines or satellites. Satellites can help to remote control your ships or even your own station in distant sectors. They have wide range scanners and deliver this information to your shipboard computer navigation map. Please press the "back" key and then select the "Your Personal Information"-item.
Once you targeted an object, you can obtain detailed information about it via this menu. Also, you can communicate with it with the "communication" item. Select this item now.
What a pity you did not hit the ship. You will be given another mosquito missile. Please try again.
Of course the missile you selected would be strong enough to destroy the ship, but for this simulation please use the mosquito-missile for this ship.
Missed! Dragonfly missile reloaded. Please try again.
The silkworm missile surely is powerful enough to destroy the ship, but for this simulation please use the dragonfly missile to destroy the targeted ship.
Bad luck! Reequipped with a silkworm you should try again...

page.title: Basic Tutorial 3
page.descr: texts for Basic Tutorial 3 (spoken by Instructor)
page.t: Welcome back to the Аргон federation space academy simulator. My name is Uri Seldom and in this simulation I will introduce you to different possibilities of setting up views on your HUD. (_a little enthusiastically_)At the end of this session you will learn how to build your own factory.

By pressing the "next cockpit"-key you can cycle through the different cockpits of your ship. Every ship has at least one main-cockpit and - depending on the ship class and size - one or more turrets. The ship you currently sit in - the Аргон Nova - has two cockpits. To go to the other cockpit, press the "next cockpit"-key now.
I will now introduce you to the monitor system. A great invention to make handling of ship groups easier. Switch on the monitors in the options-menu or by pressing the "toggle monitors" hotkey.
Currently both monitors are disconnected. One way of attaching a view to a monitor is via the ship-menu. Open up the ship-menu for your ship.
Below the headline "Monitor mapping" you see some menu items which can be attached to a monitor. Now first select the item "Cockpit: Back", then select "Monitor 1" and confirm the selection.
You now see the ship's main cockpit in the monitor-view. Try to accelerate and steer the ship.
There also is a camera view. Activate it by going to the shipmenu, and setting "external view" to monitor 2.

You now see your own ship from the outside in monitor 2. Activate monitor 2 and try to move the camera with the "cameracontrol" keys. Additionally you can zoom in/out with the "camerazoom"-keys. -- All of this is possible in all modes. So you can even set your large main view to an outside view of your ship and press the camera mode button to let it circle around in cinematic mode while you control your ship from one of the small monitors.
Now switch back to the main-view with the "next monitor"-key and from there return to the main-cockpit view with the "next cockpit"-key.
You can see that some enemy ships appear in front of your ship. The ships are unarmed and have poor shields. Target them, engage them and destroy them with your lasers!
Very good. Now there are some ships behind you. Switch to the backturret and shoot at the ships.

Good work. You should now be able to figure out how to setup monitors in a way that is useful for you. Now let's build a factory. Factories are sold at shipyards. Of course they are too big for your ship to carry, so you must hire a bigger ship that transports the station for you. Recently an Аргон Mammoth jumped into the sector near your location. Point your ship's nose towards the large transporter. Target it by pressing the "target"-key.
The first thing to do is to hire this TL-class ship. Open up the communication-menu for the TL. You want to talk to the Captain aboard this ship.
When talking to him, choose "want you to transport something" and agree to the offer.
OK. You have hired the TL. Next it must be told to dock at the shipyard. Open up the comm-menu once more and talk to the captain.
Now choose the item "please move to shipyard..." and in the following menus select the current sector and the "Federal Аргон Shipyard" inside of it.
Well done. While the TL docks at the shipyard, please dock there as well. Fly towards the shipyard, make it the current target and - when you are about 4km away - request to land.
Please wait until the TL has docked outside this station, too. To observe the TL you could set its external view of it to a monitor...
Good. Select trade with station now.
You see that the station sells only one solar power plant. Buy it!
Now you are asked where to load the factory. Of course that's why we have hired the TL. Choose Аргон Mammoth.
OK. The TL now has the station on board. Close all menus and leave the station.
Next, please target the hired TL.

Now you have to search a good place for the station. In real space you would have to find out, where such a worthwhile place is but for now it's good enough to build it anywhere in the sector. -- Therefore command the TL to follow you and then lead the Transporter a little bit away from the shipyard.

Good. Now it is time to let the Transporter drop his freight. Keep in mind that you have to be close to the TL for this command to be displayed. You will then be shown a "Sector Map" where you can select the final position of your station. -- Use the "Camera-Control"-keys to move the co-ordinates and use the Sector Map controls to zoom.
OK. You can watch your station build up automatically.
Congratulations. You have successfully completed this simulation.
The Аргон Mammoth has the wrong command. Please open the comm-menu again and tell the captain to dock at the shipyard.

page.title: Advanced Tutorial (2-1)
page.t: Mission accomplished!!! All enemies have been destroyed! Great work pilot! Stand by for your battle statistics

Welcome to this reward scenario. Ready for some action? This is a battle simulation. A group of Пірат and Ксенон are attacking your allies. Your ship is equipped with some of the most advanced and certainly some of the most expensive weapons and upgrades today. With all these high tech tools it should be easy for you to win this battle in a very short time. To achieve a good rating in your files try to finish this mission in the shortest possible time. Good luck!
Your mission is to help your allies to destroy all enemy ships.!

page.title: Advanced - Multiple ships
page.descr: Testtutorial to demonstrate the use of different ships (spoken by Instructor)
page.t: Welcome to this reward scenario. -- In this simulation you will have the exclusive chance to try out a wide variety of different ships and get a feeling for how different they are. -- See what advantages and disadvantages the various models have and compare the technical data. -- Enjoy your time in the simulator! You can leave this simulation session at any time.

page.title: Advanced Tutorial 1
page.t: Welcome back to the Аргон federation space academy simulator. --My name is Uri Seldom and in this simulation I will finally introduce you to the most advanced techniques of trading and running a business. --You are about to learn not just how to run your own cooperation, but even advanced tricks and tips how to use a whole fleet of ships to manage an empire effectively. --If you are not interested in such advanced management skills yet or plan a different career you can skip this simulation session at any time.

Please assign a command to ship "Transporter 1 of Cahoona" to automatically bring Argnu Beef to your factory. One possibility to do this is to go to the appropriate menu - is to select the Cahoona Bakery and then access the list of "landed Ships". -- Now choose "Transporter 1 of Cahoona" and select command console. Command the ship to "Buy ware for best price..." from the TRADE commands. -- This means that the ship will continue to buy resources for the station from another station. As resource to buy, please select "Argnu Beef".

Well done pilot! Transporter 1 knows now what to do. If you want to give "Transporter 2 of Cahoona" the command to buy Energy Cells the same way, you will notice that this command is not available yet. -- The reason is that this ship has no homebase yet. -- To set the homebase, go to the command console of "Transporter 2 of Cahoona" and set the homebase to "Cahoona Bakery".
OK, the ship is ready to get the resource for its homebase. Make "Transporter 2 of Cahoona" get Energy Cells like before.

OK, parameter set correct. The next step is to get the required resources for the Forge. It needs Energy Cells, Ore and Cahoona Meatsteaks. We will get the Meatsteaks from our own station once it has produced enough. -- Now we will get the Energy Cells manually. To do that first give "Transporter 1 of Forge" the command to "Dock at..." the Solar Power Plant. -- Another, shorter way to go to the command console of a ship is to use the "Owned Properties"-menu to directly choose the right transporter.
It would be a good idea to use this transporter also to get the Cahoona Meatsteaks from your Bakery. Commmand "Transporter 1 of Forge" to dock at the Cahoona Bakery.
Good, please wait until it has landed there. To shorten the waiting time you could activate the Singularity Engine Time Accelerator.
The Bakery has now produced enough Meatsteak Cahoonas! Load at least 100 Meatsteaks into your transporter via the menu item "Adjust station parameters".

Very well done! You already have passed the hardest part of the steps to successfully complete this simulation! -- The next thing to do is to bring the resources loaded in "Transporter 1 of Forge" to the forge. Command the transporter to "Return home", to make it fly to your Forge.
OK. The transporter is on its way. Please wait until it has landed - Once the transporter is landed, you can manually unload the resources to the Forge and the production of the laser can begin.

"Transporter 1 of Forge" has just landed. Please transfer the Energy Cells and the Meatsteak Cahoonas to the forge. As explained earlier, you can do this via "Adjust station parameters" from the ship-menu.

Good work! The forge is going to produce the urgently needed EPT weapon - the enemy ships are closing on to this sector! The production time for a laser of this class has been slashed in this simulation.

The time is over! The second laser has been produced. Install the lasers quickly into your ship! To do that you have to land in the station and then transfer them to your current ship. You only have three minutes left before the enemies arrive!
Enemies are attacking! Defend your station NOW
Congratulations! You have successfully completed this simulation - A new level of simulations is now activated - Good luck!
Please care for the right transporter.
The ship has the wrong command. Please command the ship to "Buy ware for best price..." and then choose "Argnu beef".
Oops, you have mistaken the advice - please set the homebase to Cahoona Bakery!
Please set the homebase to Cahoona Bakery first.
You have given a wrong command. Command the ship to "Buy ware for best price..." and then choose Energy Cells.
The homebase has been reset to Cahoona Bakery.

If you take a look at the landed ships, you will notice that the two transporters are still on board the Cahoona Bakery. The ships can trade only if the station has enough money. -- Give 10000 credits to the station and set the buying prices for the needed resources to their maximum. -- Do this via the "Adjust station parameters" item in the station-menu.
Please move 10000 Credits of your money towards your station. By setting the parameter credits to 10000. Set Energy Cells and Argnu beef buying price to maximum!
Please set credits of the Forge to 35000 and the buying price of Ore to maximum first!
You are about to give a wrong command to the ship or sending it to the wrong station! Please command the ship to "Dock at..." the Solar Power Plant.
The homebase has been reset to H.E.P.T Laser Forge.
The transporter has a wrong command! Command it to "Buy ware..." Ore and then choose "Ore Mine Alpha".

You have bought too much, therefore the transaction is being partly rolled back. It would be clever to use this transporter also to get the Cahoona Meatsteaks from your Bakery. Commmand "Transporter 1 of Forge" to "Dock at..." the Cahoona Bakery.
The transporter has the wrong command. Tell it to "Dock at..." the Cahoona Bakery.
"Transporter 2 of Forge" has loaded the Ore, needed by the Forge.
"Transporter 2 of Forge" has brought the Ore to the Forge.
Your Cahoona Bakery has the needed resources and begins producing the Meatsteaks now.
Please wait until the Cahoona Bakery has produced an amount of 100 Meatsteaks.
You have unloaded Energy Cells, that were determined for the Forge. This transaction has been rolled back.
The transporter has a wrong command! Command it to "Return home", making it fly to your forge.
In this sector we already have a small business cycle. You own two stations:
a Cahoona Bakery, producing Cahoona Meatsteaks,
and an H.E.P.T Laser Forge, which needs Cahoona Meatsteks as well as other good to manufacture a large laser.
Your task is to produce one urgently needed - Alpha H.E. Plasma Thrower - short "EPT".
First supply your Cahoona Bakery with the needed resources.
Therefore bring Argnu Beef from the Argnu Ranch,
and Energycells from the Solar Power Plant to the Cahoona Bakery.
Your Cahoona Bakery already has two transporter-ships supposed to get one resource each.

page.title: Advanced Tutorial 2
page.descr: Defeat three waves of enemy ships in the Aguilar-Asteroidfield. (spoken by Instructor)
page.t: Welcome to the Аргон federation space academy simulator level 1. This simulation will test your ability in fights and in handling an M3 class small fighter with two cockpits. -- If you succeed in this test, you will be allowed to participate in the level 2 simulations. Good luck!
Destroy as fast as you can as many enemy ships as possible. Don't forget to activate your back turret, it could be helpful.

OK, the first fight is won! --But you can't lean back and relax right now, because a new wave of Ксенон ships try to take victory on their side. In this wave you will get the additional support of three Теладі-, Boron- and Паранід-fighter.
Very well done! You have survived the second fight! The Ксенон are weakened by now and can't send in a lot of new ships anymore - but another opponent group joins the game: Пірат.
Congratulations! You have qualified yourself as a fighting-pilot by successfully completing this simulation! You now progress to the next level of simulations.
Half of the opponent fleet is destroyed. Don't give up now!
Half of the opponent fleet is destroyed. Keep up the good work!
Keep up the good work! Victory is near!

In this sector a battle is simulated between fighters of the M4 class in the "Aguilar" Asteroid belt. The battle stretches over several waves in which Ксенон and Пірат try to defeat you and your companions-in-arms.
In every wave you'll fight together with fleets of different races.
The more enemies you destroy the more companions will survive, standing on your side in the next wave.

page.title: Advanced Tutorial 3
page.descr: Player flies Аргон Titan (spoken by Instructor)
page.t: missile ship(added to names of the 'missile ships')
Hunt down the "traitor"-ship with your Аргон Nova fighter which you control via the lower right monitor after you set the command for all turrets in your Titan to "Turret kill enemies".

The traitor-ship has been destroyed. -- You were able to get the information showing which ships carry the deadly hornet-missiles from his log information - The missile ships are now marked on your map. -- You have to eliminate these ships first and then kill all the other enemies.
Very good, you have destroyed all of the most threatening enemies. Now defeat the rest.

Good! All enemies are destroyed... But hold on - More enemies are coming into the sector. This time they are too many to fight with only one destroyer. Your only chance of surviving is to escape through the jumpgate. Navigate your Titan to the gate.

Good work! As you were able to escape and not let your Аргон Titan fall in the hands of the enemy you have completed this simulation successfully. As a reward for your outstanding achievement you now have access to a new simulation.

Welcome to the level 2 fight simulation. This time you will have the exclusive chance to command a capital ship and take a seat in one of its 6 turrets or in its commander seat. - A fleet of ships is trying to attack you because they want to take over the control of your ship.

You'll have to defend the Titan against a whole fleet of attackers. The additional problem however is that some of the enemy ships carry hornet-missiles. These ships are the biggest threat in this simulation, as they can seriously damage your Аргон Titan destroyer.
One of the enemies has been identified as a weak traitor. It carries information about which ships carry the dangerous hornet-missiles.

You will have to chase and attack the traitor with your remote-controlled Аргон Nova fighter first, to get the information about the missile-ships. As soon as you know which ships are the missile-ships, destroy them as quick as you can.
While you are busy hunting the traitor, your Аргон Titan is being attacked by the enemy. You should make it defend itself by giving the "Turret kill enemies" command.

page.title: Advanced - Multiple ships (Messages)
page.descr: Testtutorial to demonstrate the use of different ships - this page is used for messages
page.t:
[author]Instructor[/author][title]MULTIPLE SHIP TRYOUT![/title][text colwidth='500'][center]Welcome, pilot. In this simulation you are able to fly different ships. Your current ship is [b]%s[/b]. You can now choose between the following points...

[select]Try current ship![/select]

[select value='TS']Take a small Transporter?[/select]

[select value='M5']Wanna try another M5?[/select]

[select value='M4']Beam me to an M4![/select]

[select value='M6']Have a seat in an M6?[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]You will take a seat in an M1. M1 is a carrier ship with different turrets, well armed and armoured and a big dockbay size. It is slower than M6 types and it got the worst acceleration. We are beaming you right on the bridge of...:

[select value='A_M1']...the Аргон Colossus![/select]

[select value='T_M1']...the Теладі Condor![/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]The M2 is a Destroyer with many turrets. It got lighter shields and can not rotate as fast as the M1, but it is faster and very well armed!! So, have a seat in the captain's chair of the...

[select value='P_M2']...Паранід Odysseus?[/select]

[select value='B_M2']...Boron Ray?[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]The biggest fighter ship is the M3. It got the biggest shields and weapons of the fighters! Especially some of them got turrets to the back. The speed of them are nearly equal to the M4 or M5. Have a ride in a...

[select value='P_M3']...Паранід Perseus[/select]

[select value='A_M3']...Аргон Nova[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]
