[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]The M4 is the middleclass fighter! The shields are not as good as in an M3 fighter (but better than in an M5), but lasers, speed, acceleration and rotation are nearly the same. There are no turrets in the M4! Another factor is the price, it is much cheaper than an M3. Wanna start?

[select value='S_M4']Спліт Scorpion![/select]

[select value='T_M4']Теладі Buzzard![/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]You have decided to fly an M5. M5 ships are very light fighter ships with low shields and small lasers but high speed, acceleration and great rotation... So have a seat in a...

[select value='S_M5A']...Спліт Jaguar?[/select]

[select value='A_M5']...Аргон Discoverer?[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Wanna try an M6? The M6 is a fast accelerating cruiser with high shields, large lasers and great rotation, but low speed... It's your choice:

[select value='T_M6']Теладі Osprey?[/select]

[select value='B_M6']...Boron Hydra?[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Gonna have a ride in a TS? The TS is a light armoured and armed Transporter with small cargospace... Select one of the following TS:

[select value='A_TS']Аргон Mercury?[/select]

[select value='P_TS']Паранід Demeter?[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Are you sure you wanna take the TL? OK... this is the large cargoship! It is a faster transporter with high shields, large lasers in turrets and has a huge cargospace to carry whole construction kits for new factories... Here are two of them:

[select value='B_TL']Boron Orca[/select]

[select value='P_TL']Паранід Hercules[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]So you are going to have a ride in a TP! The TP is a personnel transporter, which is faster than a TS transporter! Armour and Arms are nearly equal to the TS. Which one shall it be?

[select value='S_TP']Спліт Iguana?[/select]

[select value='B_TP']Boron Mamba?[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Now you are in the [b]%s[/b]! Fly around and have some fun...time remaining in current ship: 20 minutes.

[select value='Start']Ok, let's go![/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]You have selected [b]%s[/b].You can now fly around and test your current ship for 20 minutes...overall simulation time remaining [b]%d[/b][/center][/text]
[author]Instructor[/author][title]MULTIPLE SHIP TRYOUT END![/title][text colwidth='500'][center]Simulation ending...time expired![/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Select your new ship... you can now change your ship to:

[select value='M5']...an M5 fighter.[/select]

[select value='M4']...an M4 fighter.[/select]

[select value='M3']...an M3 fighter.[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Select your new ship... you can now change your ship to:

[select value='M1']...an M1 carrier.[/select]

[select value='M2']...an M2 destroyer.[/select]

[select value='M6']...an M6 cruiser.[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Select your new ship... you can now change your ship to:

[select value='TS']...a TS small transporter.[/select]

[select value='TL']...a TL large transporter.[/select]

[select value='TP']...a TP person transporter.[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Select your new ship... you can now change your ship to:

[select value='M1']...an M1.[/select]

[select value='M2']...an M2.[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

[author]Instructor[/author][text colwidth='500'][center]Select your new ship... you can now change your ship to:

[select value='TP']...a TP.[/select]

[select value='TL']...a TL.[/select]

[select]Cancel[/select][/center][/text]

page.title: Senator McCarthy
page.t: We must rebuild, (Cut to shots of a dockyard at work) we must make Аргон strong once more. My fellow senators and I are drawing up emergency plans and we call upon all our citizens to be ready for the war we fight. A war unlike anything we have faced before. We must be vigilant. (Cut to pictures of Аргон warships). We must heed the call to fight for justice and freedom. We must find and we must destroy the Хаак where ever they may be found. This is the day for justice. This is the day for freedom. This is our day!

My fellow senators. Today we are a planet awakened to danger. And while we have been touched by tragedy, the fires that brought it have only made the spirit of all our citizens burn more brightly. And in this light we see our course. We will not be broken. We will not surrender. We will prevail. Applause, cheering.

They don't talk, they don't listen. They aren't interested in dialogue. They are only interested in death. Death in the thousands. And it isn't just Аргон that is a victim. Innocent Паранід, Спліт, Boron and Теладі, are our allies in suffering (Pictures of alien suffering). And I speak to them as much as to the senate. Let us find the Хаак homeworld, let us find this house of evil and let us rid ourselves of our enemy (we end on a Хаак ship exploding).

...and it's about time we realised that the only thing that will stop this is their total destruction. The Хаак aren't interested in peace. They attacked for no reason and now it is time for us to teach them their mistake.
These are strong times. Let us send a message to the Хаак. Either we will see an end to this war, or we will see an end to them.

It is a warning to us all to remain vigilant. There are still forces that seek to destroy us and our battle for security, our search for just salvation, our need as a people of the free must continue. There are those who seek to destroy us and we will defend ourselves against them.

page.title: Ban Danna
page.t: The patrol will start near the North Gate in Home of Light. From there take the West gate to Red Light. Cross Red Light and use the South gate for Південно-Західна Хмарна База. Check for Хаак activity in these sectors and eliminate any Хаак ships you come across.
The flight leader's got some combat experience, but the rest are rookies. Hopefully, you'll get there without incident, but stay sharp and try and keep those pilots alive. We're going to need them.

You can join the fleet by the Terracorp Nividium plant in Home of Light. The fleet is made of mixed ships so be careful, they could spread out due to their different speeds - particularly if you hit trouble. Pass on my regards to the fleet captain when you reach them.

Julian, I've had to use secure channels to send you this message. The senate have now declared you renegade, so you'll have to stay out of sight of Аргон and Паранід installations. Both governments are talking to the other races and it won't be long before at least the Boron also declare you renegade. The only way out of this is for you to find out what the Паранід are doing and why.

Hopefully, by now you've met up with the Don. He'll help you get what you need. I think your instincts about a cloaking device are correct. It's not something we've been able to achieve, but there have been rumours of the Паранід succeeding. We'd been wondering how they managed it and you're right, the probability is that it was with help from this alien 'Sargon'. The question is - why Sargon suddenly chose to stop working with the Паранід and go to Ion instead.
However they built the cloaking device, it will have been expensive and it will require huge amounts of energy to maintain, so whatever they are doing it must be worth a lot to them.
By the way, the senate has also insisted that we return the Seed. The Паранід are sending a convoy to pick it up from us.
Find out what they're doing, Julian and come back when you can prove it. Good luck!

page.title: Julian Gardna
page.t: I didn't know you were here, Saya.
I've never met him, never. He ended up like this chasing Earth. (To Saya) What do you think's going to happen to us? Dogun dead, Ion ...All because of Earth. What's so important about it?
No. Look at it. This isn't the planet that Ion was looking at. Where ever he's building that gate to it's not Earth.
I don't know, but we've got to stop him before he gets there.
One drop off. You know the number if you need picking up. What are you waiting for?
Two fingers to Sargon with any luck.
Am I going to get arrested again?
While McCarthy signs a peace treaty with the Паранід, blames the Хаак and covers up Sargon's existence?
Too important? All of you is the reason this has been worth doing. Come on let's go.
Until the next war, it's time to party!

page.title: Intro Captain
page.t: Don't complain about that, son. Quiet's the way we like it.
One more gate, then it's home for the vacation.

page.title: Junior Flight Officer
page.t: Wait a minute. I'm getting something.

page.title: Salik
page.t: Hello and welcome to this special edition of Аргон Today. In this programme we look at the Хаак war and ask the question - Why?

Here in this vid we witness the first of the Хаак's ruthless assaults on our civilisation(cut to existing footage without the V.O.), the attack at President's End. And, whilst there has been no major attack on Аргон settlements since the battle at Омікрон Ліри, the Хаак continue to destroy ships and installations, to murder innocent civilians. But, as Аргон forces seem unable to find a Хаак homeworld or even to communicate with this merciless enemy, we are left with few answers and fewer options for retaliation.

The only person to have a close encounter with the Хаак is Kyle Brennan who was lost to them whilst searching for the AP Gunner and a way back to Earth(bring up a picture of Kyle set against footage of the ship). - Hero of the Ксенон war, Kyle remains in intensive care, unresponsive, as much a mystery as the Хаак who left him this way. Kyle's son Julian Brennan(Use a picture of him and some of the opening from X2) previously known as Julian Gardna, a notorious pirate, was one of those who helped defend Аргон in the crucial battle at Омікрон Ліри. Since then there has been a relative calm, but with Аргон forces at an all time low it can only be a matter of time before the Хаак return. Will we be ready to defend ourselves? What do the Хаак want? Someone who thinks they know the answer is Senator McCarthy.

Hello and welcome to Аргон Today coming up ... Boron spas, the latest in relaxation innovation(picture of a happy Boron in a walk-in bath?). A pirate's life for me, we talk to a Yaki pirate and ask them, why(A picture of a Yaki/pirate attack)? But now on Аргон Today, we take a spotlight look at Senator Joana McCarthy.

Senator Joana McCarthy speaking only hours after the Хаак attack on President's End. While there are those who are still seeking ways to open negotiations with the Хаак, Senator McCarthy is a leading hawk who thinks the only solution is the complete eradication of the Хаак race.

Moving to news outside Аргон, the Паранід Empire suffered its heaviest attack to date with huge loses to all ships and stations in the Край Імперії sector. The Паранід minister for unholy affairs(drop in a photograph of the minister) has stated that their priests fear it is the taint of the unholy two eyes that has brought the wrath of the Хаак on their empire. To counter this fear, (Cut to pictures of the Паранід military Vessels taking up position by gates)all central Паранід sectors are being declared off limits to non-Paranids. All non-Паранід owned material in these sectors is being seized by the authorities.

Аргон diplomatic sources are yet to officially respond to this, but advise all Аргон citizens to leave these sectors immediately. (Back to the studio)Sources close to the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia(add a picture of the Pontifex, or at least an artist's impression labelled as such) claim that any non-Paranids failing to comply with the order to leave will be destroyed. And now, the weather...

Words from the frontline, which today reached Аргон Prime itself with the Хаак launching a devastating attack on our central sector. And with fires still burning across Argonia and several outlying cities, we go live to the Senate building for a statement by Senator McCarthy...

...and following the dramatic escape(some shots of the player's prison ship escaping and a disruptor missile knocking out a patrol ship) of three prisoners including both Julian and Kyle Brennan, the Паранід Empire has accused the Аргон senate of colluding in the get away. The Paranids are now threatening to take military action.

In a counterclaim, Аргон sources have stated that the Паранід empire is withholding information vital to the fight against the Хаак. As the diplomatic words heat and Паранід forces build on the border(we see Паранід ships gathering) it appears that Аргон could soon be fighting a war on two fronts.
And with the disappearance of Хаак forces across all systems, we are all able to take a breath and be thankful that peace has returned, for the moment anyway.

Next week, Earth - legend, religion, now fact. We ask are they friend, or are they foe? As the Terrans continue their silence and the Паранід draw new treaties with us, will we find we have more in common with our Паранід neighbours, than with our Terran brothers? This is Salik Harith. This is Аргон Today.

page.title: Judge
page.t: (Voice Over)For crimes against the people of Аргон, we find Julian Brennan - Guilty.

page.title: Ban Danna COMM
page.t: I thought you were a better pilot than that.
How can I help you, Julian?
You'll have to come back later, Julian.
We're taking too much damage, we've got to...
Julian, thanks for coming. I've got a squadron fresh out of flight school due on their first combat patrol. I'd like you to show them a few tricks.

The fleet's down to 30% ...and we don't have many old pilots left to teach the new ones. Can you think of a more important task? You'll get chance to put your life on the line soon enough. I just hope your father recovers soon to give us some insight into the Хаак. Have you been to see him?
I'll hold you to that. Ban Danna out.
Julian, I heard what happened with the White Stone.

I'm afraid Аргон Prime's not keen on loaning out equipment at the moment, but there's a Terracorp Nividium convoy in Home of Light that needs an escort. You help out with that and it should help me get you some spydrones. I'll be in touch.
Julian, I've traced some spydrones, but I won't be able to get them released until you've helped out with that Terracorp convoy.
I'm sorry, Julian, but I can't release those spy drones until you've helped out with a Terracorp convoy. There's another one gathering by the Nividium plant that needs an escort.

Julian, I've traced some spydrones, but I won't be able to get them released until you've helped out with a Terracorp convoy. There's another one gathering by the Nividium plant. They'll be ready to go in a few hours.
They'll be ready to go in an hour.
Julian, could you meet me onboard, Аргон One? I've heard you might have plans of those Yaki missiles and I'd like to see them.
Julian, please could you meet me on board, Аргон One.
Welcome. I'm afraid Miss Marani will have to stay on her ship. If she was to be seen onboard...
(Ignoring her)Those plans you recovered are going to come in very useful, Julian. We'll analyse them and I'll let you know when we have some answers. In the meantime, why don't you visit your father?
Good, come aboard and I'll have someone escort you down.

Julian, I have news of your father. He regained consciousness during the Хаак attack on Аргон Prime, but before I could speak to him he stole a ship and left the station. His doctors have evidence that at the moment the Хаак arrived, his brainwaves matched the pattern of the Хаак jump events. I'm afraid word of this has got back to the senate. Senator McCarthy thinks he is being influenced by the Хаак and has ordered that Kyle must be found and, if he refuses to return, the search party has permission to fire on him.

I can't delay the search fleet forever, but I can give you a headstart. Before he went, your father looked up files on the AP Gunner. As you know he was looking for the Gunner before he disappeared, so I believe he's headed where you found it in Схованка Ньяни. We have to know what's important about that ship and what he discovered about the Хаак.
Find him and bring him home safe, Julian. I can't believe your father would betray us.
If there is a link, and I have to say 'if' right now, Kyle, then that would explain why the Хаак have hit the Паранід so hard.
I think it's time we found out.
I'm sorry, Kyle, this is one for Julian. (To Julian) You have a pass that gives you access to the Паранід central sectors?
Then I think you should do a little reconnaissance. I'll have a ship prepared. Take care of any business you have and return to Аргон One, we'll have it ready for you.
Ah, Julian. The ship is ready. Good Luck, we're counting on you. Though I'm sure Saya will keep an eye on you.
Julian. The ship is ready. Please return to Аргон One.
Good to see you're eager. It will take us another few minutes to install the equipment. I'll contact you as soon as it's done.
Ah, Julian. The ship is ready.
Good Luck, we're counting on you.(Then into 720212)

Hello, Julian. I'm afraid you need to scan those installations, we'll need proof if you are to go to the Аргон senate and the sooner you get it done it, the sooner we start saving lives. Ban Danna out.
That's a start, Julian. It looks like your father was right, but we'll need more proof. Go back with Saya and scan the rest of those installations then we can start putting this right.
Julian, please return to Аргон One immediately. There have been some developments.

Julian, please return to Аргон One immediately. The Паранід Empire has declared you a criminal for the murder of Armanckessilon and for the theft of the Seed. It looks like Аргон will also agree to declare you a criminal. You need to return here as soon as possible so we can sort this out.

Julian, the Аргон Senate has voted to declare you a criminal. Your assets have been frozen and if you do not return immediately, then steps will be taken to bring you to justice. You must return as soon as possible.
She's fine. Julian, have you heard of a Паранід called Armanckessilon?
His family claims you murdered him and a Паранід called Nolmancketnun has alleged that you stole the Seed.

A well known pirate isn't going to help your case, especially as the Паранід are threatening to declare war. They say we've let them take the worst of the Хаак attacks and are already negotiating with the Спліт. With our fleet spread so thin...I'm afraid the senate has decided to hand you over to them.

Senator McCarthy pushed through a senate decree two hours ago. You, Ion and your father are to be transferred to Аргон before being sent to Паранід Прайм. As a pledge of honour you're being allowed to fly yourself. I urge you NOT to escape, Julian. (Hint) If you were to escape and find evidence of what's been happening then you would be on your own. And if you ran to the Don Marani, well that might confirm your guilt, no matter how helpful it might be.
Julian, if you deviate any further from your flight plan then security vessels will be sent to stop you. This is your last warning.
This is Аргон One to all Паранід ships. Cease all hostile actions immediately.
Massive power readings from normally calm space? You're an incredibly easy person to find. Where's Kyle?
Now, I should arrest you, but right now, I think I'd rather offer you parole and a chance to help out.
I've put out a call, but Хаак are attacking several systems, the fleet can't spare any more ships
We've got to hold the line.
Julian can you get over there and man their turrets until they get their shields back?
There's another wave of suicide ships heading towards you! I'm transferring you to a fighter to intercept!
Julian, Redoubt's weapons are offline, can you cover her while they make repairs?

This order is direct from the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia and the senate council. You are hereby placed under my command. Any Паранід ships disobeying this are to be destroyed, at the Pontifex's pleasure. End of general transmission. (Some sort of visual clue to the switch) Julian.
All ships, engage the Хаак fleet.
You leave now, Julian and there's no way the senate will forgive you.
Great maker! All forces pull back.
We haven't the ships. We must gather the fleet to protect Аргон.
Kyle, good to hear from you old friend.
Earthfleet, please accept our thanks. I speak here on behalf of all...
All ships, set course for Аргон immediately...
Come in Renown...(Static) Come in Illustrious...(Static)
We might not have the forces to defend ourselves. All ships, return to Аргон immediately.
And may the maker be with you.
Ah, Julian, yes, I might have just the thing, I'm transmitting details.
Credits? Yes, I have something you can do...sending now.
If you have the time, I do have a mission for you.
Ah, Julian, yes, I have a mission for you. I'll send you the details.
Certainly, check your messages for a briefing.
I'm afraid you'll have to finish the mission I gave you first. I'm resending details.
I've given you a mission already, finish that and we can talk. Resending details.
Finish the one I gave you and we'll talk.
I'm sorry I don't have any more information. Good luck.
You'll have to find things out yourself, Julian, Ban Danna out.
We don't know anything else I'm afraid, you'll have to find out.

page.title: Julian COMM
page.t: I know it's been quiet, but is that the most important thing you've got?
Hasn't been time. You want to give me those patrol details?
Maybe next time I'm in the system.
Don't call me sir, I'm not fleet. Right, Gamma Patrol, keep it sharp and try not to shoot each other down, okay?
Then let's get to Південно-Західна Хмарна База.
Call out if you get in trouble, don't go playing hero. Now, pick your targets and take them out!
Hold it together, Gamma you're doing well.
Use those targeters, Gamma. (alternate version - Use those targeters, lock and fire),
Yeah. I lost my best friend there.
I just fly ships. Do a little trading, fight when I have to. Nothing else is worth thinking about.
Watch your back next time, Gamma 3. You get fragged you can't help anyone.
Watch your angles next time, Gamma 1. Space is 3D. They can kill you from above and below.
Pick a target and take it out!
Great shooting. Now let's get you to Південно-Західна Хмарна База in one piece. You can put a round on my tab at the trading station.
See you in space. Stay alive!
Either that, or Noah's worried about leaving you alone with a ship full of monks, Saya.
Yeah. How can I help you, Noah?
Anyone mind telling me what we're transporting?
Launch some drones, hold the one liners. Okay, Saya?
These drones are Terracorp aren't they? You trying to up your profits?
And I thought you were helping out of the goodness of your heart.
You trying to make me throw up, Saya?
You keep up with them, Dogun, I'll do the rest.
What flight school did you go to, Dogun?!
Nice time to tell me - look out!
Now would be a good time to start praying, Dogun.
I hope Noah blessed this ship before it left!
No, they've all gone home. Who do you think's shooting at us, Dogun?!
Stop with the stats and fly!
Think happy thoughts, and don't crash!
You crash this thing, Dogun and I'll kill you.
You've got serious latent aggression haven't you, Dogun?
No, I believe in not getting killed!
Yeah. Then they'd kill us really slowly.
You keep up with that ship! I'll take care of these guys
Don't let that ship get away!
They've got a target lock on us!
We get out of this, you should go in for sports commentary!
I could be wrong, but I think it was them shooting at us!
Your mother would be really proud. Trust me.
Closer, we don't want to lose him in those asteroids, but watch out for those missiles!
I don't know what they shot me full of, but I don't think I'll ever sleep again.
Let me guess, mass destruction and the end of the galaxy?
Then let's see what he's got to say and find whoever stole the crystal.
Don Tony Marani, you are to return the White Crystal, or you will be destroyed.
You really think he's letting us have it?
Lower your shields and return the white crystal
Don't think he likes your jokes.
Careful, it might not be the crystal.
One dangerous rock seeking a safe home.
I'd better warn Noah. I don't want that crystal going missing again.
Hasn't Ion told you? I recovered it from the Don.
Er, bad news, I just stole it for him. How bad is that? I mean, what do these stones do?
Oh, yeah. I think Ion and I need a little chat.
Do they play fair in these things? Or am I going to get thrusters in my face?
Okay, Noah, so who do we talk to?
And the Rookie takes the lead.
Now who's the Rookie? You, dimwad!
I thought you guys could race!
Nobody tell you? There's a new champion in town.

This is Julian Brennan calling Thomus Beckitt, come in please. (Pause-static). Thomus Beckitt, come in please, this is urgent! (Pause-static) I'm not getting any response. (Comm. opens) Thomus Beckitt, this is...
If we ask Ban for some tracking equipment, we can listen in from a distance.
Bet he's great at parties. Come on. Let's see what Ban's got in his box of tricks.
(Rueful) Yeah. We've got a line on this Ion guy, but we're going to need some help if we're to reel him in.
A way to listen in on a meeting, but without anyone knowing we're there.
One of these days someone's going to help me just cos they like me.
Аргон escort to Terracorp fleet captain.
Since when've you been a cargo jockey?
You get anything on that ship? The one we couldn't recognise?
I'm a sitting duck in this thing. Transporting back to my ship.
Try and hold it together, we can...make it out of here
Terracorp owes me a lot more than that.
Haven't you got anything better to do?
You do realise that Saya's coming the chances of this being a secret mission are about a thousand to one?
Аргон escort to Terracorp fleet captain.
Yeah, but I'm not planning on getting close, not without a defence against those disruptor missiles. Let's use that asteroid field for cover.
Shields down. They've got missile lock.
You trying to encourage me, or distract me, Saya?
All this for a light show?
All that time my father spent searching, and now someone's found it.
You want to talk or fight? Cos I'm happy with just talking.
What little girl? Have you gone completely spacehappy?
I'm not Yaki. okay? They tricked me into stealing the White Stone.
Do you know anything about these missiles they use? The disruptors?
I had a visit from the Don Marani. Apparently the Yaki have his daughter. We free her, he helps us get rid of the disruptor missiles.
Last he heard, she was on the trading station.
You get any time off, take some comedy lessons.
The crumbs lead to this silicon mine, we should check it out.
I'm here from the Don. You want me to call him? You think the Don wants to come down here?
If we do we find her we can't attack the station. That'd put her at even more risk.
I think we should offer the Yaki some bait.
I think you'll make a wonderful slave girl.
What do you want most out of life?
That's because you've got your mother and Terracorp. When you've not got roots, it's easy for one thing to take over your life.
Let's check out further East we're getting nothing here.
You work for Terracorp, you found things quiet there?
Let's try some silent running. I don't want the Yaki picking up any comms and running scared.
You? Come on admit it, you can't wait to play hostages and Пірат.
Mines, there they are! Sooner they ban these things the better.
Er, a bit late with the undetected, Saya.
These guys just don't know when to give up.
Now that's going to take some redecorating.
Oh, yeah! How about I knock on the door and ask nicely?
Get into the station (We see Яма in the spacestation), right? At least the Yaki've left the backdoor open.
One ship, one careful lady owner. Time to get onboard.
Okay, Saya, I've picked up your ship in the docking bay, give me your co-ordinates and let's get out of here!
Traffic was terrible. Can you fly this?
Then transport me back to my ship. I'll fly escort duty.
Is there any other way out?
And this suit was brand new.
Got to get the timing right...
So...what do we do now? A whole group of slave girls wasn't in the plan.
I believe we had a deal.
I had things to do. Did you bring the information?
Let's pay the Паранід a visit.
They've only shut the central sectors. Let's head to Імператорські Шахти and see what we can do after that.
Let's visit the Ксенон. I've always wanted a look at that old M0.
Yeah, but yours didn't save the universe. Try following that.
Let's take a look at the Yaki. If we sort out those missiles it'll make things safer for us.
What is it about girls and space? Does it do something to your brains?
Yeah, that I don't want a picture of. Let's go.
Let's take a shot at the Ксенон.
Let's get those Yaki disruptor plans.
Yeah. Can you go over the details?
No, I still want to get the Black crystal.
No, let's sort those Yaki out.
Hmmm, you know, maybe we should go help Armanckessilon instead
Hmmm, you know, maybe we should go help Armanckessilon.
Yeah. Let's get the Паранід's crystal.
We can't count on that and it doesn't help us get in.
And in the land of the locked out, the two eyed Паранід is king. Let's go.
Then we'd better have some money ready for when he comes back.
Er, you wouldn't consider say some trading station gift tokens or an I.O.U. instead? (Nolman's comm switches off). I guess that's a no.
(cutting in at beloved) These guys have a script or what?
Oh great and magnificent Armanckessilon. I seek an audience with you to purchase the Blue Sculpt if you can spare the time for this humble being.
Miria, that ship that just appeared. Keep an eye on it.
That's what I want to find out.
Why was it here? That thing's following me.
You think we can control the Хаак now? They attacked us too!
That ship, the one that disappeared, it must be after the crystal.
Let's hope the crystal's in with the cargo.
The others they stole were part of a machine built by the ancients. You want to risk the Yaki getting hold of something like that?
Head back to the Гонер Temple.
They're the people who can put the pieces of this puzzle together. It was a rogue priest that stole the first two crystals with the Yaki.
I've changed my mind. Let's get the Паранід Crystal.
Let's take a shot at the Ксенон Crystal instead.
You want to stay here - you can.
Change of plan. Let's get those Yaki disruptor plans.
You're still living with your poppa and you want to give me relationship advice?
A friend of mine called them tinboats until we got into fight with them, that changed his mind. You know they're supposed to have come from Earth to build new worlds?
Don't know. Never spoken to him.
Yeah, let's have a look at the Ксенон.
No, let's go and pay the Паранід a visit.
It's my health I'm worried about, anything happens to you and the Don's promised to remove parts of me I'm pretty attached to.
Great, obviously the Ксенон holiday destination of choice. Let's hope they've signposted that M0 for the tourists.
And it said 'friendly welcome' in the tour guide. I just hope it's right about the M0 being here.
Okay, computer, let's scan for cargo containers. (Add beeps for computer) And let's hope they don't know who my father is, that'd probably make them really angry.
You'd think it was my birthday.
It's got to be here somewhere.
I'm complaining to Ксенон tourism, they don't signpost anything.
Come out come out where ever you are. Come out little crystal.
So much space, so much...time to realise you're talking to yourself.
All this effort, you think the Ксенон could've managed a decent gift shop.
Crystal? Check. Black? Check. Time to get the Bazani out of here? Check!
I've got scorch marks all over the ship and nearly had a hole in me, but no crystal.
Here goes. If at first you don't succeed...
If that's your pep talk, I don't want to hear your put downs.
Those little robots almost destroyed every living thing this side of the universe!
It's the proper way to do these things - last minute every time.
Wait here I'll meet you when I get back...
I'm going to ask you what to do. That's what the Don recommended.
I'm sure the Аргон authorities would be very...
(Pause) I'd be very grateful. (Pause, uncomfortable) Why? What did you have in mind?
Yeah, those missiles've caused enough trouble. We take out the Yaki's secret weapon then we're back in the game.
Yes, let's take these disruptors out of the game. (Into - 530201)
Well, I've got the computer components, so let's try your amazing super-secret plan.
Let's get those plans. Will Jesan still help us?
By pick up I'm thinking you just mean collect, right?
Let's take these disruptors out of the game.
10,000 credits worth of computer components it is then.
What are these components for? The Yaki need to upgrade to play the latest games or something?
This is a pirate sector, flying slowly is suspicious!
How close? (worried) And for how long?
Sure, travel slowly. Cos, the Yaki aren't going to find it suspicious when I give their space station a haircut! Here we go.
You do know we're being shot at?!
Oh yeah, someone's suspicious! At least if we stay close to the station they can't use their disruptor missiles.
They really don't like us doing this. Or are they just trying to kill you? That I could understand.
Okay, we just got popular again!
I'll message Ban, let him know we're coming. I want to see what he makes of these plans.
No, I'll have to try again.
For the missile plans, what was it you want me to get again?
I've got the components. Where should I put them?
What station was Jesan on again?
Then let's ask him. We know he wants the crystals but he doesn't know Ban's found a way to neutralise his disruptor missiles.
Right. If Thomus lets him know we're transporting the crystals, we can give him a nice little surprise.
They surrender and there'll be no more.
I can't believe I've met someone who talks more than you! You being around is actually going to be peaceful.
Okay, time to give the Yaki our surprise.
Looks like you lost your edge, boys. You going to come quietly?
Everyone ready? The decoy should be here any moment.
You get anything on that disappearing ship?
Pull a Bonnis from a hat, then blow up a Паранід trader?
I've seen the ship again, it tricked a Паранід into flying into an asteroid. If it is Daveed Zincfeld someone must've eloped with his assistant, cos he's sure in a bad mood. You think it is Sohnen?
Whatever it is, I don't think it's good news.
Keep the Yaki off that convoy!
Give it up Ion, you're outnumbered.
Not so helpless this time, hey?
He must be on that ship there.
Carefully, we need him alive, Saya.
Disengage your drive and prepare to transfer ships.
I understand you got innocent people killed, so you understand unless you're a good little priest you're going to be tasting space.
Signal Noah, tell him we have Ion aboard.
That's lucky, I've already got the Black Crystal, so that's one we don't need to look for.
Near the crystals and near Ion again.
Not just me. I have a guest.
It's you that's made the mistake, Ion. The planet you showed Thomus wasn't Earth.
Believe your own eyes, this is Earth.
Who told you it was Earth? Come on, Ion can't you see they were using you? Was it the Yaki? Was it the person in this ship?
We can't create jump events. It's fantasy!
What matters is stopping him from opening a gate to that planet!
But it's not Earth, who knows where that gate'll take us. And if he's prepared to kill...but then you'd understand that.
Only lead we've got though isn't it?
Then let's try one of my contacts.
You'd be amazed how much partying you can fit in between prison, Пірат and Armageddon. Set your course for the trading station in Імператорські Шахти.

Then they would have found the asteroid he crashed into. Want to explain why a lowerlife can dodge asteroids and a Паранід can't? I need access to Кола Жреця so I can build a mine, can you get me that?
I'm more worried about how much this is going to cost us.
Thanks for your support. You make me feel all warm inside.
We need to get that factory constructed for when they break through, oh and we'd better keep an eye out for our Sohnen friend.
Isn't there some place you'd rather be?
The great Nolmancketnun advised that that is to be expected and I bow to his wisdom.
Good work! Nolmancketnun will be pleased. It is to be transfered aboard my ship.
Sorry, Saya, that holiday will have to wait. I've already got the credits.
Want to get in line for your third eye? I've got the credits.
The feeling's mutual. Good news you're gonna get your holiday time. I'll meet you here when Nolman gets in touch.
I'll see you later. Try not to start any wars while I'm gone.
Holiday over Saya, I've got the credits we need.
Then you'll know that the energy waves it gives off cause mutations in a Паранід's reproductive organs. That's why a lowerlife has been asked to help you.
Yeah, let's get out of here before he asks for a check up.
I don't know. I'm not sure I want to find out what it does, but at least we've stopped Ion and Sargon.
If. Sargon told Ion what Ion wanted to hear. Who knows what's true, or where this thing would lead us. Do you want more of those ships suddenly turning up?
And what am I supposed to say? Hi, I know you've never met me, but I'm your son. Oh, and by the way, are you a traitor?
This is...this is Аргон Security Vessel 267 to Kyle Brennan. Stop your ship immediately.
(To himself) Where've I heard that before? (To Kyle) I have my orders. Stop your ship immediately and...
He should've stayed in his coma. Computer, scan that asteroid.
Great, that wreck almost got me killed first time round. (Deep breath) Okay, Computer, hold onto your hat. I'm taking us in.
Why did I get up this morning?
Let's not do this over an open comm..
You ever meet a Гонер Priest called Dogun?
There's a priest, Ion, who thought he'd found Earth. He got Dogun killed.
How much is it worth? Any of it?
Then what do we do? Surrender to the Хаак? Don't think they'd listen.
Are you saying we started it?...(Penny drops) The Nividium. Has the Nividium got something to do with the Хаак?
You think I don't know how that feels? I lost my past because of you, my friend because of the Хаак, and two Earth obsessives almost got me killed!
But what do they want it for? Nividium's not really used for anything.
Okay, let's find out what they're hiding.
But why such big attacks? And why on us?
Why are the Хаак so interested in it?
Hey, that was there when I got the ship, I just haven't had chance to clear out.
What are you doing poking around?
If you're that bored I can probably tap an adult vidfeed for you.
You know I could've asked, Miria, or Mi Ton or anyone else to operate this equipment for me.
You want to come or not?
Had things to do. Come on, let's go.
The great Nolmancketnun did not have time to prospect asteroids, so he sent me as his humble servant.
Got through a lot doing what?
Who knows? I thought it was just a metal.
Do you think they're hiding it because of the Хаак attacks? I mean once they started losing stations, it would make sense to move it.
I don't think this is a patrol!
If they've hidden it that means the Паранід knew the Хаак were targeting it! Nice of them to tell us. What's worth so much they let everyone keep suffering these attacks?
Armanckessilon's the Паранід Sargon killed, these guys obviously didn't get the message that - IT...WASN'T...ME!
And you navigate for Terracorp convoys?
You suggesting the Паранід've started a magic act?
Now you see it...looks like everybody's getting in on the disappearing act.
Yeah, but this isn't the only cloaking device we've seen is it?
I told you, I didn't kill Armanckessilon!
What's going on and where's Saya?
Of course I have! I arranged to buy a crystal from him, but after the Хаак attacked, he flew off - straight into an asteroid.

But what about the fact the Паранід were hiding their Nividium? They knew the Хаак wanted it. And you can't tell me there isn't a connection between a ship that can disappear and spacestation that can cloak itself!
This is transfer vessel 8 7 departing en route to Аргон.
If you know what's good for you, Ion, you'll keep that mouth shut.
They haven't. Ban's giving us a choice.
The jump drive's been disabled, if we don't get it online we're not going anywhere.
Make it quick, we've got Аргон security on intercept.
I'll use disruptors. I just hope they know we're on their side!
I'm going to try for a gate.
Oh, that's where I've been going wrong...
No hurry, it's only an escape attempt!
I told you to keep quiet.
I've already told you to stay quiet!
You don't keep quiet, Ion, I'll jettison you to slow them down.
Ban hinted that Don Tony Marani might help us.
Yeah? You wait 'til you meet his daughter!
Why did Ban tell me to come to you?
Ion. The man who wanted the crystal. The one that got your daughter kidnapped. Now, you say one more word, Ion and I'll hand you over to the Don.
Whatever they're up to, it isn't here. They're heading out in convoy.
Just tell us about the Seed.
What do I need to do?
Yeah, we'll have to wait for the next convoy.
Well, then let's not get caught.
And no one's going to Earth. Did Sargon say anything to you about the Паранід?
Yet they suddenly have similar technology and know about the Seed? What's this ship that's following us, Miria?
And we're too far away to see anything.
Let's get into that system. The sooner we get proof, the sooner I get my life back!
It's cloaked, but I've got it on my scanners. They must highlight it so patrol ships don't crash into it. We're going to have to disable the cloak.
Ban Danna said they take a lot of power. We knock out the power, we knock out the cloak.
Yeah, only you just told them who you are...
I'm picking up large amounts of Nividium. It's the gates! That's what they needed Nividium for!
You can make gates, but no one knows how to create a jump event. There's this seed crystal...but only one, so why do they want so many gates?
They're trying to manufacture a seed crystal. That's why they kept this secret, build lots of gates, open their own trade routes. They'll control the economy!
A lot of credits. I bet that's why they told Sargon to take a hike.
Remind me to punch the next Паранід I meet.
Wait! You don't know what the event will do to you.
You really think you can program that thing?
Think's not good enough, Ion. You'd better do it or we're all going straight to bazani in little pieces!
We're trying to help you, you baka!
Tell a Паранід something's fragile and they'll hit it with a hammer to check.
Yeah. I get you on the station or we're all dead.
And you said it was me that was always getting into trouble.
We're on your side you baka!
Am I pleased to see you.
Earth, we hope. He entered the event.
No chance of an apology and an account full of credits instead?
You know that major attack everyone thought the Хаак were massing for? I think it just started!
If the Хаак win they'll destroy everything.
Паранід baka ne. If only we could tell the Хаак that we'll stop mining.
You had to say quiet didn't you? You just had to say it!
We got the proof. Not that that will help if we're all dead!
You want to risk Sargon doing something with the wormhole?
One of Sargon's tricks. This is going to be difficult.
We need to get back and warn the others.
Considering I flew through a disintegrating spacestation in a collapsing wormhole and my spaceship blew up, I think I'm relatively okay thanks.
This is Julian Brennan calling Don Tony, I need to raise some credits, Miria said to come to you.
This is Julian Brennan, I'm looking for another job.
This is JB, do you have anything for me, Don Tony?
This is JB, looking for another credit run.
I'm looking for some credits can you help?
I need to raise some credits, any ideas?
I need some credits for the mission.
I'm trying to raise some credits, how can I do that?
Let's see what's in this one
How many more of these am I gonna have to pick up?
I guess I must've made them angry
Hey, you stop shooting I'll get out of here
I wish these fighters would get lost
You made a right mess of this M0
I'm glad this thing's out of commission
I'm glad this thing isn't operational
I'm writing to the publishers of this damn guide book

page.title: Junior Flight Officer COMM
page.t: (Panicking, an alarm starting) Хаак fleet sighted off the...port bow.

page.title: Gamma Flight Leader COMM
page.t: How can I help you, sir?
None of my business that, sir.
They need help, sir, they're just not used to it.
Concentrate your fire on one target.
Fly evasive, I'm on my way!
Gamma flight leader, reporting. We're waiting to the west of the north gate, sir.
Gamma flight, ready for patrol, sir.
Gamma flight. Head to West Gate and scan for hostiles. Commence Patrol.
Cut the chatter. Close and destroy.
Hold it together. Get yourself home then think about Loka.
I can't promise you much, but you will get chance to pay them back, you understand?
That's one that's not going home!
Check your fire! Check your fire!
I'm a friendly! I'm a friendly!
Use your targeters, lock and fire.
Do I look like your counsellor, Loka?
This isn't a picnic, Gamma flight, let's stow that chatter.
You let this get personal, Kiman and you'll get spaced.
Okay, keep 'em peeled. There's a lot of pirate activity round here.
Check your view, check your scanner. Stay sharp.
You saying old iron butt doesn't know what he's doing?
Good, because Ban Danna's the best hope for hauling your bastu through this in one piece.
Well done, Kiman. Glad to see you remember where your trigger is.
That's because Jamis can fly. You think they're going to waste decent ships on you, Loka?
Are you questioning fleet orders, Kiman?
That's right. The fleet is always right. And you love the fleet.
You're supposed to be impressing our guest, not embarrassing the fleet, Kiman!
I've seen farm boys fly better. You want to dust crops, or space Хаак?
You're hitting some serious simulator time when we get back, Loka!
You want to fly with Аргон's finest or are you going to keep flying like it's a hobby, Nia?!
Have you been through flight school? Keep it sharp, Kiman!
You want to stay a rookie? Sharpen up Loka!
That's no way to represent the fleet, Nia!
That's what I thought when I patrolled Аргон Prime yesterday then a Хаак M3 jumped in right behind us. Damp jump seats all round.
It's been an honour flying with you. Flight, rendezvous with the Renown.
We've still got a patrol to finish, Gamma flight, so form up and spot your course.
Okay, Gamma. Remember, it might look quiet, but that's normally when things turn to craz. I want a scan sweep to the centre of the sector then head to South Gate.
Okay, flight, let's get it together and continue to sector Cloudbase South-West.
I want a scan sweep to the centre of the sector, then head to South Gate.
Thanks for your help. It's been an honour to fly with you, sir. Rendezvousing with Renown.
It's an honour to fly with you, we've all heard what you did for Аргон.
Let's hope these rookies can be at least half as good as you.
(Ribbing)If we get this bunch of green babies through a combat mission then we'll stand a chance of rebuilding a fleet.
We'll beat the Хаак. We've been in danger before, we've come through.

page.title: Kiman COMM
page.t: I can't believe they got Loka ...
Yes, sir. For the fleet, sir.
I think he jams them himself. You seen how he looks at Neeka?
Is it true you were at Омікрон Ліри?
Why are the Хаак doing this?
Nothing to think about - it's time for payback.
Do we still have to keep safeties on out here?
The fleet is always right, sir.
Wants her to lubricate his jump-rod!

page.title: Loka COMM
page.t: I've got one on me! I've got one on me!
I've got Хаак ships coming in!
The thrusters are sticking again. Neeka says they're short of spares.
Can you believe they stuck us in these buckets? Jamis got one of those new M4's.

page.title: Nia COMM
page.t: I can see 7, he's on fire, he's on fire!
Hoping she'll give you a service, ey, Loka?
Can't believe we're getting posted out here.

page.title: Police2 COMM
page.t: All units close in, let's get this Baka!

page.title: Ore Mine Manager COMM
page.t: Спліт, wonders what that has to do with me?
(Hurried) Спліт say it's nothing to do with me. I told her not to fly through Прибуток Теладі. The Yaki have been boarding ships out there. It's not my fault, she wouldn't listen you know.
Спліт say they heard the Yaki have a pleasure complex out there.
Спліт not running it, Спліт just telling you!

page.title: Armanckessilon COMM
page.t: This is no way to trade, lowerlife. I will not forget this insult.
This insult has been reported to Паранід Прайм.
I have no time for the unclean.
Your questions do not concern me, lowerlife.
You sought an audience and I await your contact lower being. If you seek trade meet me by the Trading station immediately.
I, Armanckessilon, the great, beloved citizen and true follower of Pontifex Maximus Paranidia have pity for you, unholy creature.
I will grant you an audience for 200000 credits.
This insolent being is trying to attack me. Destroy it lower lifeform, or there will be no deal.
You try to trick Armanckessilon, lowerlife?! You hope they kill me so you could steal the crystal? Well, I live and you will regret this!
If lower life form still desires crystal, Armanckessilon will trade, but due to your stupidity, price is now 'x' credits.
You prove the deficiencies of your genepool. Meet me by the Trading station immediately. The price is now 'x' credits.
Just pay the credits and go, lowlife.
hundred thousand, fifty thousand, two hundred thousand, three hundred thousand, four hundred thousand, five hundred thousand, seven hundred and fifty thousand, a million.

page.title: Nolmancketnun COMM
page.t: I, Nolmancketnun, the great, beloved citizen and true follower of Pontifex Maximus Paranidia have pity for you, unholy creature.
For a lower life form, Maranase is worthy of notice.
Lowerlife cannot currently enter the central sectors, but I will take pity and deliver your message. Though I demand payment to cover my loss of honour.
thousand credits. And I do not negotiate with evolutionary dead ends.
Then we have nothing to talk of. You are dismissed from my presence.
Honour intact, I take your message. I will tell you Armanckessilon's command when I return.
Inferior lifebeing. Do you have the credits, or do you seek to waste more of my time?
I, Nolmancketnun, the great...oh, it's you lowerlife.
Helping you seems to get Паранід killed. They found the debris of Armanckessilon's ship.

Of course, lowerlife. But, Armanckessilon's death will not be forgotten, meaning the price of my honour is high. Oh, and lowerlife, you speak to me in such a dishonourable way again and your maker will meet you sooner than planned.

Lowerlife. I have made arrangements for your sorry carcass to be allowed access to our glorious space. The great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia has issued a licence for me to begin a mining operation. You are to be allowed access as an inferior consultant in matters too insignificant for my notice.
That is the next matter. I would not have gained permission for you with your name. The family of Armanckessilon would have objected. Instead, you are registered as Julie Kho.
I have the money I need to rejoin my family with honour. Never trouble me again, lowerlife.
Why do you disturb me so soon, lowerlife?
I will contact you soon with details. I look forward to ending our relationship.

page.title: Manckammis COMM
page.t: We received word of your arrival, lowerlife. You are fortunate that Nolmancketnun gives you leave to enter his installation.
We estimate one hour until breakthrough to the position Nolmancketnun stated, but we are detecting strange energy emissions.
The mining is proceeding on schedule, do not bother me, lowerlife.
We are not through to the co-ordinates yet, be on your way, unclean one.
We have reached the co-ordinates, extraction initiated, Nolmancketnun has been contacted.
It is not to be removed. What is that thing, lowerlife?
That will not be necessary. You had better transport it off station immediately.

page.title: Emanckolit COMM
page.t: For the death of a Holy one, we send judgement to the unclean.
We do not listen to lies.
For the death of one, feel the wrath of many.
You and your family will feel the wrath of Armanckessilon's clan until the end of time.
Your death will be little compensation.

page.title: Паранід Patrol COMM
page.t: By order of his magnificence the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia, all Паранід installations are closed to non-Paranids. Do Not Attempt to Dock. No Further Communication is desired.
Inferior being, we are tracking your ship and inform you that your presence in this sector is not wanted.
That mine is not in this sector.
Your clearance is invalid. An arrest warrant has been issued. Surrender your worthless carcass immediately.
Lower your shields and submit to Паранід justice, lowerlife.
Невідомий vessel, stop your engines and prepare for scan. (Pause)You are in violation of seventeen Паранід laws. Prepare to meet justice, unholy one.
We do not surrender to lowerlife.
Паранід control, come in Паранід control.
You will burn unholy one unless you let go.
Do not trifle with Паранід superiority.
Calling all patrol ships. Assistance needed!

page.title: Lihimes Eluleis Gebnduis III
page.t: Tell priest, he not bother Geb again. JB is much welcome to fly with Geb whenever he comes to Freedom's Reach. Priest on station in east nebula in Пояс Руди. I hope he rot there.

page.title: Lihimes Eluleis Gebnduis III COMM
page.t: Geb got other things to do, leave Geb alone.
Go polish your ship ready for the race I have profit to make.
Not even for my Egg Elder's credit details!
Don't talk of him. Owes much money.
What use price? I lose face, lose league race pilot cos of Beckitt. Useless mammal bag!
You win race, I tell you where useless mammal bag Beckitt is.
No. Very fair. No problems. No one died for weeks.
What use are you? Can't even find starting line! Next race 'one hour'. You come back. (alternate version - next race starting now!)
You missed course, stupid mammal bag. Next race 'one hour'. You be here. (alternate version - next race, fly course!)
Race ready to start. Come to Trading station, Freedom's Reach, or deal not complete.
You no win, me no tell you anything!
You not as useless as the rest of you milksuckers. You want race again, you tell Geb. Geb pay much money.
I send you co-ordinates. But think, smoothskin. You want money. You fly for Geb.
You no pilot. I see hatchlings fly better. You want information, you fly next race.
That terrible race. You want information, you fly like pilot in next race.
You want information, fly next race and win. Me give no information to losers.
Come back in one quarter hour.
Oh, you come back. You want to race for information now, smoothskin?
You fly good this time. No make Geb look bad.
You must win, or no deal. Me no pay for last. Me no pay for second.
Win, for Geb. You win, yes?
Smoothskins all so bad with time? Race not ready yet, come later.
You miss race, warmblood, you come back soon for next one, or you not learn what you want.
Race not now, try later. You not happy, no? Then you shouldn't have lost first race then? Yes?
You no fly that. You must fly my ship, or no deal.
You want more racing, smoothskin? Race ready, you win Geb money.
You fly, you win, Geb pay.
Race start now, you better fly good.
Smoothskin do good. Smoothskin pick race ship.
You want race, say what type, milksucker.
Geb give money. Come back, win more for Geb.
You fly, you win, Geb pay.
See Geb generous, take, come back, win more.
You fly, you lose, Geb not pay.
You want credits for nothing? I should charge you for fuel useless mammalbag.

page.title: Don Marani
page.t: The last I heard from my daughter, she was on the trading station in Гордість Турука. You try there first. You find her, I help you, yeah?
Okay, you want a list of the places my contacts found, you got it.

Some Паранід clown called Armanckessilon got the Blue Sculpt crystal you want, that mean you and the Yaki got big problems. This Armanckessilon's in Паранід Прайм and them no-carra Paranids got their central sectors shut tighter than a Теладі's moneybag. They got heavy cruisers blasting any non-Paranids that come in. I hope they shove the Yaki's thruster pipes up their Bastu, but you, you got to find a way to contact this Паранід baka.

The other crystal they after is the Black Crystal. Catchy. Last anyone heard it was on some Ксенон M0. Lucky for you it got fragged a few years ago in Меморіал Нопілео. The Ксенон towed it to Ксенонський Сектор 101. Them Yaki tried to get it, but got beat up bad. Whatever those slugtuggers want these crystals for, they want them a lot. I hope the Ксенон bury them all.

That Yaki disruptor factory, they got it in Olmancketslat's Treaty. They got a lot of firepower around it, and those disruptor missiles. You want their secret, you gonna need a clever way of getting to it. You ask Miria. She's good at being clever.
And you better look after her, she breaks a nail, you so much as breathe on her and you'll find it hard to fly with no joystick, you know what I mean.

page.title: Don Marani COMM
page.t: Try that again, you'll be eating plasma
They allow you to fly when you blind?
You taking something, or just stupid?
Yeah, I was right. You can be really dull.
Try heading to [insert destination] and get outta my face.
You got no brains? You're there.
Yeah, you owe Tony, remember that.
You want to think about that first (meaning no way!)
That's what I wanted to see!
I'm gonna take out a contract.
Now you wanna mess with a Marani?!
Let's see you out fly this!
You keep needin' help, I'm gonna start charging.
And I let you help my daughter?
Do that again and you'll need a straw for your food!
You're not as much of a lowcrawler as I thought.
You want the crystal? Sure I let you have it. My friends are bringing it to you right now.
You guys are good. You want a job, you got one, you want a deathwish then keep on going.
I'll find you, where ever you are, I'll find you!
You better not sleep with your eyes shut no more, cos I'm going find you and I'm going to rip you a new one.
You think you're a wise guy, huh?
You think you're a tough guy. Let's see how tough you are with a plasmabolt up your bastu.
Try talking tough with no oxygen.
You think you clever? You think I can't find out?
Hey, little woman, shouldn't you be at home with the husband?
I'm gonna take you I'm gonna feed your entrails to a Спліт rani, I'm going to gut you from one side to another, I'm going to...
What do I pay you guys for? Shoot them down.
Have I got pilots, or comedians?
You ain't getting nothing of mine.
I look like a charity shop? I'd fly this ship up my bastu before I give you anything.
You shoot my ship, you put up with my talk.
Take the stinkin' crystal. But know this, Don Tony's got you marked.
You messed with the wrong guy, Yaki! I told you I'd find you!
I look stupid to you? Eat this!
You fight like you got no carras!
You take my daughter you die!
This is for Miria, you slugtugging rephead!
You mess with Marani, you die by Marani hand.
If you hurt her, I'll feed you and your family to the fishes.
What? The Crystal not enough, you have to take my daughter too?
You're brave enough with a friend, let's see how tough you are on your own.
You don't getaway that easy, you lousy Yaki. You and me got business.
You think you a tough guy? You sentence a little girl to death and you tough, huh?

Listen, Yaki scum, maybe we can make a deal? You, I spit at you, I don't give a bowl full of craz for you, but my daughter, she never do nothing wrong. So, you take Don Marani and you let her go. You hear me?!

You don't have the Stone? That means they'll kill her! They kill my beautiful, little girl. And that's your fault you lousy rat, so you'd better help. You owe me. And you help me, I help you teach them a lesson for making you look a dimwad. The Don knows things about the Yaki.
Sure. You get my daughter, my beautiful little girl, I tell you all about them.
You might've saved my daughter, but if you laid one finger...
(Calm) One finger... My contacts they found the factory. They also find these Yaki scum want two more crystals. You stop them. You mess them up? That's good with me.
I just got you home, Miria.
You lay one finger. One finger....
We're not here for games, Miria. Follow us back to my station.
Where you going, space cadet? How far you think you going to get without our help?
You're just a business deal, so don't go getting no big ideas.
JB's the expert on stealing crystals.
You gonna trust him? He got a lot of my friends dead!
Then we attach a tracker. Get this thing once they get where they're going. I'd do it for you, (pointed) but my best man got killed.
Fly the drone in along the ship. You gotta land in the right place or they'll detect you.
Sure, (of) course. You know you get caught in Паранід space they've gonna use your insides for table decorations.
And you better look after that ship.
How you get to be so famous, when you such a dimwad? Get over here you carrasucking rephead.
Hey! Where you think you taking my ship?
Just get on with the mission you piece of Crazola!
What? He tried to steal my ship!
I got her. You know JB, you ain't too bad for a straight-laced fleetboy.
I help Miria you keep these Хаак off me.
You go rub yourself on a nova.
We keep these repsuckers off you, you go!
Try flying without a ship you dimwad Паранід!
You better move it or we've had it.
Come on you guys, nail these jzingers for crazsake!
You call yourselves Пірат. Fight! Fight!
First guy to get these guys, gets my gratitude.
But, I...yeah, thanks, JB. Take my advice don't have no daughters or you never get no peace. (grumbling microphone) And after I saved her hide, I dunno...
You don't find Miria, we got nothing to talk about.
You go find my daughter, or I fry your bastu!
Miria better be all right. Better than all right, or I scrape your eyes out with a spoon. But you need credits, you do this for Don Tony.
I'll help you cos it make Miria happy. You make Miria unhappy, you spend your life eating through a straw. Try this for credits.
You take care of my daughter, I take care of you, sending details.
You need credits? Don't everyone. You do this job, I pay.
So, you need the Don Tony? Okay, I got just the thing. Sending details.
You need a little money, I need a little help, here's the details.
Credits mean services. Here's what I want.
A little job for a little man, here you go.
You didn't finish the last job. I'm resending details.
Listen, you finish one thing then you do the next. Resending details.
I look like an employment service? I don't got nothing for you.
I got better things to do than talk to you right now. I'm not interested.
I take care of business myself. I got nothing for you.
The amount of heat you got on you, you come here? I don't deal with no dimwad craz that gets so well known to the law.
I look like your uncle? You want the job - do it. You don wan it then don't waste my time.
I don't have time for no babysitting, go look yourself.
(off vid) Hey, Miria, who is that?

page.title: Miria Marani COMM
page.t: Try that again and you'll eat your own sacs!
Now I know why you got no friends.
Yeah, cos I got nothing better to do than listen to you.
Not now, I got the box on. You seen Streets of Аргон lately? They so gotta get married.
You stupider than Yaki with a lobotomy. You there already, dimwad.
I look like a speak your destination machine?
Hey, you owe me. Maybe we can come up with some creative way for you to say thanks?
Yeah, now you better think of a good way to say thanks.
Hey, pick it up, JB? Or I come to the cockpit and fly there myself.
That's it you're letting me off at the next station!
And in what universe is that going to happen?
Winning's what I want. You a winner, JB?
Why you even try if that's your effort?
My little cousin could do better and she only four!
You better try again or I cut things off you myself!
It's a hot day in Bazani today!
Get your bastu back here, you piece of craz!
Now you see what a Marani can do!
Go back to playschool, now you're messing with a real woman!
You picked a good day to die...
Don't mess with a Mirani, dimwad!
Hope you like plasma for breakfast.
I catch you, you gonna lose something vital.
You think you picking on a freighter or something?
Now you really in deep craz.
Time to show these guys how to dance.
How come you always in trouble?
Try that again and you be flying without a ship.
You wanna get killed or something?
Thanks. You now in my good books.
We're taking too much damage, we've got to...
They've got a lock on me, I...
I'm a bit busy here, JB!!!
You'll need an upgrade to your lasers.
You're going to need better weaponry than that!
Those lasers wouldn't hurt a spacefly. Time for an upgrade.
I get some more missiles, JB, bigger ones.
Those toy missiles? You'll need an upgrade!
Those shields wouldn't protect you from a rainstorm.
Annoying as you can be, I'd like you around for a while longer. You're going to have to upgrade those shields.
You'd better get your ship repaired.
That hull's looking a bit secondhand, you'd better get it repaired.
There's a lot of damage, you'd better get that ship repaired.
You'll need repairs before you go anywhere.
No cargo space. Bad weaponry. Lots of damage. You need a new ship or a complete overhaul.
That ship's a mess, you need a complete upgrade.
That ship's had it, it'll need repairs and upgrades.
You're going to need a fighter for this.
You're going to need a bigger ship.
Ahhh, you get lonely again and need someone to talk to?
No way you're sending me to bazani!
It's about time someone taught you a lesson!
Time to get out of here, JB.
He didn't tell you? That's my poppa.
Who are you? Did my poppa send you?
JB? Is that the one who rescued us? Thank you, you saved my life.
My poppa. He will make sure everyone gets home.
My poppa's not like that. Besides, he does anything I ask him. And I'm very grateful to you. Especially you, Mr Pilot, I look forward to meeting you when we land.
We should get back to Легенда Фарнгама. You do want to get me home, don't you?
I want to help. I'll go with you, JB.
And these Yaki thought they could make a Marani a slave. I want to teach them a lesson. Besides, JB will look after me. Won't you, JB?
I get everyone home. I call you when I'm ready.
I meet you soon. I comm. when ready.
I no ready yet, I tell you when I am!
Hey, I got things to do to, you know. Sooner you stop bothering me, sooner I'm ready.
You that eager to see me, JB? You give me ten minutes.
I am ready, so you meet me at my poppa's place and we go hunt Yaki.
Hey, JB. I look like I enjoy hanging around? I'm at my poppa's, so get your sorry Bastu over here.
Saya has a lot to teach you about women. You know how long I been waiting?
Hey, you really know how to make a girl feel special. I send you information, but you better treat me better. I can help you in all sorts of ways, if I like you.
Hey, JB. Nice to see you eager to meet me. You always such a stalker?
So? Where we start? Or you gonna make me choose?
Better take it easy. They're madder than a bunch of hornets with their tails on fire.
Julian Brennan? That M0 was destroyed by Kyle Brennan? Saya, told me. Guess it's not just me who's gotta live with a famous poppa.
You saved my universe and all those girls.
But you wanna save a universe you better upgrade that piece of junk, (un)'less you wanna be space debris.
It's nice to know you thinking about me. You wanna tell me what you're thinking, or you wanna draw pictures?
I don't know, but I know you keep saying things like that I put your carras in a spice press.
You gonna upgrade that ship or just think about it, JB? The Ксенон will fry that secondhand spacehulk.
That ship should be good enough for the Ксенон. If you think you can handle them the way your poppa did.
Hey, JB, I thought you ask my poppa for information for a reason. Now, we gonna go, or you gonna sit there springcleaning your joystick?
(Ironic) I love a man of action. You better get yourself sorted sometime, JB.
Oh good, holiday time for JB. You better bring me a present.
And here I was thinking you were some kinda hero.
You keep me hanging around much longer, I'm gonna get real bored.
Hey, spacebrain, you come here to get into Паранід Прайм, or what?
You change your mind and want to go visit the Паранід instead?

Well, it's simple in a 'no way can you do it' sort of a way. You have to get to a Паранід in Паранід space, but they closed the borders. You can try talking to a border patrol at the 'east' gate, but Паранід are about as friendly as a squash mine.
Then we should be in Ксенонський Сектор 101.
Then we should be in Olmancketslat's Treaty.
Then let's go and meet my contact on the trading station in Імператорські Шахти.
Aren't you supposed to be raising the money?
Let's go see if Armanckessilon's still in Elena's Fortune. If there's one thing that'll keep a Паранід waiting it's credits.
You think? I mean, we really need that crystal and we only left Armanckessilon in a sector full of Хаак. No need to rush back there, really.
(Sarcastic) Let me think...Hey, I have an idea, maybe we go talk to my Паранід contact in Імператорські Шахти? You know? The one I suggest before?
Let's talk to my Паранід contact on the trading station. And bring your credits they're the universal language.
You got the money, you got the girl, well the Паранід. Now there's a picture I didn't want in my head.
Let's go to Elena's Fortune then.
Hey, I'm all for keeping Паранід waiting but they go sour faster than a first date in a sewerpit, so let's go see him. He's waiting near the trading station.
You think? I mean, we really need that crystal and he was getting on so friendly with the Хаак.
You not well known enough, you don't get a little more notorious, you don't get onboard. Help out a little and take out some Пірат then you can dock. Hey, just make sure they not Marani first.
Seems they no like you, you better get friendly with them, or you no able to dock.
There's one thing a Паранід like more than anything else and that's showing off his big gun.
At least we know the Yaki no have the crystal.

I got a contact on the trading station here. He's a Паранід with only two eyes, which in Паранід terms makes him as popular as gas in a spacesuit. This guy'll do anything to get the money for his third eye.
Well, that was a pathetic display of machismo, you want to get on now? We go to the Emperor Mine trading station.
You scared of Паранід or something? How come you're not going to see my contact?
From one two eyed creature to another, you still accept our money though, don't you Nolman?
We need to get a message to a Паранід called, Armanckessilon. He has a crystal we want to buy.

Hey, you turn up on a first date with no money, you not gonna get to dance and you try to blast your way into Паранід space, you bet Armanckessilon won't sell you the crystal. So, get your skinny hide out raising those credits.
You ever met a Паранід worth their own hype? Problem is if Nolman wants that much, Armanckessilon ain't gonna want pocket change.
Well, what you wait for? Get the credits and get to him!
What are you waiting for? Pocket money? You get flying, you get trading or we're not going to get anywhere.
You waiting on a lotto ticket or what? Let's get those credits, flyboy.
Play nice. You want the crystal from him remember? You can tell him he's an arrogant baka after you got it.
Hey, you good at kissing bastu. Any time you want to come over and kiss...
Clear those Хаак then we able to trade with that no carras Паранід.
And more. Looks like they having a party.
You got a fan club you not told me about?
Where are you going, JB? I thought you needed this crystal.
One crystal. Why do the Yaki want these things anyway?
I wouldn't trust a Yaki with a blunt spoon. Let's get the rest of this stuff and stop them. Which one you wanna get next?
Two down, one to go, JB. Let's find out what those damned Yaki got hidden.
Two down, one to go, JB. Let's stick it to the Yaki and get that other crystal.
Well that's everything. What are you going to do now, JB?
My poppa's been messaging me every three sezuras, I better go see him. We make a good team. You come see me and next time, maybe we make the teamwork a bit more personal. Kouun stopping the Yaki, JB.
He's on the trading station in this sector.
He's on the trading station in Імператорські Шахти.
You sure? You don't wanna just go look at them then change your mind again?
Saya say you haven't got a girlfriend, that cos you can't make your mind up and you no ask anyone out?
I did the Ксенон in school. Only seen a couple of them.
Ксенон came from Earth? Then why so many people wanna go there? Hey, your poppa's from there, yeah? What's he like?
You change your mind and want to do the Black crystal first?
Then we should be in Імператорські Шахти.
Okay.(This now links into the complete Ксенон Mission briefing from D.5.0.05)
Nice of you to care about my health, but I don't wait for nobody.
I wait, but only if it is because you wish it, not my poppa.
Ha! You really think I do it just cos you say? I stay so someone can save your sorry Bastu when you get in trouble.
You gotta get it some time. You gonna upgrade your ship, or try again?
Don't tell me you're giving up. I thought you were a real man. You gonna upgrade your ship, or try again?
I come with you. Looking at that crate you got, I think ship salesmen see you coming and rub their hands.
You screwed up somewhere. Now get your Bastu in there and don't come back without that crystal!
Are you as good as your poppa, or are you gonna run away like a little mouse?
You wanna get beat by some little robots?
About time. You in a hurry to stop the Yaki, or you planning to take the rest of this jazura?
Where you going? I haven't told you what you need to do!
So, flyboy, what you going to do now? You try and get to that station, you're spacedust. Bring a fleet, blow the station up, you don't learn about those fancy weapons. So? Any bright ideas?
(Put out) Did he? (new plan) And how grateful would you be if I could give you a solution?
I didn't ask about the Аргон authorities.
Nothing. It was just good to see you squirm. Get me 10,000 credits of computer components and meet me in Зрада Бала Гі.
That's one word I never hear, now get going!
You change your mind and want to go for those disruptor missiles?
He'll still help me. Let's get back to him.
Then let's talk to my friend on the Quantum Tube Fab in Зрада Бала Гі.
Let's talk to my friend on the Quantum Tube Fab.
As long as you aren't our secret weapon, cos then even I'm putting money on the Yaki.
You wanna look round and see which one of us has a bright idea? Cos I don't see no light filament appearing above your head.
Let's push those thrusters and head to Olmancketslat's Treaty then.
The plan? I'll tell you that when you remember to get hold of those computer components. About 10,000 credits worth.
You want to find out more about me, you got to find the courage to ask.
There's a computer expert in Зрада Бала Гі. He done some work for us in the past.
Let's just say I hope you didn't have savings in the PXK bank.
He'll help me. He's on the Quantum Tube Fab, let's dock there.
Can't you find your way round a system? I'm on the Quantum Tube Fab. You'll find it listed under the confusing name - Quantum Tube Fab.
Hi, Jesan. Meet my friend, JB.
It's a flying visit. We need help to get some weapons plans off a space station. We brought you some computer components as a little thank you.
(Flirting) Of course...(Straight) JB will fly you.
Don't worry, you boys will get on just fine.
I'll meet you here when you're done. Jesan, you might want to remind JB to check the stuff my poppa sent him. He can get a bit lost sometimes.
That was a real no carras move back there, JB, you want to do this or no?
Soon, soon. We got some other business to see too now. Oh, and Jesan, that stuff under your bed...I hope your mama never finds out about it. Come on JB.
Yeah, but he made sure you had a suit. You take me somewhere I don wanna go you gonna get transported somewhere without your head, and that's if you get lucky.
I thought you were taking those plans to Ban Danna? I've never seen Аргон One. Shimatta, it's been a long time since I saw Аргон Prime. We have a few difficulties with the authorities.
Okay, we'll see you later, Jesan.
So, what do you want to do now?
Now play fair, both of you.
This time I say it real slow so you can understand. Computer components worth 10,000 credits. That okay, or you want me to write it on your head in BIG letters?
If it didn't mean I have to wash them I'd put them straight up your bastu, to see if that help you remember. We go to the Quantum Tube Fab in Зрада Бала Гі. Okay?

Can you move nearer the comm, I wanna see if your mama had to tattoo your name on your forehead for you. He's on the Quantum Tube Fab in Зрада Бала Гі! You better get it together before you try and visit those Yaki again.
You still got those components I asked you to get?
Then you better get some more and meet me back here you spacebrain.
Afraid I'll tempt some spacehappy fleetboys into a life of piracy?
We still gotta go pay those Ксенон a visit. You ready for that?
We still gotta go get the crystal from those happy Паранід.
You wanna check your ship see if you got the rest of the things as well?
Pity, we could've found some other way to spend the time. So, which one you wanna get now?
You're a man who takes his time. (Flirty) You take your time over everything?
Looks like you've lost your pursuers.
Poppa's decided to go straight. He talked to Ban Danna, and he said he help us if we help you.
You'll hand him over to me! Until then...we've sorted out fake ID for you, so where we headed?
I transfer back to my ship.
You gotta dodge those sensors, JB
Good flying, they just see a blip and think it's space debris.
Like candy from the baby, yes?
They got it. Deploying another one.
You shoulda met Alfredo, he was much better.
Alfredo would be laughing right now. Sending in another drone.
You supposed to be landing the drone, yes? No getting it shot.
The drone's taking too much damage!
Next shot and you've had it!
You trying to get the drone destroyed?
Don't let it get shot no more!
Typical man! Couldn't find the spot even when it was painted!
They scanning us, you better move!
We sit back and follow them now.
You getting too close, JB, we got a tracker on there so you no have to fly that close!
Well, we miss that one. Let's get back to the gate before the next one comes through.
Over here, dimwad. You no find gate, no wonder you can't land the drone.
That look like a gate to you? Get over here!
I think you hit the Seed.
I'm checking. Got them, they're in Heretic's End.
It's a good job you stop being a pirate. You lousy at it.
It's a good job they got a lot of ships.
They Paranids, who knows if they know?!
You gonna need a ship with a jump drive, we can't go gate to gate. We can pick one up at our base.
JB, you take this ship. Ion and Kyle, you go with Al.
Expensive. Now let's get to Володіння Герцогу.
Nice steal, but it's not what we need.
