This should be far enough out for their system sensors not to pick us up.
You want we fly into the middle of the system and say hi? We wait and a ship will come.

Standard rule of military tactics, always send patrols to faraway lonely places where they can be ambushed. We capture the ship then use its ID to get into the system. That little ship we picked up that stops them telling anyone what we're doing.
Everyone think being a pirate is such an exciting life. Most of it you sit on your bastu waiting. You get good at solitaire. You ever wanna play me at solitaire, I beat your bastu.
Okay, JB, go catch our fish. You got ten kilometres before he gets out of our jamming range.
Keep hitting him, take his shields out.
It's one little patrol ship, JB!
Eight kilometres. You better pick it up before he gets out of jamming range.
He getaway, we gonna have the whole Паранід fleet on our head!
You get caught this for nothing, you bastu!
Okay, now, quick, we head out to the system rim.
So we don't get seen and we don't die, that make sense?
You going the wrong way, you baka.
Okay, the rest of you guys, jump this system and we call you when we need you.
You got a life? When did that happen?
You think we risked everything so you could go sightseeing?
You wanna get your life back then you have to get your bastu back in that system.
This installation so big it goes into a different system, or you get lost again?
He's calling for help. We gotta jump out of here, or the whole Паранід Fleet will be on us.
Let's just put that down as you distracting the fleet, hey, JB and let's go again.
Okay, same play, we wait for a ship. You shoot his shields down, you steal the ship.
You gotta hit those shields, make him think he's gonna be destroyed, then he'll ditch the ship, yeah?
You trying to train the Паранід Fleet? Steal the ship, JB!
Okay, I'm running low on power, let's jump back to Легенда Фарнгама, take a break and come back again.
This installation invisible or something? Cos I see nothing.
How do you find a cloaking device?
Try the Hornets, those are the best for hitting stations.
I think they just realise we not Paranids. (We see some Паранід ships coming in on an intercept) You fly, I shoot.
Well, I'm sorry, who made you an Argonopedia? (more firing) Call yourself a Паранід?!
You wanna use those three eyes, well then dodge this! (more firing)
You shooting those power things, or just taking pictures?
Ha ha! What you think of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia now, ey?
You wanna keep a secret Паранід? You want a secret you go to a Marani!
Only...I could be lying! Take this from the Yaki!
Come on, JB, get rid of that cloak!
Power down 50%. You hit another two and the cloak will be gone!
You wanna shoot it or kiss it? Fire, JB!
Hit one more power thing and it's gone! We see your secrets now Паранід!
You hit those power things, I take care of these rectemites.
Keep shooting the station, these guys are mine.
You wanna do this before we run out of shields and die, JB?
I thought no one knew how the gates worked.
There's a convoy forming, they on the move.
They're heading for the North gate. We can jump sectors and get ahead of them. I'll call the others.
The tracker got them Паранід out on West side.
Since when did that stop a Паранід?
We've got more problems than that.
You better hurry, JB, it's looking bad out here.
We got a gateship, powering up.
That thing's interfering with the gate. We don't get this sorted we'll be trapped here.
This thing flies like a pregnant mosscow.
Any chance you could hit them before next jazura?!
I'd stand more chance being rescued by a Yaki!
There are too many of them. We're Bonnismeat.
When are these Паранід gonna notice we on their side?!
Concentrate on the Хаак you baka ne!
I always say Паранід were born with their head up their bastu.
This is not looking so good.
Poppa, you say thank you, properly!
It look like you get here just in time.
Bit late for that right now.
You stop being a pirate and suddenly everyone want to kill you.
They've gone suicidal! Hey! You want to crash, go play with an asteroid!
Hey? JB where are you? You gonna keep me waiting again? Get your bastu down here so we can go to the party.
JB, I knew you'd come see me.
It's for me poppa, so keep you nose out! I got something you can do for me, JB.
I knew you'd want to make me happy. I got a job that will make me very happy.
I can't talk right now, Poppa's listening. You better go.
You figure that out yourself, JB. I'm paying you to do the job, go do it.
That's for me to know and you to find out, bye, JB
You get that crystal, I give you an extra prize.
Yeah. I won't frag your useless Bastu.
You ask me if I got a sister, I take your eyes out with a spoon.
You could trade, or race, or my father might have some work you could do. Just get off your bastu and do something!
I'm so glad I came to help.
You really have to work on your charm you know.
They craz sucking lowcrawlers. Lousy cheating pirate wasters. They no worth the breath to say their stinkin' name.
Several million credits to some collectors.
Hey, you know how many people take the pizola out of programmers? You get shot at, he plays games and eats pizza all day, which one sounds like the idiot now?
Only the things they found out about and that isn't close to what he's done. One day he'll stop being a crime boss. Then he'll be a real nightmare. Bazani, I gotta get my own place!
I got a list. Why you want to be on it?

A two eyed Паранід. Won't tell me how he lost the other eye, but he'll do anything for the credits to get it back. And when I say anything, I don't want you getting the wrong idea. That sort of picture in your head will get you in trouble.

page.title: Jesan COMM
page.t: Okay, okay, let's get this clear. I got other things to do than talk to rectemites like you.
Try checking your gravidar, dimwad, we've got company!
You keep flying this badly, we're history.
Great you just about got us killed...
(Dismissive) Hi. (Excited again) So, how long you here for, Miria?

You know it's not computer components I'm interested in. Hey, the plans'll be easy. We'll have to go in my ship though; it's the only one with the right equipment. And, er, (hopeful) I'll need a pilot.
Okay, okay, I thought this pirate station was in Olmancketslat's Treaty, right?
Okay, okay you need a map? This sure isn't Olmancketslat's Treaty.
Okay, okay. Enjoy the view on your own time. Get back on course, or I'm chucking you overboard.
You really want to see more of space? Okay...let me help you see it real close up. (Jesan then spaces the player)
I'll say hi to Miria for you Chickeeboy.
Surprised you came back, I've seen Bonnis with more guts.
Okay, okay. Scanning factory. Take it slow, don't look suspicious.
(Ignoring him and scanning) Okay...okay...they're shielded, but you see that channel I've marked? We get close to that we can run a scan.
I'm going to need at least 60 seconds and don't go faster that 120 m/s or I won't be able to hold the lock.
This ship gets damaged, you get damaged, okay?
You wearing a blindfold up there?
This is my ship. Remember that, or you're floating home.
I've lost it. Wish Miria could see what a dimwad you are.
Okay, okay, I thought you said you were a pilot.
Lost it again. No faster than 120m/s for sixty seconds, Dimwad!
If Miria was flying, we'd've done it by now! Do it again.
Space is this big and still you hit something?
Just follow the markers, okay, space monkey?
Okay, okay, sixty seconds at 120, follow the markers.
Hey, I don't mind telling Miria that you couldn't do one simple thing. Fly the channel and try not to crash.
It's hard to concentrate with that laser tower shooting at us.
Okay, okay, any chance you could stop getting my ship shot up?
Okay, okay, just follow the markers.
Okay, okay, just follow the groove.
I got a stream. Hold it for sixty seconds.
I've got it! Get us out of here and back to my station.
You're a better pilot. This guy should be flying passenger routes.
When will I see you again?
Let's stick to the mission? It's Miria I'm doing a favour for, so get back on track.
I'm only doing this for Miria, and I won't think twice about spacing you and explaining the accident.
Okay, my base is Зрада Бала Гі. You were there, remember?
You want me to draw you a map to Зрада Бала Гі? I've got some crayons somewhere.
Okay, okay, look, much as I like your company, I'd rather get back to Miria.
I'll look forward to it. Particularly more time with Mr 'can't follow instructions' here. He's bags of fun.
Miria! Oh, you brought company again.
If I'd really wanted your sweaty bastu on my ship I'd've bought some air fresheners and sent you an invite. Let's get home and you can get lost on your own time.
Bad enough you're hanging around Miria let alone my ship. Turn this baby around, point it at home and get out of my life.
You might have nothing better to do, but I've got a girl I want to get back to. Ejector activated....

page.title: Race Official COMM
page.t: Now that's what I call racing!
And the Rookie takes the lead.
Ooooh! I hope his mama's not watching!
It's gonna take more than a spanner to fix that!
He's that close I think he's trying to steal his thrusters caps.
They're getting all touchy feely out there!
There's one for the crash vids!
There's no love lost between those two. No, only thing that gets lost is paintwork.
Welcome racer. Do you have your...('x' ...credit deposit)
Which League are you racing in?
That's not an appropriate race ship return when you have the right equipment.
You're not racing that. Come back in a proper ship.
This is a four lap race.
This is a three lap race.
This is a five lap race.
The next race is in one hour.

page.title: Race Pilot 1 COMM
page.t: (In the way) This is my profit!!
(In the way) Get out of the way, milksucker!
(Insults, dominating) You couldn't earn profit in a bankraid!
(Insults, losing) I need profit, I neeeeed profit?
(Collision) You know how much that cost, mammalbag?

page.title: Race Pilot 2 COMM
page.t: (In the way)Get out of my way!
(Insults, dominating)You some sort of amateur or what?
(Insults, dominating)You might as well go home!
(Insults, dominating)Get that heap out of my way!
(Insults, dominating)I'm off, you're staying where you are.

page.title: Race Pilot 3 COMM
page.t: (In the way) You want to put an engine in that bucket!
(Overtaking) Hope you like my bastu, cos that's all you're gonna see.
(Insults, dominating)Leave the racing to the experts!
(Insults, dominating)Those credits have my name on them, slugtugger!
(Insults, dominating)You racing, or driving your mama?
(Insults, dominating)You might as well go home.
(Insults, dominating)Welcome to your life as a llll-oser.
(Insults, losing)I still slept with your sister!
(Collision)Touch me again and I'll take you out!
(Player goes off-track) My will's in my locker!

page.title: Race Pilot 4 COMM
page.t: (In the way) This is my profit!!
(In the way) Get out of the way, milksucker!
(Insults, dominating) You couldn't earn profit in a bankraid!
(Insults, losing) I need profit, I neeeeed profit?
(Collision) You know how much that cost, mammalbag?

page.title: Race Pilot 5 COMM
page.t: (In the way)Make way for a superior one!
(Insults, dominating)You cannot race in two dimensions!
(Insults, dominating)Take yourself out of my sight
(Collision)Urgh, I'll have to disinfect my ship now!

page.title: Race Pilot 6 COMM
page.t: (Insults, dominating)I suggest you try another hobby
(Insults, losing)I do believe I am losing.

page.title: Race Pilot 7 COMM
page.t: (In the way)Make way for a superior one!
(Insults, dominating)You cannot race in two dimensions!
(Insults, dominating)Take yourself out of my sight!
(Insults, dominating)Go to the back of the genepool.
(Collision)Urgh, I'll have to disinfect my ship now!

page.title: Saya Kho
page.t: Пірат 0 Saya Kho 1. I'd call that a job well done.
He's been like this for months.
My mother likes me to look in when she can't. She thinks a lot of him.
Yes. He was given it to remind him of home.

We need to head for Імператорські Шахти, I think that's the best place to start, I'll give you more information once we get there. I've had a look at this equipment...they must be stretched at Аргон command - it's ancient! We're going to have to get close to whatever we scan to get any readings.
Here you are. They're looking for you.

The hero of Heretics End? Confirmed recipient of the senate ribbon? Voted best looking bastu in Аргон Women's weekly? I think not. There's a big party waiting for you. Senator McCarthy organised it herself. (Beat) He'll be back you know. As soon as he's finished talking to Earth.

Ban hasn't forgotten. He thinks we can find a way to communicate with the Хаак and stop this properly and we've got people analysing Sargon's projector to see what we can find out. But in the meantime, everyone gets to live in peace that bit longer because of you.
Glad you remembered. Thought you might've got too important to talk to us.

page.title: Noah Gaffelt
page.t: This is where Thomus was last. He is, well, he is rather a recluse. However, there is a friend of Thomus's on the Trading Station we'll have to talk to him to find out where Thomus is.

Ion says that the Seed can be found inside an asteroid in Кола Жреця . However, as the Паранід borders are still closed, only Паранід can build mines there. You'll have to find a way to persuade someone to help you.

Once you have, you will need to build a super-factory, the details of which are attached to this message. All the information we have about the seed is that it is some sort of high energy vortex. A vortex powerful enough to tear a hole in space, so be cautious!

Ion has given this information very easily and we know nothing of this creature who he claims tricked him, so be wary, Julian. I feel in my heart that this Sargon cannot be Sohnen, they were peaceful and there are no reports of them manipulating other races. May you tread the path of wisdom with your eyes open.
Once you have, you will need to build a superfactory. The components would be...

page.title: Ion Battler
page.t: Good, good. We must retrieve the crystal...
Can you think of anyone better...?
My name is Ion (pronounced eon). Noah asked me to find you.
Yes, yes, that was most regrettable ...Your friend Saya is here with your ship, so as soon as you are well you may find the person who did this.

The police say that a pirate called Don Tony Marani took the stone. His ship - the Talon - is docked in Легенда Фарнгама for repairs. It has a jump drive but we have given Saya Khosama a jump scanner, so if he refuses to surrender the crystal you can follow him. When you have the crystal I will meet you. May peace find and comfort you.
You're making a big mistake, Noah. You should let me go.
I wouldn't expect you to believe. You wouldn't even believe your father.
And you expect me to believe that?
Earth would change all our lives.

He said he knows how to, he understood the projector! (Grasping a chance for redemption) But he still needs something. A seed, that's what makes the jump events. He found one the ancients left in some sort of installation. I meant no harm, Noah, you must believe that. It was Earth!

He said his name was Sargon. A Sohnen. He told me how the projector worked and that the other crystals would programme the jump event. That it would take us there - to Earth. You have to see, Noah, all these years!
The machine is programmed to send the event to Sargon's world. I have no reference to change the co-ordinates.
It will take me several minutes to programme it.

page.title: Narrator
page.t: As the five races lived in their fragile peace, they faced a new threat. Faceless, Невідомий and devastating, the Хаак swept through all those who stood in their way.
And while a desperate battle at Омікрон Ліри stopped them, it was at a heavy price. The Аргон fleet was almost destroyed.
Kyle Brennan, a man from the fabled and long lost Earth, the only man who knows why the Хаак attacked, lies in a coma. The secret locked within him.
Now, in a world turned upside down, the Хаак mount hit and run raids...
And something else is stirring. Quick to take advantage of the chaos.
So, as the universe crumbles, the fate of millions...
And in the hands of just one person...

page.title: Reporter
page.t: ...extensive casualties suffered across both space and planetary installations. We haven't got accurate figures yet, but, with fire still sweeping through a number of affected areas, those figures are just going to keep getting higher.

page.title: Information Station
page.t: You may repair any ships you own at a shipyard or wharf, select your ship from the trade menu and press the right arrow to repair the hull. The repairs will be marked at a percentage level allowing you to make partial repairs if you do not have enough credits to initiate a complete repair cycle. You may also repair your ships at your own HQ, assuming you have one.

There are several means of equipping large ships. Familiarize yourself with the operation of the Transporter Device offered at the Гонер Temple. You can dock the ship at a Shipyard and after escaping from the initial trade screen, will see a secondary trade screen that offers ship equipment. Or you can drop the equipment out of the cargo bay of one ship and pick it up in another just like any other cargo.
Shipyards sells a combination of factories and combat or transportation craft. Wharfs only deal in the repair and sale of ships.

You can buy police licenses from trading stations across the universe. Some special stations may also sell them. As to why you need them, well you don't actually need to buy yourself one except for the receipt of bounty payments from helping to defend a sector against Пірат and other enemies. Obviously this license only extends as far as the race that owns the sector. Pirate sectors are lawless and dangerous places. There is no-one there who would honour a police licence. Best not advertise you hold one to all and sundry when you are in a Pirate sector!
These may well be the Markus Spacefly. They are known to live in space and are attracted to the energy fields created by ships and weapons. For many jazuras the Спліт have used them as fuel.

Jumpdrives are specialised pieces of equipment that require a minimum of an M4 class ship, and energy cells to power the devices core. Once installed, ensure you have enough energy onboard for the journey you wish to take, - bear in mind that different sized ships will require different amounts of energy to make the jump. Once you have enough energy, target the sector you wish to jump to. You will see all sectors within range with your current energy load as being highlighted. Once you have selected the sector, you will be able to choose which gate you wish to arrive at. Having selected the gate, your ship will automatically initiate the countdown procedure and engage your jumpdrive once the core is fully powered.

Transporter Devices work only within a limited range. Ideally your target ship should be within 4km of your vessel. It must also be in your control. Once within range, open your ships console up and select the target, then select Transporter Device. This will beam you from your own cockpit, to the cockpit of the target ship. Bear in mind that if the target ship does not have a transporter device installed, you will either need to take a walk in space, or have both ships dock at a station in order for you to return to your original vessel.

M6 vessels are somewhat unique in that there are a limited number of stations with which they can dock, for example, equipment docks, shipyards and wharfs, as well as your Player HQ, should you have one.

This button does all sorts, depending on what you have targeted. Selecting a station and pressing it will have your ship automatically dock at that station, selecting a ship and pressing it will have you follow that ship, and selecting a jumpgate and pressing it will send you through that jumpgate. It should also be noted that you will be able to engage your SETA whilst in autopilot unless you are scanned, which greatly speeds up going through jump gates and docking.

They are goods outlawed by some races such as spaceflies, spacefuel, spaceweed, swamp plant, slaves and squash mines. They have been outlawed for a number of reasons, from war conventions to preservation of endangered species.

Slaves are outlawed everywhere. Other goods depend on the race. Look through your sector map for any factories that are set at some distance from the main sector coordinates. Some of these may produce goods considered illegal to other races.

If you are scanned and do not eject the goods in time, Sector Authority will take action. First they will ask you to eject the illegal cargo. If you refuse they will fire on your ship and call for additional support.
You can a) mine ore or silicon with a Mobile Drilling System or b) you can just build a mine on an asteroid.
Apart from a Mineral Scanner and a ship that has the ability to use a Mobile Drilling System, you need an Ore Collector, XL cargo capacity and of course the Mobile Drilling System itself.

The Теладі Vulture and Паранід Demeter can both be equipped with the Drilling System and both ships can carry XL cargo. You may also be able to use a TL for this purpose, however due to their size, manoeuvres may understandably be more complicated.
The Ore Collector can be bought at Теладі and Паранід equipment docks. The Mobile Drilling System can be bought at all Аргон, Паранід and Теладі Equipment Docks.

You need to fly within a few hundred metres of an asteroid and shoot it with the Mobile Drilling System until it breaks apart. Then you can collect the fragments with the ship, providing a Ore collector is installed on it.
Ore is needed to produce weapons, shields and Quantum Tubes amongst other things.

Silicon is required for the production of missiles, shields, crystals and satellites. Generally all high tech wares that have some level of artificial intelligence built into them will require some amount of silicon for their manufacture.

A very small number of Теладі Trading Stations stock it and a small number Паранід Space Jewelleries use it for Majaglit production. You may find other stations that deal with the protection of endangered species also require nividium for purposes which we cannot disclose here.
Minerals can only be found on asteroids. The only way to find out what an asteroid contains is to scan it with a Mineral Scanner. The Mineral Scanner also determines the asteroid's yield.
Asteroids can be found in many sectors. The sector with a high number of asteroids in Аргон territory is Пояс Руди. There are of course other sectors where asteroids are equally prolific.
The Mineral Scanner can be bought in all Аргон Equipment Docks.

The methods used to extract ore and silicon differ markedly. For best results make sure you place an ore mine on an asteroid containing ore, and of course a silicon mine on an asteroid containing silicon.
Unfortunately no, we do not currently have the technology to mine Nividium directly. But you can use the Mobile Drilling System, or a Hornet missile.

The idea is simple: Buy Low, Sell High. Search for something that is being sold at a lower price than normal and buy it. Then go and find a station that is offering a better price than you paid. The greater the difference, the greater the profit! It will help you if you learn how much the different wares cost, and how cheap they can be, as well as how expensive.

Trade the wares you can carry, and extend your ship's cargo hold and add Engine Tunings as you go - but be careful! Don't buy a Cargo Hold Extension with the Credits you need for your next load of cargo! Later on you can buy a bigger ship and trade in your old one to pay for your next load of cargo.

I recommend you visit the Теладі and buy their Best Buys Locator and Best Selling Price Locator upgrades. These will access the trade menu list of all the stations in your current sector and tell you which ones offer the best deals.

Place a Navigation Relay Satellite in any promising sector. Then, if you want to check the prices in that sector, bring up the Navsat's Info screen and activate the Best Buys and Best Selling Price Locators. They will interface with the Navsat's comms system and report the best deals.

The best way to find good trade runs is to go out there and explore. Find one sector where stations are competing to sell the same ware, and another sector where stations are fighting to buy it. That, is a very good trade run. And if you make profit on the way back, then you have a very good run!

It is indeed! Trading Stations buy and sell wares at guaranteed prices which can be very helpful. But even better are the Merchants who visit Trading Stations. They have some of the best trading deals you can find; and will buy, sell, or exchange wares. But be careful, not all of them are honest!

Many traders make their money by using Sector Traders and Galaxy Traders. You provide a fully equipped transport ship, capital, and the right trading software, and the pilot will trade for you. Give them time, and they can become extremely experienced.

A TS-class ship with a fully-extended cargo hold and the Trade Command Software Mark 3, which you can buy from the Теладі. I advise you to fit it with good shields as it is an expensive investment that you don't want to lose too easily.

You need a Sector Trader ship with a pilot that has an experience level of at least 8. Galaxy Traders live a dangerous life, so look after them - they demand a ship with at least 25MJ of shielding, plus Fight Command Software Mark 1 and Mark 2. It is also a good idea to provide a Jump Drive so they can jump out of trouble should enemies attack!

Not at all! But it may save you money in the long run as the pilots almost always buy one for themselves when they reach Experience Level 12, and that costs more than if you provide it in the first place.

You can order any ship you own to go to any station you wish to trade with. But to use it to trade remotely, you must fit your ship with the Trading System Extension. Then, once your other ship has arrived at its destination you can access its Information screen and Trade with the station it is docked at.

Inside and outside, you get a comm. list. The people who are available and willing to talk appear on this list. Just click their name and they'll answer if they want to. You do have to be close to stations if you're not docked though.
Check your mission log. It's all written in there.

Building an HQ is an important decision. You will only have one, and the location you put it in will be the center of all your action in the future. What is best really depends on your plans for the future. Are you more interested in the strategic benefits that the HQ can bring or is the repair capability the most important? Wherever you put it make sure you will be able to protect it in the future!

Well many recommend the use of plasma weapons whenever possible. Sure they get you a lot of bang for the buck, but personally I would recommend looking into some alternatives too. As a pilot not bound to the restrictions of the Аргон armed forces, you could for example have a closer look at wide area lasers. They are perfect to use against Хаак clusters when they've just jumped in. You shoot at the whole damn cluster at once and don't have to hit every single one of them. Be careful however when you have wingmen as this weapon can easily lead to friendly fire, or unfriendly fire! A perfect combination of course is to afford both: Plasma as big as you can get and a wide area weapon both together

Check the markets. The times are rough and in times of war and chaos, markets can often offer interesting chances. I have heard of saboteurs ruining factories and driving the prices up for their own good, not that someone like you would do that.

Its impossible to tell you one particular factory that will make you the most money. It depends on how much money you have to spend and what the current market situation is. Of course you have to look at the market and the local specialities. For a start it isn't wrong to go for the cheaper factory types. Run a powerplant or maybe a mine before you go up to the bigger stations. You should decide early if you want to continue to run factories as a single money maker or maybe want to build a bigger installation where goods of one of your own stations are the resources for another. In the latter case the local specialities become less important as you can be completely independent from the rest of the market. For such installations also consider combining factories into a complex. The recently developed linking tubes are a perfect way to save money to spend on ships and transportation costs.

A nice way to make money can be to collect the wreckage left after battles. Sadly there are many large scale battles these days. If you dare to stay around there, you can often pick up containers and salvage everything from cheap goods to expensive missiles or even shields. You'll also find containers and wreckage in remote parts of inner sectors and hidden in the outer sectors.

You can always make some extra money if you look out for containers or other debris floating in the outer regions of sectors. Often what looks like junk at first can be worth quite a lot. Certainly worth the time picking it up. Your best chances are to look where others don't go try in asteroid fields or inside dangerous nebulae for example.

Well it depends if you use a mining laser or if you plan to build a full blown mine there. In either case you should get a mineral scanner and search for those asteroids with a high Ore or Silicon content. Building a mine is a large investment but gets you more money in the long run, while mining with a mining laser can be fun and gets you a lot of money quickly. However, this normally requires two ships. One equipped with the mining laser and one with large transport capacity that can hold Ore.
Hiya! Welcome to the Information station, how can I be of service?
We have deducted our charge from your account.
That's all the information we have.
I'm sorry, we're closed, come back another day.
The Паранід have closed this service, try another sector.
I just don't know, maybe I should've gone to school more.
I just don't know, maybe you should've gone to school more.
Oh, you met my sister, we've got a big family.
I hate my boss, want to run away and get married?
Oh, my it's you. Wait until I tell my friends. (disappointed)you look better on the newsvids. So, how may I help you?

page.title: Kyle Brennan COMM
page.t: I'm a bit busy right now, Julian.
I think we should head for the destination, Julian. We're running out of time.
Come back, Julian! I need your help!
Let's see if we can shake these guys.
Let me give you a hand.
We're taking too much damage, we've got to...
Stay out of this. You don't understand what you're doing.
You've got to get out of here.
We have to get clear before that hits the event horizon.
You stay here you'll have a one way jump ticket into Хаак space. Get out, now!
Move it! The jump field's forming!
We don't get clear we're dead men.
Watch out, you'll destabilise the jump field.
Okay, pilot. We have to get back and talk to Ban Danna.
No disrespect, but I'll wait until I see Ban Danna before the interrogation.
Don't shoot, let's just jump out of here!
Come on pilot, they need help.
And you think that's my fault? That the death of your friend, Brett...
You've lost a friend, how would you feel if someone threatened to take everything?
Strange though, isn't it? We'd never heard of them then they arrive and start destroying everything?
Let's get back to Ban Danna.
And how many people have you killed to defend what matters to you? However you justify it, they're still dead.
Julian, we need to talk to Ban Danna as soon as possible. That and...it's about time we met properly, don't you think?
Julian, leave them, this is only making things worse.

Not just it. The asteroid too. The Хаак had been alone throughout time then the Gunner crashed straight through the middle of their hive systems. They followed it, found us and began to learn about the other life out here. And that was okay, because the other life didn't know they existed.

They didn't see a difference between the races. Not at first anyway. Then the Паранід started sending recon missions into Хаак space. They didn't find the Хаак homeworld, but they did find what they were looking for.
The Паранід sent recon in. They must have detected some of the Хаак scoutships. The Хаак saw this recon as a threat.

It's always been around in small quantities, but now it's being mined in massive amounts with ships constantly going into Хаак space. There's a simple reason we can't find their homeworld. We're stealing what's left of it.
I thought the Gunner might contain starcharts that could help us find Earth. It turns out I wasn't the only one looking for the ship.
Face the politicians, or make a break for it?
So, are you going to fly this bucket, or shall I?
Okay, so you fly, I'll fix it.
(audio only) It's been taken off line. It'll take me a minute to reroute it.
Don't kill any of them, they're on our side remember?!
More ships coming in, stay sharp up there.
Have you seen the ships they've blocked it with? It's suicide! Give me a moment more, the drive will be online.
I'm going to need another minute.
I'm fixing a jump drive not a broken power socket!
I'm on the last bit now.
You're a prisoner that's stolen a ship, what did you expect them to do?
I've got it! Hit the jump button!
Where are we going to jump to, Julian?
I hope he knows what he's saying the Don's got a pretty vicious reputation.
I wish I could say the same, Ion. The man who named the Хаак, someone with the background you have then...Julian told me about Dogun.
Instead he died to save another.
Come on, Julian, we don't want to get caught.
We'll go for the gates. You take Ion where he needs to go. He's coming across, now.
Only one way to find out. See you on the other side.
Earth fleet to Аргон One. May we be of assistance?
Julian will join you shortly. I'm returning to Earth. Hopefully I can persuade them to open up contact with us, but they're highly suspicious so it could take some time. Kyle out.

page.title: Saya Kho COMM
page.t: You're paying for the paintwork, JB.
Sorry, JB, I've got some Terracorp business to deal with.
Give me some time, I'm trying to figure things out
I don't know. We'll have to find out.
Nothing to do with me, bud.
Check your system map, JB. Try heading to the [insert destination].
Look out the window, JB, You're already there.
Hey, you forgot me, JB! Let's get where we're going and get on.
That's it you're letting me off at the next station!
You got a bottle of anything bubbly we can open?
I'm so good I scare myself.
10 out of 10 with added style points from the jury
That's not what I had in mind.
This is giving me a headache.
Take that back and get a refund.
This mean you're going to sulk, JB?
Let's see you out fly this!
Didn't you notice the guns on this?!
Looks like you need a little help from a lady.
Men get that close to me in a bar, they lose things! Back off!
You can use the comm to get my attention.
Thanks, JB, I owe you one.
Thanks, you saved my skin, I'll save yours later.
I'm a bit busy here, JB!!!
I'm a bit busy right now, JB!
You'll need an upgrade to you lasers.
You're going to need better weaponry than that!
Those lasers wouldn't hurt a spacefly. Time for an upgrade.
I get some more missiles, JB, bigger ones.
Those toy missiles? You'll need an upgrade!
Those shields wouldn't protect you from a rainstorm.
Annoying as can be, I'd like you around for a while longer. You're going to have to upgrade those shields.
You'd better get your ship repaired.
That hull's looking a bit secondhand, you'd better get it repaired.
There's a lot of damage, you'd better get that ship repaired.
You'll need repairs before you go anywhere.
No cargo space. Bad weaponry. Lots of damage. You need a new ship or a complete overhaul.
That ship's a mess, you need a complete upgrade.
That ship's had it, it'll need repairs and upgrades.
You're going to need a fighter for this.
You're going to need a bigger ship.
Ahhh, you get lonely again and need someone to talk to?
No way you're sending me to bazani!
It's about time someone taught you a lesson!
Time to get out of here, JB.
...and as none of the priests here are allowed to fight they're desperate enough to ask you to help, JB.
I'll transport you aboard. Oh, and say hi to the monk they have let me play with. (Prompting) Dogun?
It's not an honour, Dogun. Trust me, I've met him. Come on, JB. Let's get going.
Okay, JB, I'm releasing target drones. Let's see if you can still handle a turret.
It's a rock. Okay, here they come.
Looks like you're a little rusty. Want to go again?
You've got a couple of different weapons there, JB. Try changing between them.
You getting the hang of it, or you want to go again?
Is it coming back, or do you want one more go?
Okay...Try aiming for them this time, JB.
Hey, you miss these and I'm sending Dogun back to have a go.
Well, done. You must've been practicing.
Just protecting a major Terracorp asset.
Me! And this ship. Our technicians would love to have a poke around the modifications the Гонер have made, if we can persuade Noah.
Charity's easier when you've got credits in your pocket.
Dogun, you never say it's quiet in space.
They're your fault, Dogun, that's what they are! JB, we've got company!
They're Пірат, JB. Recognise any of them?
Oh, good. Are they nice Пірат?
Come on, JB, we're getting fried here.
This ship's one of a kind, JB, Noah's not going to be pleased if you let it get blown up. Come to that, neither am I!
Try using the rapid impulse laser, JB.
I can't hold them off. There are too many of them!
Shields are low. You're going to have to finish these guys off or we're floating home.
Let's see if we can shake these guys.
You prefer I let them shoot us?
Do I look like a priest?
Switch off your shields and prepare to be fragged.
Hey, pirate boy, you forgot your parrot.
We'll have some universal peace. Just as soon as JB's blown these Baka Ne to bits.
We're taking too much damage, we've got to...
No, Dogun, not there, that's the...
...control panel. (Resigned) You'd better clean that up. I'm bringing us in to land. Re-entry in ten.
I don't give a flying shunt about the equipment! Is he all right?
Then you'd better get Julian back on his feet and fast.
As long as you're okay, we'd better find this crystal. If this weapon's as powerful as Ion says...
Ion's fitted your ship with a jump drive; he said you'd need it.
Ion says you'll need a jump drive, but that M5's way too small. Get yourself another ship and meet me at the trading station in this sector when you're ready.
Yeah. As if the Хаак weren't giving us enough to worry about.
You're going to need bigger guns, JB. Even without us looking for trouble there are enough Пірат and Хаак out there. Pick up something with more firepower and meet me back here.
Ion thinks we'll need about seventy units worth of power cells if we are to keep up with the Talon. Pick them up and meet me here.
Ion thinks we'll need a jump drive and seventy units worth of power cells to keep up with the Talon, but your ship's too small. Get a bigger ship, bring it here and we'll fit what you need.

Ion thinks we'll need a jump drive and seventy units worth of power cells to keep up with the Talon, but you haven't enough cargo space, clear things out or get a bigger ship and we'll fit what you need.
According to Ion, the Don's ship is docked at a pirate station to the West.
That must be the Talon. It's damaged all right.
Shame, I was hoping he'd hang around to be friends.
Maybe we should've asked for more than just the crystal.
Sure! I was born stupid. Let's take these Пірат out.
He's engaging his Jump-drive. I'm getting a lock...
Got it! Sending you the co-ordinates. Let's get after him!
There he is, let's get after him.
I think he's heading to the North gate.
I've got him on scanner to the West.
I'm tracking him to the East.
Quick he's heading out of the sector.
Hurry it up he's heading into the sector.
We've lost him I'll need to get more power cells for this jump drive. I'll meet you back at Легенда Фарнгама.
I'm all powered up and ready to go when you are, JB.
Just don't mess it up again this time.
Let's get it right this time, hey, JB?
Yeah, I'll go home, right after I've fragged your bastu!
Hey, if it gets you to shut up, I'll surrender and let you do it now.
Hey, there's a lady here you know. Have you no manners?
You found him? Don't let him get away!
Wow you found him! You sure you need me?
Why do we even need the scanner with you here?
Come on, JB, we need to find that pirate station it's over to the West.
The Talon won't hang around if they hear we're in the sector, we'd better find that pirate station, JB.
Nice of you to join me, JB.
We're too far away to get a jumplock. We'll have to get closer.
Keep those fighters off me! Here's a hint, they're the red ones on your scope!
You've got to get within '3' k, JB, or I can't get a lock!
I said 'three' kilometres. Were you this bad at kiss chase?
Got a positive lock. Just keep up until he jumps
I've lost him, you've got to get closer before he jumps.
You'll have to get closer than that.
Пірат give you a rash or something? Keep up with it!
Come on, JB! You're flying like a rookie.
I got him. Uploading the coordinates to your computer. Let's hurry, JB, he won't stay there forever.
Got a positive lock. Sending jump coordinates. Let's get there before he jumps again!
He didn't go far. Hit the jump drive, I've sent you the location.
You have to keep those fighters off my back. I can't get a lock, JB.
Come back, JB! I need your help!
You keep an eye on it, I'll get a lock on the Talon.
First the crystal, now a ship. We're going to have to get your eyes tested, JB.
That was his last jump. His drive's down.
His shields have gone. Targeting engines.
Keep an eye out for escorts, I'll see what it is.
I've got the crystal aboard, let's get it to safety. Bye, bye losers! Come on let's get out of here
He's going to jump any second!
Two more jumps and he's ours!
Let's get close and cosy to him again!
You've got to stop those fighters getting between us and him, JB!
You figure we could get a forwarding address for him? Maybe he's on Пірат reunited?
Oh, a pirate's life for me...
He can't keep running forever, he'll run out of power cells soon. Let's go!
There he is, let's get him, JB.
Cos, we know where you live.
Let's see if he likes this.
Surprise! What can I say? We just liked your company.
Come on, JB, I think he's tiring, not many jumps now...
You can jump but you can't hide.
Hurry up, JB, we have to get after him.
And I heard you never ran out of energy, JB. Pick up some more cells and meet me in Легенда Фарнгама.
It's best we wait here. The Don won't want to get too far from his defences.
Over there! It's that ship again.
I'll get over to Terracorp HQ, see if anyone in security can identify the ship. Fly safe, JB.
That's not everything, JB. You need the jump drive and at least 70 units worth of cells.
Does Ban know you're pretending to be an Аргон escort?
Since the Хаак started blowing our fleets to bits. I'm here to make sure these ships get through.
Ask the Паранід, they can't get enough of it.
Yeah. I showed it to a lot of experts.
They couldn't recognise it either. Okay, ladies and gentleman of the convoy, our Аргон military escort has finally arrived. If you'd like to proceed on course.
Fleet to red alert. All ships to flank speed. Close up in the middle you're leaving too much room!
Quick, JB, can you get to that freighter?
You're going to have to take out those pursuing fighters, JB.
There are too many! Take out those ships!
Watch out for any more arrivals and keep them away from us.
If you handle the ships that are chasing us, we'll get the others.
We're taking too much damage, JB, you have to take more of them out!
Cover that freighter or we've lost it.
That freighter's taking too much damage!
Cover that ship until they get their shields back up!
There're too many of them! We're going to have to go for the!
The Хаак don't need any help, JB!
Thanks, JB, Terracorp owes you one.
And who knows....one day you might get to collect. (To the fleet) Okay, we still need to get to Край Імперії, so keep your eyes on those scanners.
Okay, fleet, let's dock and unload.
Hey, JB, you want me to pick those drones up for you?
Hey, which one of us gave the Stone to the bad guy? Someone's got to keep an eye on you.
Hi, JB, any chance of you flying all the way with us? We took a beating last time.
I've got your cargo. What's the plan?
Original. Anyone brought any decent movies?
I'll drop the first drone. You fly it, I'll keep an eye out for trouble.
Watch out for that scanner here!
If I ever decide to flirt with you, you'll know about it.
You don't have to whisper, Noah, he can't hear you.
Keep following the passage it can't be much further.
The Yaki have put some defences up, you'll have to get through without triggering them, or they'll know we're here.
There's a scanner there. Keep out of its range and you'll be all right.
They must have mobile defences, this is going to get tricky.
The drone's taking too much damage.
It'll pick you up, move away!
Another couple of shots and the drone's had it!
Good job we've got another drone, this one's almost gone!
Watch out for the scanners this time.
Let's not take any chances here, JB, we were lucky they didn't detect it on its way in. Stay in the tunnel.
How much ear wax've you got? I said don't fly out! Engaging the self-destruct mechanism.
You have to find the power nodes to take out the turrets.
That's the wrong target, hit the power node.
Come on JB, it's not even moving.
No wonder you got caught stealing that spaceship.
Brute force won't do it, you have to get sneaky!
I'm launching another drone, but be careful. We can't afford to let them to detect us.
Don't you play video games, JB? This is the last drone, so don't crash it!
And they let you fly spaceships? I'm not being your passenger again!!
They've detected us. They're launching ships!
At least someone brought a movie.
Heads up boys, our friend's back.
I think we've outstayed our welcome.
Come on, JB. They hit you with those disruptors, you'll be a sitting target.
(Arriving in Південно-Західна Хмарна База/next sector) Everyone okay? Noah?
We can't do anything about Ion until we find a way to stop those missiles. Julian? Are you okay?
We will find a way to put this right, JB.
I'll push for firm information on that ship, we've had enough surprises. I'll contact you when we have anything.
Okay, you dock at the station and see what you can find, I'll ask around see if anyone else in the system knows anything. First place I'd check, JB, is the BB.
Hey, lazy, get on that trading station and get looking.
You're going to have to boost your reputation if you want to dock.
You would have to fall out with them. Better boost your relations with them, then you can dock.
Lucky you brought me then. I've been playing detective and everyone's pointing us to the silicon mine.
I got offered a lot of credits by a Теладі to work in one of those places. He still can't walk straight. It's no place for a little girl, we need to find her and fast.
Like what? Hey! You'd better not be suggesting what I think you're suggesting!
Come on let's get to Прибуток Теладі. And JB you tell anyone about this and you won't be walking straight. Engaging jump drive.
How do you think a Гонер priest got involved with the Yaki? I haven't met one that would hurt a spacefly let alone mastermind a smash and grab raid!
I don't know. Not getting shot at on such a regular basis would be a good start. Can't really think of anything else.
You know anytime you want to stop bombing around the universe shooting things we'll find a place for you at Terracorp.
No, but if you're going to get shot at you might at least get holiday pay.
Er, what about me getting scared?
We ever do this again, you're getting waxed and putting on a dress.
Okay, JB, don't get closer than five kilometres, or you might scare the Пірат off. Once they've got me, you'll have to tail them.
They've taken the bait. The ship's immobilised. You'd better stay close, but don't ...they're coming onboard!
You're getting too close, JB. Back off before they see you.
Keep your distance, JB, I don't want to be in this get up much longer. This top's making me itch.
Nice to know you care, but care from further away.

(Whispering) Okay, we're docking (some clanging and docking noise run under this). Can you get close and cause some sort of distraction so I can get away? Try taking out those mines. Someone's coming I'd better...(signal goes dead)
(In the background we hear alarms) I've got away. Stay close but stay undetected, we still have to get out of here.
(Whispering) Come on, JB, there's no way I'll be able to get away on my own. Shoot those squash mines!
(Whispering) Where've you been, JB? Get me out of here!
JB, I've found Miria, but the Yaki have got some sort of transporter dampener. You'll have to get inside to get us out.
That's one idea. We'll meet you at the docking area. And hurry up! For some reason the station's leaking air.
(Audio only) No can do. The release doors've jammed on the escape pods, we're all trapped. You'll have to get to the doors.
Then hurry up! You can get to the pods through an access in the docking area. It'll have a force field over it, take the generator out to get in. Oh, and JB, be careful with my ship!!
You'll have to blast the door off each pod.
(audio only) That's everyone! Get yourself out of there!
Can you ask stupid questions? It's my ship, dimwad!
Come on, JB! I asked for a rescue, not a taxi pick up!
Er, you want the good news, or the bad news?
The reactor's leaking. Any minute now it'll blow and we'll be radioactive cinders.
Yeah, we just thought we'd stay to keep you company. Get your bastu in here, JB!!
JB, we're going to die if you don't pick it up!
You want to get out of here, or not?
They've got laser grids set up. You'll have to take the generators out, or they'll turn you into diced chickadee.
That explosion took out the weapon dampeners, you can fire in here.
That ship better not have a scratch on it!
Are you stopping to look at the sights, or what? Get us out of here!
The Pods are grouped together look for a set of hatches.
You're breaking up, JB, you must be moving away from us.
That's it, JB, first pod away, keep it up!
That's the first set, look for the others.
The pods aren't all together, so keep your eyes open.
I think I know where Miria is, but there are a lot of guards. I'll need you to get me out of here as soon as I find her.
You'll need to get to the docking area to transport us. They've got shielding in here.
That's everyone, thanks, JB. I'm sure all the ladies here will be pleased to hear you can shoot straight. Let's get back to the Don.
Yeah, I'm fine, thanks for asking and yes, I've got the Don's little girl here.
Well, as long this 'little' girl was supposed to be 22 then she's fine.
Stop firing at the station you idiot!
Not quite. You want to explain, JB?
Yeah, suspicious how well he knew the inside of a pleasure complex.
I thought that was your regular 'Saturday' night.
Er, no offence, I think these girls have gone through enough without us handing them over to another pirate.
Keep your eyes on the spacelanes, JB. Don't want you getting distracted and hitting any asteroids, do we? Now hit that jump drive and meet me in Легенда Фарнгама.
You gone spacebrain? Where've you been?
Keep your eyes on the spacelanes, JB. Don't want you getting distracted and hitting any asteroids, do we?
You go after them, I'll take this data to Noah, see what he makes of it.
Oh, yeah, nothing to worry about there.
So, we plan a little ambush?
Glad you could join us. Miria not with you?
Glad you missed me. We're heading for the West Gate in Пояс Руди, so fire up those thrusters.
And they say real men don't fire blanks.
I'll contact Ban and organise the ships we need. Meet us back here in about an hour, okay, JB?
You're going to have to help the security ship, JB!
We'll have to take his shields down.
You recruit Пірат, you're going to get treated like one.
Kyle's not the only one that's been there. I showed my mother the pictures from our spydrone. It's not Earth.
I don't trust Ion as far as I could throw him in heavy gravity.
Any ideas how we build a mine in closed space? I could talk to my Terracorp contacts, but the Паранід aren't even letting our convoys in.
Your contacts? You suddenly got a social life?
How do you know this guy?
And we can trust him? She's a pirate, JB.
You actually managed to out-arrogance a Паранід. You know how hard that is?
A lot. So, I'm going to take a well earned break and wait here while you raise the credits.
(Teasing) Really? I thought it was Miria that did that.
There's trading, or if you're pushed there are jobs on the Bulletin Boards on stations, otherwise you could saddle up and try some racing. Noah says you're pretty good at it.
Well, I suppose if you're desperate...
Well, that went smoothly enough. Time for you to go and visit the Паранід...Julie.
Let's get that Seed thing back to Noah. I don't like having it around. It's got me worried.
How many times have you heard that line?
Don't know what you mean. I'm just going to relax a little.
We'd better get back to Noah, see what we have to do with it. Reproductive Organs?
You got it! What do we do with that thing now?
Yeah, only a Хаак invasion to worry about now. It feels almost quiet.
I didn't mean it! I didn't mean it! Do you think this Seed really makes a jump event? I mean if it does...
No! One mysterious alien invasion a jazura's enough. I have a note from my doctor and everything.
You'd better go, JB. I'll get this Seed thing back to Ban.
Looks like you're finally going to get to meet him.
Just be yourself, JB. (Trying to lift him) On second thoughts, try and be someone else, he might like you better.

Be careful. Okay? You know what some of these flightjockeys can be like, he even tries to defend himself and he'll be seen as a defector. That goes for you too. Keep that trigger finger still, JB and good luck.
Terracorp alone has shipped fifteen convoys to them.
I've put some information together on Terracorp shipments and I think we should start with the installation in Імператорські Шахти.
And what am I supposed to do back here while you're flying round?
Let's get to Імператорські Шахти, JB
I just put my hand in something gunky down here. Don't know what it is. I don't want to know what it is. You ever thought about, you know, maybe cleaning this ship, JB? No wonder you're single.
This poster by the lockers...is it physically possible to do that without dislocating something?
Hey, JB. You know that poster? There are some more down here.
This girl looks like Miria. And this one...there's no way they're real.
And how would you know how to do that?
You want Mi Ton to operate your equipment?
What are you doing, JB? You need the equipment we have onboard. And, hey, you need me!
Oh, right, realise you forgot something did you?
Okay, JB, the installation's over to the East.
Okay, JB, the installation is over to the west.
Okay, JB, the installation is over to the North.
Okay, JB, the installation is over to the South.
We'll need to get close up in case of shielding. We scan their storage and processing areas then we'll know how much Nividium's here.
It's empty, only small traces of Nividium. They must've shipped it out. Or they've got through a lot quickly.
The next installation is in Паранід Прайм. Let's see if that gives us any clues.
I've marked the sections you need to scan. You'll have to get me within twenty five metres to scan through the shielding.
All these technical bits, Ban's gadget mad isn't he?
I've marked up the sections you need to scan, so just join the dots. Get me to within twenty five metres and we'll let this technical thingy do it's magic.
I've marked the sections you need to scan. You'll have to get me within 50 metres to scan through the shielding.
I've marked the sections you need to scan. You'll have to get me within 100 metres to scan through the shielding.
I've marked up the sections you need to scan, so just join the dots. Get me to within 50 metres and we'll let this technical thingy do it's magic.
I've marked up the sections you need to scan, so just join the dots. Get me to within 100 metres and we'll let this technical thingy do it's magic.
We need to go to Паранід Прайм.
We need to go to Край Імперії.
We need to go to Володіння Герцогу.
You'll need to take us out to The North. They don't put these stations close to anything else. You figure they might be doing something dangerous with the Nividium?
You'll need to take us out to The East. They don't put these stations close to anything else. You figure they might be doing something dangerous with the Nividium?
You'll need to take us out to The South. They don't put these stations close to anything else. You figure they might be doing something dangerous with the Nividium?
You'll need to take us out to The West. They don't put these stations close to anything else. You figure they might be doing something dangerous with the Nividium?
Half way there, JB, neat flying.
Come on, show me your moves.
I'm just picking up the station, no Nividium. There is debris that could be from Хаак ships though.
I list five Terracorp convoys coming to this place alone. I logged two of them and they were loaded with Nividium. Where's it gone?
Punch the button, JB. Let's get to Край Імперії.
This is supposed to be a secret mission, let's get out and get on before we raise any more suspicion.
Take us in, I'll see what I can pick up.
That's it and I've got nothing.
Just one more sector to go, JB, let's ditch this patrol and take a look.
We've got one on our tail!
Let's get out of here, JB, we're not here to fight them!
They might be wrong, but they're definitely trying to kill us.
Let's make this quick and dodge your fan club. The installation is over to the
Hey, it was here, one of the biggest installations I've ever seen. It's where most of the Nividium came to. (scanning) No debris. Look, there's no way they could've towed it out of here.
There's a ship coming up on us. Looks like a transport
I told you! And I got the readings - massive amounts of Nividium. (Excited) I heard rumours the Паранід had a cloaking device, but everyone said it didn't work.

I've got Паранід ships coming in through the gate. It's Armanckessilon's family, and they've brought friends. (An even bigger fleet than last time appears). Let's get back to Аргон One. We have to tell Ban about this.
I know you're not one to run away from a fight, but let's just get out of here!
All those ships are going to do is draw attention, JB. This is supposed to be a secret mission, yeah?
We've still got another two installations. Let's start at Паранід Прайм.
We've still got another three installations. Let's start at Край Імперії.
We've still got one installation left to check. Let's head for Володіння Герцогу.
Stop playing with these guys and get out here. It's the intelligence material that matters.
Аргон One? Big Ship? Lots of Guns? In Аргон Prime? You must remember it. So, try flying there.

You ever hear the one about the spacebrain that flew off carrying Аргон Secret Service Equipment? No! Because they're treading water in a Спліт swamp somewhere. Come on, JB let's get this stuff back to BD.
We need to be in Імператорські Шахти, JB, where are you going?
This isn't Край Імперії. You're in the wrong place.
I was thinking Паранід Прайм not here, as, well...Паранід Прайм's where the installation is!
The installation's in Володіння Герцогу. So, what are we doing here?
Let's go to Край Імперії, JB!
Let's go to Володіння Герцогу, JB!
Let's go to Паранід Прайм, JB!
Let's go to Імператорські Шахти, JB!
I've had a look at this equipment. They must be stretched at Аргон command, it's ancient. We're gonna have to get close to whatever we scan to get any readings.
What do you think's going on, JB?
You find Earth just in time for it to be destroyed. Not the best timing!
Where are they all coming from?
There's still two left, don't let them get through.
It's the last one, JB, finish it off!
You did it! I have a ship heading your way to pick you up.
One more hit and that ship will blow! You have to intercept those fighters!!
Shimatta, another hit. They are going to blow!!
Is that it? Or has it gone quiet for a reason?
Did you find out what the Паранід were doing?
Forget the station, we've got ships coming from all sides.
The Хаак don't use the gates. Is it Sargon?
Shame Julian's not here to see this, he's good at last stands.
Well, if Julian can shoot things that fire back, they're space dust.
Think of the thirty ladies you've just rescued who are going to be very grateful.
And Noah was telling me what a hot race pilot you are.

page.title: Noah Gaffelt COMM
page.t: (Reaction when contacted by player)How may I help you, Brennansama?
I'm sorry, I can't talk to you now, Brennansama.
My apologies I must answer that another time, I have duties.
You truly walk the path, Julian.
Come back, Brennansama! I need your help!
Your way forward is here, do not leave your destiny.
We're taking too much damage, I'm afraid we...
Brennansama, please could you meet me at the Гонер Temple. I know I have asked much of you in the past, but I have another favour to ask you. I hope to see you shortly.
Greetings, Brennansama, thank you for coming. I was most grieved to hear of your father's condition.
We have a valuable cargo that needs transporting, but with all the pirate activity we need someone to operate the transport ship's defences and as we, er, well...
(Relieved) Brennansama, I am most happy you are well. We heard what happened and have been trying to discover who took the Stone.
Brennansama, it was Ion who stole the Stone! The Don has the second stone Ion needs.
We are not sure of their purpose, only that they hold great power. There is a priest, Thomus, he will help us find Ion, if we can find him. Will you come with me?
Thomus is normally in Freedom's Reach. I will send the details to you.
Thomus's friend is a Теладі trader on the trading station. We should dock there.
Oh good, you have docked. Please wait, I will be with you shortly.
Oh dear, it appears you need to have a higher, erm, level of notoriety for them to accept you here. I will wait until they will let you dock.
It appears you've upset them in someway. Find a way to make amends, or they will not allow you to dock here.
Lihimes Eluleis Gebnduis III, Thomus's friend. (we hear Noah activate the comm.) I do hope Thomus is alright.
No, friend, we seek help. We are looking for Thomus Beckitt.
We can pay. Name your price.
Thomus's ship is in the east nebula in this sector. If we are to find Ion we should get to him as fast as possible.
Thomus's ship is in the east nebula in Пояс Руди. If we are to find Ion we should get to him as fast as possible.
If we are to find Ion we should get to him as fast as possible.
It's Ion. He's stolen the White Stone.
Can we get to Ban Danna as quickly as possible please, Brennansama? I'm worried about Thomus.
Brennansama, we too must hurry, time is pressing.
Ion has arranged to meet Thomus in Ocracoke's Storm.
We should get to Ocracoke's Storm quickly, Brennansama.
Oh dear, there are a lot of them.
I have a lock on his homing beacon.
You should tell the other ships to go, Brennansama. We don't want to risk the Пірат seeing us.
They appear to have seen us.
Be careful, Brennansama. We can't let them detect us. I don't want Ion to get away.
We need to stay undercover, Brennansama. We have to discover what Ion is doing.
I hope Thomus is all right.
No. There has to be more.
Oh my, oh my. He can't have.
He can't have. After all these years...
We must get this information to Аргон command immediately. My goodness. Earth.
Please, we must return to Аргон now.
How can he have found it? What does he mean by a gate?
Yes, indeed. I will meet Thomus and find out more.
Thank you for your help, Brennansama. I will be in touch soon.
Welcome, Brennansama. You have the other crystals? This is wonderful. Wonderful. Now we stand a chance of stopping Ion. Please meet me at the Гонер Temple. Thomus and Saya are here.
Well done, Brennansama. If only we knew how Ion was to use these crystals.
There have been too many lives lost already, Brennansama.
I am relieved to see you, Brennansama.
It is not our intentions, but our actions that matter, Ion.

page.title: Thomus Beckitt COMM
page.t: You know Goners are pacifists? I'm the exception to the rule.
What? You want all my spare time? I'm busy.
Take some responsibility...figure it out yourself!
Ask Noah, he's on my comm a friend list.
Let me think, it's, er, it's. Yeah, it's nothing to do with me.
How do you get round space alive? You're there already?!
Yeah. Any chance that after this you'll never bother me again?
Nothing says thank you more than a case of Теладі gin.
You really think that's going to happen?
Does this mean I can go home?
Well done, you're all heroes. Any chance of a beer?
Well that's about what I thought would happen.
You guys want a score out of ten, or shall we just agree on zero?
This mean we've got to do it again?
Here's something you'd better do something about.
You just going to watch these guys, or are you going to do something?
I've seen first year acolytes move faster!
If you're going home, so am I.
Yeah, and I wouldn't have been here in the first place if it wasn't for you.
(Annoyed) You hail me again and I'll shove that comm. up your Bastu!
I told you he was up to something!
And you remember that! I suppose you want him found? But I tell you if you turn up he'll disappear faster than a Bonnis down a borrow.
If it gets everyone to eat Crazola and leave me in damn peace, then get it done.
(Interrupting) You get that surprise ready. I'll contact Ion.

They're one of those organised crime mobs that think they have honour because three of them will shoot you in the front rather than one in the back. Wish they'd do us all a favour and spend their time shooting each other.
What made you think I was comfy uncle Zipdoodah? Just because I wear a cowl doesn't mean I have to put up with chit chat.
Ion's no fool, he must know if he wants it this badly. How he found out though...we've had our experts analyse it for years and we don't know.
Old. Mysterious. Vastly intelligent. And left because they got fed up of the inferior races. I completely empathise with them.

page.title: Ion Battler COMM
page.t: You don't know what you're doing.
Come back, Brennansama! I need your help!
You will not stop the search for Truelight.
This is Truelight Seeker to Brennansama (the signal fades to static)... We're opening an airlock so you can board.

Yes, yes. The doctors say he was fortunate, but we must retrieve the crystal. It is part of a weapon built by those who made the gates and now it is in the hands of a pirate, you understand? You must get it back!
Praise be. We will transport it onboard. Thank you, Brennansama. Khosama. This will not be forgotten.
(distant, thin, crackly) Prepare yourself for something... something wondrous.
(over the spydrone) No one believed me, let's see if they can doubt me now. Now I have found it. Earth.
It gets better, Thomus. I know how we can get there. I know how to build a gate.
You can't do this. You don't understand.
You have no right to do this!
You're only going to get us into more trouble!
Why is there shooting? What's happening?
There are things bigger than all of us. One life for a greater cause.
It's an energy vortex the ancients created. You can't let it get damaged, if it's unleashed without programming, or containing gates ... the consequences will be terrible.
Brennansama, it is an honour to see you again.
If Dogun had known, he would've been happy to lay down his life for Earth.
They're playing with things they don't understand.
Quickly, the event will tear itself apart, it will destroy everything for sectors unless there is a gate to hold it in place.
You must get me inside, to the transmitter controls.
It must bind the event here. If you place it near the event it should be automatic.
You won't make it in that ship, not until the other end is capped.
We must defend the gate. If the Хаак get through to Earth...
You must hurry, the event is going to implode.
The array's been damaged, it won't take much more!
If we lose this station all is lost!
I've done it! Sending beam now!(NB We now see the wormhole stabilise and hold.) It's stabilising. Quickly now we must get the gates in position!
Sargon told me a little of how it works. I think I can stabilise it.
Couldn't they see how fragile the crystal was?
I hope they haven't changed the controls, we must stop this.
The station will only take a few more hits.
I'm losing contact with the event, you HAVE to cover me.
As you can see from the information I'm sending each wormhole needs an energy spine. Without this it will collapse.

No energy spine, big wormhole go boom boom! It snaps shut and sends out shockwaves that shakes matter apart for sectors. We have to send out an energy spine from that platform then put gates in position. Understand?
Well done, you just passed science. Now, you must get onboard that.
The event is now stable. I only hope Kyle got through to Earth. And that it is Earth.
If the Хаак win they'll destroy Earth!
Ion ...calling all ships. The station's being moved off course. I need assistance.
It's Sargon. He's trying to change the beam, you must stop him.
Sargon's trying to reprogram the beam. You'll have to destroy this station.
There's no time, you have to destroy it.
You must destroy the station's reactor. It's the only way.
Hurry, I'm losing the lock on Earth!
Another few seconds and we'll lose Earth.
I'm doing what I can, but you must hurry.
You must take out the four power nodes - that will overload the reactor.
You've done it. Power dropping. Get out before it blows.
He's changed the wormhole. We've lost Earth.
The station's coming apart, it's going to break up...
How can I be of service, Brennansama?
I'm disappointed in you, I thought you would understand.
I'm afraid I don't know, Brennansama.
You are not enlightened enough to understand.
My life is in your hands.
Those that look with closed eyes cannot see. Leave me.
I'm sorry, Brennansama, I can't help you.
Who else could I go to?. When the wise fail to find the truth, sometimes you must seek a fool.

I know very little. He showed me the plans of the projector and I saw that I could find Earth. He said he wanted the truth to be known, that the ancients had made a mistake in shutting the races off. That the Earth had been lost by accident and fate must now return it to its proper place.
I have told you what I know. It is an energy vortex from which the jump events are created. This must be the last of them in our space.

page.title: Dogun COMM
page.t: (Reverential) No, no indeed. It is the White Stone, one of the only artefacts left by the ancients.
Er, Miss Khosama, what are those red blips?
There's one over there! Over there!
By the great universal peace, I'll never miss prayers again!
Quickly, Mr Julian, the other way, look the other way!
Er, well, I've never actually been out of the simulator. I kept crashing.
Shields down to 60%! Can't you stop them shooting us?!
20%! One more and we've had it!
My mother warned me not to go into space!!
And one thousand, and two thousand and three thousand. I think I'm having a panic attack!
I can't breathe, I can't breathe.
Do you believe in an afterlife, Mr Julian Brennansama?
My mother says I always get into trouble.
My mother would kill me if she knew I was doing this.
Shoot the missile! Shoot the missile!
I think I'm going to be sick again.
You hit it! You hit it!
Well done! Hit more of them!
There's no power, I ...good luck, Mr Julian...

page.title: Priest COMM
page.t: Brennansama, I am afraid Noah is not here. I will notify him that you wish to contact him. May peace bless your life.
Brennansama, I'm afraid Noah has not yet returned. I am still seeking to inform him of your attempts to contact him. May wisdom guide your footsteps.
The temple is currently closed for security reasons. We apologise for any inconvenience to your soul.

page.title: Kobach COMM
page.t: This is Admiral Kobach. This gate is off limits to all non-humans. Any attempt to enter the Earth system will be met with force. Your contact is not welcome.

page.title: Earth Captain 1 COMM
page.t: This is a restricted area. Leave immediately, or we will open fire.
This is your final warning, we will open fire.
Hostile actions will be met with lethal force.
Cease and desist or we will open fire.

page.title: Earth Captain 2 COMM
page.t: This is restricted Terran space. Leave or we are authorised to fire.
This is closed space, you have five seconds to turn that ship around.
Hostile actions will be met with lethal force.
Cease and desist or we will open fire.

page.title: Eagle Flight COMM
page.t: This is Eagle Flight Leader. Identify yourself.
Flight form on me. (The ships form up) Detainees accompany me!
Once a pirate always a pirate
If you run you'll be hunted down.
This is Eagle Flight Leader to all ships

page.title: Аргон Pilot COMM
page.t: Stop your engines and prepare to be boarded.
You have deviated from your flight plan. Return or we will open fire.

page.title: Freighter Captain COMM
page.t: Хаак coming in topside, transporting you over.
Where are they all coming from?!
McCarthy's right, we should find the Хаак homeworld and blast it into spacedust!
Don't know why the Паранід are whining. We're getting hammered.
You'd better shoot straight or we're dead!
Come on you turretmonkeys, earn your pay!
There are too many of them!
There're more ships coming in over here, we need help!
Taking heavy damage we need an escort now!

page.title: Freighter Captain 2 COMM
page.t: Хаак ships on my tail, I can't shift them!
Think of convoy 915, and take them down!
We need help in the turrets!
We're losing shields, we need cover!
There're more of them. They're too fast. We need a fighter here!

page.title: Captain - Illustrious COMM
page.t: This is the Illustrious, we've taken heavy strike damage...Our shields are going off line.
One more strike and we've had it.
Hull integrity compromised. Where are those damn shields?!
Fire crews to action points. EVA teams suit for hull damage.
We've got fire on decks seven through nine. Evacuate all personnel from those areas.
Got him! You ever want to be a full time turret monkey. You let me know!
Drive's offline, we're drifting. Engineering, get it fired up or we're out of this game permanently!
All non-combat personnel to firefighting duty immediately.
We can't take much more of this.
Thanks for your help, you kept our hide from getting fried!
Where are they all coming from?
Don't know why the Паранід are whining.
Can you train the rest of my crew.
You're gonna have to shoot faster or we're not getting out of here.

page.title: Captain - Redoubt COMM
page.t: Weapons back online, thank you escort.
Repairs underway, but all active defences are offline.
Where are they all coming from?!
You'd better shoot straight or we're dead!
Хаак ships on my tail, I can't shift it!

page.title: ASV 105 COMM
page.t: This is Аргон Security Vessel 105.We are here to escort you to Аргон One.
Lower your shields and prepare to be transported aboard.
This is Аргон Security Vessel 105. Halt your ship immediately...
You think we want war on two fronts? Come home, son!
I know your record, don't spoil it!

page.title: ASV 187 COMM
page.t: This is Аргон Security Vessel 187. By order of the Аргон Senate, you must return to Аргон immediately.
I am not authorised to answer any questions. Return to Аргон immediately.
You are disobeying a senate decree, force will be authorised if you fail to comply.
This is not a negotiation situation, return to Аргон now.

page.title: ASV 444 COMM
page.t: This is Аргон Security Vessel 444. Return to Аргон immediately.

page.title: Аргон Captain COMM
page.t: By order of the Аргон Senate, you must return to Аргон immediately.
They're ramming us! Evasive action! Evasive...!

page.title: Police 259 COMM
page.t: This is Аргон security vessel 259. Cut your engines and come to a halt, I repeat cut your engines and come to a halt.
(weak signal) This is (static) 259, I have no power, no engines, I'm going to ... (static)

page.title: Yaki1 COMM
page.t: Release the stone and we'll let you live.
Switch off your shields and prepare to be boarded.
Give us the crystals, we let you live.

page.title: Yaki2 COMM
page.t: Messing with the Yaki, big mistake!
Hope you wrote your letters home, cos no one's gonna see you again.

page.title: Eagle 2 COMM
page.t: Refer all questions to Eagle Flight Leader.
I am not authorised to communicate.

page.title: Text the onboard computer says for the plot
page.descr: Text the Boardcomputer says for the X3 plot
page.t: Visor failure estimated in ten seconds.
Seek pressure environment immediately. Ship detected.
Warning radiation detected. Station reactor breach in progress. Detonation in '3' minutes.
Approaching programmed co-ordinates. Crystalline structure detected.
Scanning. Composition 10% oxide silicates, 5% iron, 85% Nividium.
Asteroid specifications match those of the asteroid where the AP Gunner was discovered.

page.title: Dialog Choices
page.t: Sorry, weapons fire was in error. Standing down.
Thanks for the help. Good Bye.
There's nothing here for me. Good bye.
My ship's hull is damaged. Where can I go to repair it?
How do I equip my M1, M2, TL, or M6?
What is the difference between a Shipyard and Wharf ?
Why do I need a Police License and what are they for?
I keep hearing strange noises around my ship and bright objects fly by me. What are they?
How do I use the jumpdrive?
How do I use the transporter device?
How do I dock and initiate salvage insurance in my M6?
What are the main uses for my ships Flight Command Key?
How do I know which race tolerates which goods?
What's the best way to earn money with Minerals?
What do I need in order to mine minerals using a Mobile Drilling System?
Where can I buy a ship that can use the Mobile Drilling System and carry XL cargo?
Where can I buy the Ore Collector and the Mobile Drilling System?
How do I mine silicon or ore using the Mobile Drilling System?
What types of minerals are there?
Where and how do I find minerals?
Where can I buy a Mineral Scanner?
Can I put an Ore mine on an asteroid containing Silicon?
Can I put a mine on an asteroid containing Nividium?
How can I make a profit trading?
I want to trade but my ship is too small and too slow to be of much use, what do you suggest?
How can I find the best deals without travelling to every station in a sector?
I've got the Best Buys Locator and Best Selling Price Locator upgrades for my ship. How do I learn the best prices in far-off sectors?
Have you got any hot tips for profitable trade runs?
Is it worth visiting Trading Stations?
Do I have to do all my own trading?
What do I need to set up a Sector Trader?
What do I need to set up a Galaxy Trader?
Do I have to fit a Galaxy Trader with jump drive?
Do I have to visit every station I trade with? Can I order another ship to go there?
How do I use the comm.?
Where should I build my Headquarters?
What ship is good for a fight against the Хаак? (Large area)
How would you make money in Trading?
How would you make money in Building?
How would you make money in Salvaging?
