[select value='OpenBetAgency']Change racer[/select][/center][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][title]Slipstream Xtreme - betting agency![/title][text][justify]Thank you for your bet. Should you win some money it will automatically transfered to you after the race. You will also receive notification.[/justify]\n[center][select]Close[/select][/center][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][title]Slipstream Xtreme - betting agency![/title][text][justify]We are sorry, but you are still betting on $BETRACERSEL$. Please wait for next race to bet again.[/justify]\n[center][select]Close[/select][/center][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][title]Slipstream Xtreme - betting agency![/title][text][center]Congratulations![/center]
[justify]We are glad to inform you, that your racer $BETRACERSEL$ won the last race. We still send the winning prize of $BETREWARD$ credits to you.

ISA betting agency[/justify][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][title]Slipstream Xtreme - betting agency![/title][text][justify]We are sorry, but your racer $BETRACERSEL$ lost the last race. The race ended
$RACINGPOSITIONS$

Maybe you'll have better luck next time.

ISA betting agency[/justify][/text]

page.title: Bala Gi's reasearch missions
page.t: [author]$COM_SHIPYARD_GRAND_EXCHANGE$[/author][title]Yacht of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia[/title][justify]Hello $PLAYER$,\n\nBala Gi Research Inc. informed us that you are the new owner of the former yacht of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. We will repair it and charge the costs to Bala Gi Research Inc.. The previous owner complained that the vessel caused a substantial loss of reputation with the Паранід.[/justify]

[author]$COM_SHIPYARD_FAMILY_PRIDE$[/author][title]Inexcusable Delay[/title][justify]$PLAYER$,\n\nWhy did it take you so long to return? We have been waiting now for 2 Wozuras. Deliver the blueprint and leave us. We have no wish to engage you further for fear of dying of old age.[/justify]
[author]$COM_SHIPYARD_FAMILY_PRIDE$[/author][title]Procrastinator[/title][justify]Pilot $PLAYER$,\n\nYour tardiness will be overlooked this time, creature. Hand over blueprint! You go now![/justify]

[author]$COM_SHIPYARD_PARANID_PRIME$[/author][title]Lowerlife Wastes Time[/title][justify]Finally $PLAYER$,\n\nYou choose to return. Lowerlife tests the patience of the Паранід. Hand over the blueprint and go.[/justify]
[author]$COM_SHIPYARD_PARANID_PRIME$[/author][title]Unholy Timewaster[/title][justify]nUnholy creature, $PLAYER$,\n\ your procrastination is legendary. Hand over the blueprint and be gone.[/justify]
The yacht of Pontifex Maximus Paranidia

[justify]I have scanned the asteroids in the sector $SECTOR_ROLKS_FATE$ and found the source of the Невідомий radiation. I think the research team of Bala Gi will be very interested in this information. I should fly back to their shipyard in $SECTOR_KINGDOM_END$.[/justify]

[justify]I found the Yacht, but there seem to be a lot of different ships from different races too. They are all badly damaged or very old. This place feels like a graveyard for abandoned ships.[/justify]

page.title: BBS Quest Treasure Hunt
page.t: [author]$AUTHOR$[/author][title]Hidden Treasures Amongst New Frontiers[/title][text][justify]Allow me to introduce myself, my name is $AUTHOR$. As ancient a cartographer as I am, I have charted the depths of known space, and the paths by which we all travel. What is less known is that I have earned my fortune not through my maps, but by locating the vast treasures that hide within the far corners of all sectors. Some large, some small, old and new, all have free claim to them. Of course, I could tell you more, for a price...[/justify]\n\n[center][select value='moreinfo']Tell me more...[/select][/center][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][text][justify]Excellent! It is good that you have taken the time to listen. I am old and have grown tired of travel, what little time I have left I choose to remain in luxury, not strapped into the confines of a ship in search of further fortune. I have no greater need for it now. But you, of course, are still young and eager to amass the treasures of our sectors. To allow me to live in comfort, I must charge you a sum of $CREDITS$ Credits for this information. How you choose to use it is up to you. Tell me, do you have the spirit of a treasure hunter within you?[/justify]

[center][select value = 'accept']Yes! Here's your payment, show me the data![/select]
[select value='decline']No, I don't believe you. You fool, there's nothing but empty space out there.[/select][/center][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][text][justify]Payment has been received. Excellent. You must search deep within the sector of $SECTOR$, my most recent map data suggests the coordinates of $X_COORD$ , $Y_COORD$ , $Z_COORD$. Oh, and one last word. While I am old and worn, there are further reasons for my choosing not to continue such quests. Do not underestimate the cold darkness of distant space. There are evils and dangers that still haunt my dreams, be wary of them. Good luck and fare well.[/justify][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][text][justify]I'm sorry, but your standing amongst us does not allow me to offer you further information. Perhaps you would do well to work on your relationship with us.[/justify][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][text][justify]Your skills in trading are sadly lacking. Spend some more time understanding the true nature of profit, and return to me when you have gained that knowledge. Until then, I have nothing more to offer you.[/justify][/text]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][text][justify]You may be eager for adventure but your credit balance says otherwise. Return to me when you have earned more of your fortune. Everyone must start somewhere, and you clearly have yet to begin.[/justify][/text]

page.title: BBS Quest Donation
page.t:
[author]Suzeann Gusta[/author][title]Help desperate Parents![/title]
Arriving at a new space station can be so exciting for a child. Whilst the parents are busy completing the necessary formalities, it is very tempting for the children to explore the station on their own or to stare into the vastness of space from an observation platform. Sometimes, in this way, children quickly become detached from their parents and cannot find them in the crowds of people who often travel through the station.
 We are the "Little Suzie Foundation", a charity founded by parents, who themselves have lost a child. We offer other parents help in finding their lost children and in coordinating searches with station authorities. If we encounter "lost children", we provide shelter and look after them until their parents return to collect them.
 If you wish to support our important work, you are invited to make a donation.

Thank you for your attention!
Suzeann Gusta, Chairwoman of the "Little Suzie Foundation"

[center]Donate: 
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value ='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Jo Poler[/author][title]Аргон Victims of War - Charity Committee[/title]
Once more the Аргон Federation is at war. As if fighting the Хаак wasn't enough, Ксенон and Yaki attacks have increased recently, even Пірат are becoming more bold. Many civilian transports have been lost in such raids and they have even attacked stations!
 Regrettably, as in any war, civilians suffer too - families are torn apart and lose their homes, parents lose their children, and children - their parents, brothers and sisters.
Our Committee administers a fund, supported by the Аргон government, to help those who can't help themselves - the victims of war. We would much appreciate if you would assist us in helping others. With your donation the homeless may receive shelter, the wounded - medical care, the hungry - food, the desperate - hope.


Argon Victims of War

[center]Donate: 
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Hali Lo[/author][title]The Markus Spacefly Protection Society[/title]
Despite the Intergalactic Moratorium on Trade in Endangered Species, which protects the Markus Spacefly, the Спліт are still using the spacefly for energy production in their factories and ship engines. They hunt and kill the Markus Spacefly under the pretext of science, or they simply buy them from ruthless Пірат, who hunt and sell them at a profit to the Спліт. We want to save the beautiful and unique Markus Spacefly species from brutal slaughter by both careless Спліт and Пірат, and from possible extinction. Your donation may help us to achieve this lofty goal.


Hali Lo, 

The Markus Spacefly Protection Society

[center]Donate: 
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Hala Li[/author][title]Royal Boron Science Institute[/title]
The Royal Boron Science Institute was recently founded by the Boron Royal family to gather all the latest scientific discoveries to assist in the research and development of modern technologies. Our work is interdisciplinary and pan-galactic in nature. Discoveries by other races are considered and we aim to bring noted scientists of all races together to exchange ideas and research findings. The fruits of our labours are also placed at the disposal of all races without limitation.
In addition to the science, the work is also focused on developing interstellar research processes and understanding between scientists of all races.

If you would like to support this project, you can do this best by donating a few Credits. We thank you!


Hala Li, 

Public Relations, RBSI

[center]Donate:
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Kao t'Zhht[/author][title]Спліт demand your attention![/title]
Rhonkar, glorious patriarch of all Спліт, founded the Elite Warrior Academy to train the best. It is a great honour to be trained - only the best warriors have such distinction bestowed upon them. Support the academy in the same way as the glorious Сім'я Ронкар and your name will be spoken in the halls of the Academy.

[center]Demonstrate your respect with:
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Chi t'Nnk[/author][title]Spacefly Research Institute[/title]
Split always use spaceflies as energy. Sneaky Boron and their miscreant Аргон friends have colluded to create an intergalactic agreement to stop spacefly harvesting, allegedly to protect spaceflies. But it is just to harm Спліт. Спліт say this is wrong. Спліт need more research to discover more about spacefly numbers and swarming locations, and to provide evidence to show the heathen that spaceflies are a renewable resource. We also catch spaceflies to learn about the spacefly and how they generate energy.

As an honoured friend of Спліт you too can benefit from research results.


Chi t'Nnk, Spacefly Research Institute

[center]Give:
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Almanckarsat[/author][title]The Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality[/title]
The Паранід are the chosen race of the Universe. They are the only ones capable of fully understanding its three-dimensionality. Three is truth! Three is beauty! Three is Паранід!
The Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality seeks holy truth. Even if holiness cannot be bought, an oblation for the research will be looked upon favourably. Do not waste this oblatory opportunity!


Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality

[center]Donate:
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Kelmanckotsat[/author][title]Pilgrimage of the Holy Three-Dimensionality[/title]
Every Jazura the Pilgrimage of the Holy Three-Dimensionality takes place, in which his Holiness, the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia summons prospective priests and novices to Паранід Прайм. Young followers of the Holy Three-Dimensionality from across the Holy Паранід Empire come to listen the holy words of the esteemed Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Without participation in this highly important event, no novice can receive the consecrations of the Holy Three-Dimensionality. With pilgrim numbers increasing more and more every Jazura, all who acknowledge the importance of the Holy Three-Dimensionality are asked to support this sacred event.
Pilgrimage Organisation Committee

[center]Support with:
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI[/author][title]The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce[/title]
Profit is life. To earn profit, you must invest. But investments need assurances. That's exactly why we regularly mount campaigns to expand interstellar commerce and the free markets, because the other races still have not realised the true greatness of profit.

This campaign helps the Теладі Company to broaden its sphere of influence, to remove trade restrictions and decrease investment risk. Take part in building a bright future and invest in the Теладі Company! For profit!


The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce

[center]Invest:
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX[/author][title]Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії [/title]
Good breeding is very important for every saurian - especially for those seeking to survive in the daily struggle for profit in the Теладі and Universal markets. We, the former hatchlings and Egg-Brothers of the Platinum Ball Hatchery in Гордість Компанії , have therefore established this charitable organisation to support our home and secure the future training of our Egg-Younglings.

Since the Теладі Company is now selling knowledge to non-saurians, our fellowship has decided to also open itself to other races. So let us secure the future profit of our Egg-Younglings together.


Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії 

[center]Invest:
[select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Noah Gaffelt[/author][title]The Truth is still out there[/title]As finally, after hundreds of Jazuras, the Book Of Truth's teachings have been realised and Earth has been rediscovered, it has become more important than ever before to spread the Joyful Word across the Universe. Many of our brothers and sisters still venture out each day to spread the Joyful Word - to preach peace and freedom for all beings in the Universe. In so doing, they are often faced with danger and hostility. Therefore we beseech you to render us assistance in our efforts. Whether you have already heard the Joyful Word or there is still room for it in your soul, please assist the efforts of our brethren. We are Гонер, descendants of the unique Earth, the cradle of mankind and protectors of its Truth in this Universe.


Noah Gaffelt

[center][select value='payfirst']$DONAT_1$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paysecond']$DONAT_2$ Credits[/select]
[select value='paythird']$DONAT_3$ Credits[/select]
[select value='payfourth']$DONAT_4$ Credits[/select][/center]

[author]Suzeann Gusta[/author][title]Acknowledgement[/title]
We thank you for the support you have shown in your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Suzeann Gusta, Chairwoman "Little Suzie Foundation"

[author]Suzeann Gusta[/author][title]Many thanks![/title]
We would like to thank you for your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits.

Many thanks!


Suzeann Gusta, Chairwoman, "Little Suzie Foundation"

[author]Suzeann Gusta[/author][title]Sincere gratitude.[/title]
In the name of all affected families, we thank you for the $CREDITS$ Credits you have donated. Thanks to your generosity, we can give support to many more families.


Suzeann Gusta, Chairwoman, "Little Suzie Foundation"

[author]Suzeann Gusta[/author][title]Deep gratitude[/title]
The "Little Suzie Foundation" offers its heartfelt gratitude for your incredibly generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits! Thanks to your donation, we can widen our activities to more distant sectors.


Suzeann Gusta, Chairwoman, "Little Suzie Foundation"

[author]Suzeann Gusta[/author][title]Thanks[/title]
Although we have some reservations about you, we accept your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits and hope your relations with our people will improve in the future.


Suzeann Gusta, Chairwoman, "Little Suzie Foundation"

[author]Suzeann Gusta[/author][title]Transaction failed...[/title]
We are glad that you wish to support us by donating $CREDITS$ Credits. Sadly we were unable to debit the sum from your account due to there being insufficient funds in your account.


Suzeann Gusta, Chairwoman, "Little Suzie Foundation"

[author]Jo Poler[/author][title]Thank you![/title]
We appreciate your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits .


Jo Poler, Аргон Victims of War

[author]Jo Poler[/author][title]Many Thanks![/title]
We wish to thank you for supporting our efforts. Relief will be brought to many needy Аргон citizens, thanks to your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Jo Poler, Аргон Victims of War

[author]Jo Poler[/author][title]Thank you very much!![/title]
The Аргон Victims of War would like to extend grateful thanks to you for your generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits. We are delighted by your generosity; these funds will be of considerable help.


Jo Poler, Аргон Victims of War

[author]Jo Poler[/author][title]The Аргон people thank you![/title]
Please also accept the gratitude of the Аргон Federal Government as well as the Аргон Victims of war Charity Committee for your most selfless donation of $CREDITS$ Credits. It is a shame that there aren't more entrepreneurs like you in the universe to help those unable to help themselves. Thanks once more,


Jo Poler, Аргон Victims of War

[author]Jo Poler[/author][title]Your contribution is appreciated![/title]
It is unfortunate that your generosity does not match your reputation. We hope your relations with our people grow as large as your generosity. Please accept our gratitude for your offering of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Jo Poler, Аргон Victims of War

[author]Jo Poler[/author][title]Transfer error...[/title]
An error occurred while transferring your pledged amount of $CREDITS$ Credits; the sum was not present in your account. If you still wish to make a donation please ensure adequate funds are available.


Jo Poler, Аргон Victims of War

[author]Hali Lo[/author][title]Thank you![/title]
We thank you for your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Hali Lo, 

The Markus Spacefly Protection Society

[author]Hali Lo[/author][title]Accept our thanks![/title]
Our campaign management is glad to receive your generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits. Many thanks.


Hali Lo, 

The Markus Spacefly Protection Society

[author]Hali Lo[/author][title]Please accept our grateful thanks[/title]
On behalf of all friends of the Markus Spacefly, we would like to offer our sincere thanks to you for the kind donation of $CREDITS$ Credits that you have chosen to invest in our projects.


Hali Lo, The Markus Spacefly Protection Society

[author]Hali Lo[/author][title]Deep appreciation[/title]
We are honoured by your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits and see this as a sign of your willingness to help us fight for the salvation of our beloved Markus Spacefly.


Hali Lo, 

The Markus Spacefly Protection Society

[author]Hali Lo[/author][title]Thanks stranger...[/title]
Your support for the Markus Spacefly is appreciated - your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits is very welcome! Even though you are a relative stranger to us, we accept your generous offer in the spirit it was intended.


Hali Lo, 

The Markus Spacefly Protection Society

[author]Hali Lo[/author][title]Apologies[/title]
There appears to have been an unfortunate error while debiting the offered sum from your account. We beg your pardon and indulgence to try once more to transfer the sum of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Hali Lo, 

The Markus Spacefly Protection Society

[author]Hala Li[/author][title]Many thanks![/title]
We thank you for your kind support of our research work with your offering of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Hala Li, 

Public Relations, RBSI

[author]Hala Li[/author][title]Sincere thanks![/title]
We are pleased that you demonstrate your enthusiasm for scientific research and interstellar cooperation. Your gift of $CREDITS$ Credits is a welcome addition towards our projects.


Hala Li, 

Public Relations, RBSI

[author]Hala Li[/author][title]Special thanks![/title]
It is with great honour that we call entrepreneurs such you a friend of the Boron. Your generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits is much appreciated.


Hala Li, 

Public Relations, RBSI

[author]Hala Li[/author][title]Royal Gratitude[/title]
In the name of the Boron Royal Family, we convey to you our sincere appreciation in respect of your deeply benevolent gesture. Your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits will ensure the continuity of our good work.


Hala Li, 

Public Relations, RBSI

[author]Hala Li[/author][title]Acknowledgement[/title]
With great pleasure, we recognise your efforts to improve your poor standing with our people. But your offering of $CREDITS$ Credits alone, is not enough. Nevertheless, we thank you for this donation.


Hala Li, 

Public Relations, RBSI

[author]Hala Li[/author][title]Our sincere apologies[/title]
It is with regret that we must inform you of a problem with your generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits. We were unable to identify the cause of the problem, which is no doubt an error on our part. We would invite you to kindly attempt the transfer of the sum once more at your earliest opportunity.


Hala Li, 

Public Relations, RBSI

[author]Kao t'Zhht[/author][title]Спліт require your attention![/title]
Split say, Спліт received your $CREDITS$ Credits.


Kao t'Zhht, Elite Warrior Academy

[author]Kao t'Zhht[/author][title]Спліт acknowledge payment![/title]
Your deposit of $CREDITS$ Credits has arrived. Academy now trains fearsome warriors.


Kao t'Zhht, Elite Warrior Academy

[author]Kao t'Zhht[/author][title]Спліт give thanks![/title]
Honour and glory of all Спліт is increased by Elite Warrior Academy. Hence Спліт thank you for the donation of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Kao t'Zhht, Elite Warrior Academy

[author]Kao t'Zhht[/author][title]Спліт offer gratitude![/title]
Creature has great honour. Even Сім'я Ронкар hear of your generous offering of $CREDITS$ Credits and send their regards.


Kao t'Zhht, Elite Warrior Academy

[author]Kao t'Zhht[/author][title]Creature is unrecognised![/title]
You think you can buy honour?! Спліт take your $CREDITS$ Credits but you must prove your honour by actions!


Kao t'Zhht, Elite Warrior Academy

[author]Kao t'Zhht[/author][title]Creature attempts trickery![/title]
You try to betray Спліт?! You not have $CREDITS$ Credits. Спліт very angry!


Kao t'Zhht, Elite Warrior Academy

[author]Chi t'Nnk[/author][title]Спліт give information![/title]
Split received your $CREDITS$ Credits. A pitiful sum!


Chi t'Nnk, Spacefly Research Institute

[author]Chi t'Nnk[/author][title]Спліт acknowledge donation![/title]
Split received your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits. Спліт use this to buy new a spacefly collector ...


Chi t'Nnk, Spacefly Research Institute

[author]Chi t'Nnk[/author][title]Спліт give thanks![/title]
Split give thanks for your gift of $CREDITS$ Credits. Very useful for research.


Chi t'Nnk, Spacefly Research Institute

[author]Chi t'Nnk[/author][title]Спліт confer great honour![/title]
Your benevolent offering of $CREDITS$ Credits greatly honours the Спліт. Спліт are impressed.


Chi t'Nnk, Spacefly Research Institute

[author]Chi t'Nnk[/author][title]Спліт accept payment![/title]
The creature is without honour, but Спліт will take the $CREDITS$ Credits. If the creature is fortunate, Спліт look more kindly on it in future.


Chi t'Nnk, Spacefly Research Institute

[author]Chi t'Nnk[/author][title]Спліт amused[/title]
Split think you are greedy Теладі lizard. First big promises about $CREDITS$ Credits, then nothing given. But Спліт not stupid - you also gain nothing. You bring shame upon us!


Chi t'Nnk, Spacefly Research Institute

[author]Almanckarsat[/author][title]The Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality[/title]
Our Institute received your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Almanckarsat
Head of the Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality, 
Consultant of the Priest Duke for Holy matters, 
Member of the Паранід Research Council, 
Favourite of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia.

[author]Almanckarsat[/author][title]Your oblation[/title]
On behalf of our Institute, I thank your for your gift of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Almanckarsat
Head of the Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality, 
Consultant of the Priest Duke for Holy matters, 
Member of the Паранід Research Council, 
Favourite of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia.

[author]Almanckarsat[/author][title]Your kind oblation[/title]
Your generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits draws you ever closer to the beauty of the Three-Dimensionality. The acknowledgment of the Паранід will be granted to you.


Almanckarsat
Head of the Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality, 
Consultant of the Priest Duke for Holy matters, 
Member of the Паранід Research Council, 
Favourite of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia.

[author]Almanckarsat[/author][title]Your selfless act of oblatory benevolence[/title]
You truly are a generous being. Rarely do we receive gifts such as yours, we are deeply warmed by the blessing of your $CREDITS$ Credits. The Holy Three-Dimensionality will be with you.


Almanckarsat
Head of the Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality, 
Consultant of the Priest Duke for Holy matters, 
Member of the Паранід Research Council, 
Favourite of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia.

[author]Almanckarsat[/author][title]Tainted[/title]
We understand your humble wish for enlightenment, so we will accept your $CREDITS$ Credits in good faith, but that is the extent of our dealings with you, unholy one.


Almanckarsat
Head of the Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality, 
Consultant of the Priest Duke for Holy matters, 
Member of the Паранід Research Council, 
Favourite of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia.

[author]Almanckarsat[/author][title]Ignorant fool[/title]
It appears you are not able to do simple calculations. You do not have the $CREDITS$ Credits you said you wished to donate. We would expect nothing less from a lower-life.


Almanckarsat
Head of the Research Institute of the Holy Three-Dimensionality, 
Consultant of the Priest Duke for Holy matters, 
Member of the Паранід Research Council, 
Favourite of the Pontifex Maximus Paranidia.

[author]Kelmanckotsat[/author][title]Your Support[/title]
Your oblation of $CREDITS$ Credits to support the Pilgrimage has been received. It is a modest offering but everyone does what he can.


Kelmanckotsat
Chairman of the Pilgrimage Organisation Committee,
Bishop of Trinity Sanctum, 
High priest interpreter of the Bashra, 
Protector of the Scrolls of Wisdom, 
Priest Duke's ecumenical advisor, 
Xaar's Honour Guard

[author]Kelmanckotsat[/author][title]Thank You![/title]
The Organisation Committee of the Pilgrimage thanks you for supporting this important event with a donation of $CREDITS$ Credits.


Kelmanckotsat
Chairman of the Pilgrimage Organisation Committee,
Bishop of Trinity Sanctum, 
High priest interpreter of the Bashra, 
Protector of the Scrolls of Wisdom, 
Priest Duke's ecumenical advisor, 
Xaar's Honour Guard

[author]Kelmanckotsat[/author][title]Thrice Do We Thank you![/title]
The generosity shown in your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits has been well noted. Accept the gratitude of the Pilgrimage Organisation Committee and the Pilgrims themselves.


Kelmanckotsat
Chairman of the Pilgrimage Organisation Committee,
Bishop of Trinity Sanctum, 
High Priest interpreter of the Bashra, 
Protector of the Scrolls of Wisdom, 
Priest Duke's ecumenical advisor, 
Xaar's Honour Guard

[author]Kelmanckotsat[/author][title]With gratitude for your munificence[/title]
His Holiness, Pontifex Maximus Paranidia, has been informed of your generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits and sends word of his gratitude.


Kelmanckotsat
Chairman of the Pilgrimage Organisation Committee,
Bishop of Trinity Sanctum, 
High priest interpreter of the Bashra, 
Protector of the Scrolls of Wisdom, 
Priest Duke's ecumenical advisor, 
Xaar's Honour Guard

[author]Kelmanckotsat[/author][title]Unholy lower-life[/title]
Your impurity does not favour you. We are, however, willing to accept your $CREDITS$ Credits.


Kelmanckotsat
Chairman of the Pilgrimage Organisation Committee,
Bishop of Trinity Sanctum, 
High Priest interpreter of the Bashra, 
Protector of the Scrolls of Wisdom, 
Priest Duke's ecumenical advisor, 
Xaar's Honour Guard

[author]Kelmanckotsat[/author][title]Inept lower-life[/title]
Accept your inferiority. Even the simple transfer of $CREDITS$ is beyond you.


Kelmanckotsat
Chairman of the Pilgrimage Organisation Committee,
Bishop of Trinity Sanctum, 
High Priest interpreter of the Bashra, 
Protector of the Scrolls of Wisdom, 
Priest Duke's ecumenical advisor, 
Xaar's Honour Guard

[author]Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI[/author][title]Confirmation[/title]
We confirm the receipt of your $CREDITS$ Credits.

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI, Chairman of The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce

[author]Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI[/author][title]Information[/title]
The Теладі Company acknowledges your willingness to increase profit. We have received your deposit of $CREDITS$.

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI, Chairman of The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce

[author]Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI[/author][title]Great Profit[/title]
Your generosity is impressive. The Теладі Company assures you that your investment of $CREDITS$ Credits will soon be accruing interest.

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI, Chairman of The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce

[author]Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI[/author][title]Profit is life![/title]
Few entrepreneurs stick to this Теладі maxim as much as you do. We see you have a nose for profit. The Теладі Company is very pleased to have someone like you amongst its investors. Your deposit totals $CREDITS$ Credits.

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI,Chairman of The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce

[author]Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI[/author][title]Notification[/title]
In accordance with the principles of the Теладі Company, we accept your deposit of $CREDITS$ Credits. We are, however, still concerned with your low commercial standing amongst the Теладі.

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI, Chairman of The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce

[author]Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI[/author][title]Accounting error[/title]
We were not able to verify the receipt of your deposit of $CREDITS$ Credits. Please check the availability of the funds.


Yoyunis Tismaneos Ganatos VI, Chairman of The Теладі Company Chamber of Commerce

[author]Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX[/author][title]Debit[/title]
The Теладі have debited the $CREDITS$ Credits from your account as ordered.

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX, Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії

[author]Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX[/author][title]Receipt[/title]
Your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits to the Hatchery on Platinum Ball has been received. Thank you!

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX, Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії

[author]Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX[/author][title]Thank You![/title]
With the investment of $CREDITS$ Credits, you have made a tremendous contribution towards the maintenance and development of our famous and beloved Hatchery on Platinum Ball. This investment in its future will soon bring profit to all.

Retain this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX, Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії

[author]Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX[/author][title]Теладі are impressed![/title]
Generosity such as yours will be hard to match. You have proven your worth with your investment of $CREDITS$ Credits. The Hatchery's future is assured with investment such as this.

Keep this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX, Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії

[author]Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX[/author][title]Payment received[/title]
Teladi do not trust you... but profit is life and a deal is a deal. We accept your $CREDITS$ Credits.

Keep this message, it is used as a receipt for your donation.


Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX, Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії

[author]Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX[/author][title]Accounting error[/title]
We were not able to transfer the $CREDITS$ Credits from your account. Please check the availability of funds and try to transfer the sum again as soon as possible.


Dasinos Hibilis Yahondras IX, Friends of the Platinum Ball Hatchery, Гордість Компанії

[author]Noah Gaffelt[/author][title]Thank you![/title]We thank you for supporting our quest with $CREDITS$ Credits.


Noah Gaffelt

[author]Noah Gaffelt[/author][title]Cordial Thanks![/title]
There are no words to express our thanks for your very welcome donation of $CREDITS$ Credits. Many Thanks.


Noah Gaffelt

[author]Noah Gaffelt[/author][title]Deep Gratitude![/title]
Your generous donation of $CREDITS$ Credits validates the importance of our task and the necessity to reach our goals. Our sincere thanks!


Noah Gaffelt

[author]Noah Gaffelt[/author][title]Your Selfless Benevolence[/title]
We are deeply honoured by your donation of $CREDITS$ Credits. The huge sum you have given almost exceeds our needs. We hope you have no objection to us using some of it to support our brothers who choose now to settle on distant worlds.


Noah Gaffelt

[author]Noah Gaffelt[/author][title]Hear the Joyful Word![/title]
It pleases us greatly that even though the Joyful Word does not resound in your heart, people such as you are willing to give support to our cause with donations such as $CREDITS$ Credits. We pray that in helping us you will now freely give the news of the Joyful Word to others.


Noah Gaffelt

[author]Noah Gaffelt[/author][title]Unfortunate problem[/title]
It pains me to inform you that we could not debit the $CREDITS$ Credits from your account. Perhaps you might want to check this and try again soon.


Noah Gaffelt

page.title: BBS Pirate's Crate
page.t: [author]$AUTHOR$[/author][title]Attention Pilots![/title][text][justify]One of my baka ne ex-pilots 'lost' one of my more important consignments. Since he's now sleeping with the spaceflies, I'm looking for another more [b]skilled pilot[/b] to recover my valuable freight. Since some of my rivals want it too, this pilot must have [b]good combat skills[/b] and a ship that can haul at least [b]$CARGOVOLUME$ units of $CARGOSIZE$-sized containers[/b]. There are [b]$REWARD$ Credits[/b] up for grabs here, don't disappoint me.[/justify]\n\n[center][select value='accept']Contact $AUTHOR$[/select][/center][/text]
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Are you talking to me? You smell like an informant!
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Stop wasting my time. I said I was looking for a [b]skilled pilot[/b]!
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Either make some space or get a bigger ship! You'll need at least $CARGOVOLUME$ free units for this trip.
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Can you read? I told you your bucket needs to be able to take $CARGOSIZE$ containers... \n\nAre you still here?
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]I need your undivided attention for this job - come back when you've finished your other job!
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]You told me you are a skilled pilot! By the look of it, you don't even come close. The deal's off, I'll look for someone else.
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Don't dare tell me you got lost and don't even let me think you stole my stuff! In any case, you lose, the deal's off! Don't darken my docking clamps again!
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]You call those fighting skills?! One of my freighter pilots could have done better! Your mission's over.
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]What's this? There is something missing! Are you trying to trick me or are you just plain stupid? Get off this station while your ship still flies!

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]I can't believe it! My base just got destroyed in a fierce attack. Look, I have other more important things to worry about now; forget the crate. Thanks for your effort, but the deal's off.
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Well done, $PILOT$! Here's your money, you've earned it.
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Outstanding, $PILOT$! Here is your reward. You did a good job, I'll remember that.

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Ah, there you are. Here are the coordinates of my crate. Look near $X_COORD$m, $Y_COORD$m and $Z_COORD$m. But be careful, you may not be the only one looking for it. If you pick it up, bring it quickly back to my base.
[author[$AUTHOR$[/author]Get moving, pilot! I've been waiting for my stuff long enough now.
[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Ah, you're back, but where's my stuff? Go and get it, if you want the money!!

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Oh good, you made it back. I'm feeling generous, so you can choose your reward.


[center][select value='credits']$REWARD$ Credits[/select]
[select value = 'software']$SOFTWARE$[/select][/center]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author]Hey, you look like you could do it - fly to sector $SECTOR$ and have a scan. The crate has a transponder so I can find it and tell you its position, while you are in the same sector as it.\n\n[center][select value = 'start']As you wish[/select][/center]

[author]$AUTHOR02$[/author][justify]Unbelievable! All my pilots got killed! I am $AUTHOR02$ and am currently at the [b]$ALTERNATIVE_STATION$[/b] in [b]this sector[/b]. Ok, pilot, you're handy in a fight, so here's the deal: you bring [b]me[/b] the [b]$WARENAME$[/b] and I pay you [b]twice as much[/b] as you were originally offered by my rival. Interested? If you are, just dock here![/justify]

[author]$AUTHOR02$[/author]Aha, you're here. So are you sure you really want to sell me that stuff for $ALTERNATIVE_REWARD$ Credits?

[center][select value='yes']Give me the money[/select]
[select value='no']No, I'm not going to betray my client[/select][/center]

[author]$AUTHOR02$[/author]Thanks, matey. You did well out of that deal! Don't expect $AUTHOR$ to welcome you back with open arms, though. He'll be pretty angry. You might want to give him a wide berth for a while.

page.title: BBS Quest Blackmail
page.descr: Text for BBS offer to protect from pirate bomb
page.t: [author]$AUTHOR$[/author][justify]Pilot, this is $AUTHOR$, I oversee all operations aboard this station. I also protect those who choose to use our services. No doubt you are aware that Pirate bases are not the safest of places. Your enemies are perhaps closer than you realise. I can offer you protection from any potential threat or damage to you or your ship; for a small fee, naturally. You would be wise to take me up on this offer.[/justify]\n\n[center][select value='moreinfo']How much is my safety going to cost me?[/select][/center]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][justify]The cost of $CREDITS$ Credits will allow me to station a couple of AI Defence Borgs close to your ship, along with a member of my protectorate who will ensure all is well. Surely you can see the value in this now?[/justify]

[center][select value='accept']That seems like a fair deal. But cross me and you're as good as dead.[/select]
[select value='decline']I think I'll take my chances, no deal. Take your protection racket elsewhere.[/select][/center]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][justify]Such a shame that your funds are below what we would require. As such, we cannot guarantee your protection during your stay with us. But of course, our offer remains. Return to me should you find the money to secure your safety.[/justify]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][justify]Excellent! I see you have some sense in that strange skull of yours. I have engaged both AI Defence Borgs and a protectorate officer close to your ship. They will remain there for as long as you are docked. A pleasure doing business with you, come back should you require our services again.[/justify]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][justify]Such a shame that you have chosen to decline my offer. A bad choice if I may say. You might want to stay close to your ship, we wouldn't want anything bad to happen to it, would we? Oh, and we appear to be experiencing power surges at this time, I would stay away from the dark.. it would be terrible if you were to be injured, or worse..[/justify]

[author]$AUTHOR$[/author][justify]Pilot, your ship is already protected, but we can, of course, raise the level of security for our more discerning customers. You can never be too well protected from the foul scum who lurk within our dark station.[/justify]

page.title: ticaki's-scripts
page.t: I cannot work like this; how can I work productively for station: \033Y%s\033X \nif you won't allow me to work with\033R any products\033X? I'm taking a break,\nuntil you can issue me with reasonable orders.

I must%s inform you that your factory account: \033Y%s\033X does not appear to carry sufficient funds to cover my costs.\nI will take a break until sufficient means are available.\nOutstanding debts: \033R%s cr 10 % \033X

You thought you could stab me in the back and not pay your debts?! This ship isn't going another meter! In the meantime you owe me \033R%s\033X cr including interest and Union penalties. Transfer the money into the factory account for Station \033Y%s\033X so that I can get access to it. Just for your information, if you take too long over it, I have the right to sell your \033R%s\033X and find myself a new job.

You have taken too long to pay.
 The%s will be impounded immediately. I have already found a new employer; pilots with my experience are in demand. 
Freighter: \033Y%s\033X 
Sector: \033Y%s\033X
\033Y%s\033X \(%s\) has been promoted to level %s. Training costs: \033Y%s cr\033X
Oh... um... I would... but...\nTo be honest I don't have enough experience to be able to supply Station: \033Y%s\033X yet. Please give me an easier order to begin with.
Well done...\n If you had read my Contract you would have realised that I cannot start from this Station!
Пірат using Спліт and Паранід TS

This is freighter: \033Y%s\033X from your station: \033Y%s\033X.
As a result of severe hull damage I have flown to station: \033Y%s\033X
and await your orders. 

Sector: \033Y%s\033X 
Station: \033Y%s\033X

page.title: ArcaJeth.SMS
page.t: [author]Station Management System[/author]\033GSMS Mini started:\033X %s\n\(to start the Standard-Version you have to adjust the ...(Ressourcenpreise) using the SMS-Cofiguration.\)

[author]Station Management System[/author][u]\033RAttention!\033X This is a warning![/u]\nYou could not pay the fees for using the SMS at one ore more of your stations, therefore an amount of \033R%s Credits\033X debts has been accumulated! I Ask you for paying your debts as soon as possible. Otherwise I would be forced to apply other measures.\nMay profit go with you.

[author]Station Management System[/author][u]\033RATTENTION!\033X This is the last warning![/u]\nYou could not pay the fees for using the SMS at one ore more of your stations, therefore an amount of \033R%s Credits\033X debts has been accumulated! I Ask you for paying your debts as soon as possible. Otherwise I would be forced to apply other measures.\nMay profit go with you.
[author]Station Management System[/author]\033RAdvice:\033X Because you did not pay your debts of \033R%s Credits\033X, I had no other choice than distraining your station %s\nMay profit go with you.
[author]Station Management System[/author]\033RAdvice:\033X Thanks you for paying back you debts!\nMay profit go with you.

[author]Station Management System[/author]\033RAdvice:\033X Thank you for partially paying back your debts, I also ask you to pay the rest of \033R%s Credits\033X as soon as possible!\nMay profit go with you.

[author]Station Management System[/author]\033RAdvice:\033X An error emerged within the enhanced options, only the input values \033Y0\033X \(for no or deactivate\) and \033Y1\033X \(for yes or activate\) are allowed!
[author]Station Management System[/author]\033RAttention:\033X The capital of your station \033Y%s\033X has fallen below the limit of %s Credits. It would be advisable to check your adjustments.
[author]Station Management System[/author]\033RGreetings from the Station Management System V3.0\033X\n---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n

page.title: Basic Patrol Messages
page.t: You have to provide me with a list of sectors to patrol if you want to issue the Patrol Multi-Sector command. The command to define a patrol route is in the \033YAdditional Ship Commands\033X area of the command console.
My Patrol List currently only contains one sector: \033Y%s\033X. If you only have one sector you'd like me to patrol, the Patrol Single Sector command should be used.
If you want to use the Patrol Single Sector command, you must give me four waypoints that are all in the same sector.

You don't have enough money in your account to pay for the patrol service. We are now officially on strike from further patrols. All standing orders have been terminated. After you come up with 50,000Cr to pay for damages, you can re-issue patrol commands. Only then will we listen.
You have given me a sector to patrol that I cannot reach.

I regret to inform you that I have been waiting for \033Y%s\033X of my wingmen to show up for quite some time. You might want to check the patrol route, but I fear the worst. I cannot afford to delay the patrol anymore. I am forced to continue on.

This is patrolship: \033Y%s\033X from your station: \033Y%s\033X.
As a result of severe hull damage I have left the patrol and flown to station: \033Y%s\033X
I await your orders.

Sector: \033Y%s\033X Station: \033Y%s\033X

Merchant marine transports carrying Military Personnel throughout Аргон space

[center][b]Аргон Navy Merchant Marine Program[/b][/center]

[justify][b]From:[/b] Admiralty of the Аргон Navy
[b]To:[/b] %s
[b]Re:[/b] Merchant Marine Military Personnel Program

The Admiralty of the Аргон Navy regret to inform you that the Merchant Marine Military Personnel program has been suspended. No military personnel transports are currently operating anywhere in Аргон controlled space.

[center][b]Аргон Navy Merchant Marine Program[/b][/center]

[justify][b]From:[/b] %s
[b]To:[/b] %s
[b]Re:[/b] Merchant Marine Liaison

Good day, I am Lieutenant %s of the Аргон Navy, and am the merchant liaison for the Merchant Marine Military Personnel program. I have been ordered to provide you with information on the movements of transports carrying military personnel in order to expedite their potential assignment as crew for your ships. Do keep in mind that crew assignments of military personnel are on a strictly first-come-first-serve basis.

The following transports are currently operating:[/justify]
[b]%s[/b]: Flying from %s to %s,\n Current status: %s the [b][u]%s[/u][/b] sector.\n
Has just arrived and is debarking personnel in

[center][b]Аргон Navy Merchant Marine Program[/b][/center]

[justify][b]From:[/b] Admiralty of the Аргон Navy
[b]To:[/b] %s
[b]Re:[/b] Cost of Merchant Marine Transport Report

The Admiralty of the Аргон Navy regret to inform you that your current credit balance is insufficient to pay for a report on the current status of our merchant marine military transports.

The cost of this report is %s credits. This money helps defray the costs of maintaining liason officers and transporting military personnel to local trading and equipment docks throughout Аргон space. Your ongoing support will ensure that we are able to continue this program.

We thank you for your understanding.
Resupply tenders carrying munitions to capital ships

page.title: Intro Menus
page.t: Jump right in to the action and discover the exciting events that are brewing in the X Universe. Trade your way to wealth, fight off your ruthless foes, and build a lasting legacy.
Wield the developing power of your fledgling fleet and face the X Universe head on. You are well equipped for your journey, but there may be advantages to doing it the hard way...
Conquer a harsh and unforgiving universe with the pure power of your will. Struggles will present themselves at every turn. Even your enemies loathe you with an unusual intensity.
You have the tools and the passion to discover the riches of the myriad worlds around you. Follow your lifelong dreams and uncover the mysteries of the X Universe.
Leverage your business skills to master and dominate the trade lanes. Amass the ultimate fortune and spread the fingers of your empire to the far reaches of the stars.
Your combat skills are formidable, but your bank account is not. Your capacity for destruction is your only tool for clawing your way above the rest of the world's petty scum.
Tolerated by few, accepted by none. Only you will ever know whether your criminal branding is justly deserved, and only you can redeem yourself... if you even care to bother trying.
Seize your rare and precious opportunity to earn a name for yourself. Stand apart from your millions of fellow Аргон citizens, and etch your name in the stone of history.
Not being royalty makes it exceedingly difficult to command any respect at all. Prove your noble worth as a lar to the kingdom... and to the rest of the universe while you're at it.
Honour the glorious commands of Xaar and take your place among the loyal saints. Shine as a beacon of holiness and purity to the benighted aliens of the universe.
Claim glory for your downtrodden family on the field of battle. Wield the weapons, cunning, and strength of a true warrior, and vanquish any foe who stands in your path.
It's all about the profits. Make the big buckzoids and leave your mark on the business world for generations to come.
Fulfil your duties to bring truth and peace to the broken, ruined souls of the universe. Spread light, honesty, justice, and unity... or forsake those teachings for a darker path.
Crush the insolent and unworthy realm of inferior beings that so thoughtlessly invaded your world and destroyed your home. Let nothing stand untouched!
