page.title: Gametips
page.descr: Ingame tips for the player that are shown once an action is performed for the first time.
page.t: Welcome to the Interactive Assistance System. This feature of your ship computer will automatically present information about common tasks you may wish to perform, based on your current location and situation. You can access all information in one location by choosing Options, then All Tips from your ship menu. Data will be streamed to your onboard computer should you encounter species or items requiring further information essential to your survival. If at any time you wish to disable this data-stream, you may do so by changing from Beginner to Veteran in the Options menu of your ship interface.

You have acquired your first weapon system. While in combat, you can configure up to four weapons profiles to control which weapons are loaded and active. Next to each weapon slot indicator on your HUD is a selector which you can use to activate or deactivate the given weapon slot in each weapons profile. You can switch profiles at any time by selecting the profile number icon on the HUD, or via a hotkey. Due to the complexity of installing weapons systems, you will only be able to change the types of weapons loaded on your ship when you are docked, at which time you can install and remove weapons via the Weapons menu.

You can observe other ships and stations in your sector via the monitor window in the upper right corner of your display. The monitor in the upper left will display a view of your current target. You can monitor your target by opening the Identification menu \(press [VK_IDENTIFY]\) and selecting the Monitor option.

Your ship's data interface can be controlled with the mouse. To activate the mouse cursor, press [VK_MOUSETOGGLE]. You can fully customise your interface controls by selecting the Controls item from the Options menu.

Most common functions of your ship interface can be accessed directly with the quick-access icon bar on the right side of your display. Select the up arrow to open the icon bar. You can also access many common functions with configurable hotkeys. These keys can be customised by selecting the Controls item from the Options menu.

Around the edges of your display you will see targeting icons for all contacts your scanners have picked up. Select these icons to target the object and receive additional options for interacting with the object. Your HUD will automatically display indicators of the target's status and current position.

Different ships are capable of deploying different missiles. While all ships can carry missiles as cargo \(provided they have sufficient space\), many missile systems are only supported by certain ships. You can review your ship's missile capabilities specification in the Weapons screen as well as the Ship Details screen. When docked, your ship's information is accessible through the Personal area of the main menu. While flying in space, this information is directly available through the Current Ship area.

This ship has multiple weapons turrets. You can manually control these turrets by pressing [VK_COCKPITVIEW] to cycle through them, or configure them to automatically respond to threats via the Orders screen for your ship.

The dregs of the underworld, criminal fringe, and lawless scum of the universe gather in these pirate bases to trade in illegal goods and arrange for various shady activities. Regardless of your reasons for being here, your very presence is likely to earn you a death mark from someone. Dealing with the pirate clans can be immensely profitable, but don't be surprised to find a bomb planted in your cargo bay.

You are in close proximity to a trade ship. With a special Freight Scanner upgrade, you can check the contents of other ships and their cargo bays. Note that while you can scan ships freely, most governments require that you have a special Police License to use a Freight Scanner. Scanning without a license can have serious consequences.

With appropriate policing licenses, you can actively engage in combat with confirmed enemies, as well as intercept and neutralise smugglers without casting any undue suspicion on yourself in the process. Many local governments offer nominal bounties for terminating invaders and criminals, so skilled vigilantes can earn a substantial living by holding security licenses. The license also allows you to use a Freight Scanner device to locate criminals and smugglers.

You have locked on to a civilian ship. These vessels comprise the bulk of the space-faring population, and are the lifeblood of the economy. Civilian transports are primarily menial in nature, and pose no particular threat.

Sector police vessels primarily work to maintain the peace within their space, as well as ensure ships in transit through the sector are not carrying illegal cargo. Enemies and criminals are likely to be dealt with very harshly by the local security forces.

You can eject from your ship at any time with the Ejection hotkey \([VK_EJECT]\). You can also use this hotkey to re-enter a ship you own while you are in your spacesuit. An option to enter your own ships will be available in the Identification menu when you are close enough to the ship.

This ship is currently not claimed by any owner. To take possession of this ship, eject from your ship and approach it in your spacesuit. When you are close enough to the ship, an option to enter it will become available in the Identification menu.

You have received a warning from your Ship A.I. At your current position, your ship computer is unable to lock down a safe trajectory along which to fly. Please take manual control and move your ship to a location that will allow vector recalculations to be completed successfully.

You will fly a race now. Fly to the marked start position and wait there for the start. After the start, follow the targetted waypoint objects until you reach the finish line first. You will lose race if you leave the sector or if you are last and more than 30 seconds behind the racer in front of you.

Saya has used a Jump Scanner to find out where Marani jumped to. The coordinates have been uploaded to your boardcomputer. When you open your jumpdrive menu with [VK_JUMPDRIVE], you will have the option to choose these coordinates directly or select another location from the galaxy map.

Once you have hired a TL class ship and loaded your station on board, you will need to give it further instructions. To do this, go to the station menu and select the ship from the list of landed ships. You can then give the Captain your orders.

The laser target computer enables you to target your enemy more effectively. It provides two features to help you in combat. It allows your ship computer to automatically adjust the laser direction by a few degrees to improve accuracy, and it also provides you with a lead firing indicator to help you aim in the right direction. Press [VK_LASERTARGETMODE] or click the icon to the left of the lasergroups to toggle between the available target modes.

You are able to mine precious metals and minerals from asteroids, once they have been broken up into small enough pieces. After the asteroid has been fragmented, - either by mining laser or Hornet missile, you will then need to break it up further using laser weaponry. Eventually you will be able to source rocks that are small enough to be refined by your Ore Collector, which you must have installed. You will notice them by their differing colour. Be aware that these small rocks will vaporise if fired upon. Open your freight bay and collect the rock as you would do standard cargo cannisters to initiate pick-up. Please be aware that there is currently only one miner ship available that is able to handle a front-mounted mobile drilling system. It is up to you to source locations for this vessel's purchase or acquisition.

If you wish to buy a station at this shipyard, you will need to engage the services of a TL class ship. This vessel will dock with the shipyard on your behalf and load all material required for installation. You will be able to issue commands to the TL after your purchase, allowing you to specify which sector and in what physical location your station is to be unloaded. While hired, the TL will make a charge for every sector you travel through.

Shipyards are the prime location for purchasing, repairing, and selling ships. Ships of many different classes and variants are produced in shipyards throughout the universe. Smaller ships such as the M5 class provide fast but lightly armed scout ships. TS freighters are excellent platforms for carrying trade cargoes. Many ships are available in variants that improve specific aspects of the ship's performance, such as shielding power or cargo capacity. Heavily customized ships are rare, however, and thus very valuable.

You have targeted another object in your local vicinity. You can identify this target by pressing [VK_IDENTIFY]. The Target Identification menu will allow you to access additional details about your target and provides options for interacting with your target.

Once you have engaged the services of a TL class vessel, you can either dock at the shipyard and interact with the station's trade interface directly, or you can trade remotely providing you have the necessary trade software. Either way, you will need to wait until the TL has docked and confirmed it has authorisation to trade on your behalf before you can begin to make purchases.

Now that you have deployed your first station, it is time for you to choose various options that will affect both your profit, as well as the level of business and turn-over you achieve. Setting your selling price high might scare off potential buyers, but if it is too low you may lose money on your products. Similarly, be sure to buy your resources for reasonable prices to optimise your profit margin. Here you can also control how many sectors away ships assigned to this station will fly to buy and sell goods, via the Jumps setting. Experiment with these parameters and be prepared to adjust them in response to changes in the local economy.

Any ships that you own or purchase can be assigned to your stations to buy and sell goods. To assign a ship to your station, open the Orders menu for the ship, and set the ship's Home Base to this station. You will then be able to issue Trade orders to the ship. All worker ships will follow the settings you have assigned to your station, including price and maximum travel range.

You now are in possession of multiple ships. While you are manually piloting one of your ships, you can use your others to work for you by issuing them orders. Target one of your own ships and select Orders from the Identification menu. You can change the ship you are currently flying by docking at a station, ejecting from your ship and spacewalking, or with a special teleporter device that is available at certain locations.

Equipment docks specialise in upgrades for ships. Command Software upgrades offer access to additional orders that can be issued to ships. Many different devices are available which can extend the usefulness of your ships. Additionally, you can upgrade the main engines and steering systems of your ships to improve speed and handling. Special subspace compression upgrades also allow you to expand the cargo capacity of certain ships.

Scanners operate on a variety of power levels, from close-range to long-range sector-wide overviews. More powerful scanners can be installed on your ship to provide a better view of the sector, provided that your ship is capable of handling the larger scanner equipment.

The Universe Map provides a visual display of the territory that has been recorded in your ship's computer database. It also provides you with the ability to monitor remote locations in real-time. Information from any ships, stations, or monitoring satellites you own in a sector will automatically be uploaded to your ship's computer on a regular basis, and displayed via the Universe Map.

Your ship has the ability to dock and interact with various stations. You can allow your AI subsystems to do the work for you with an auto dock \(see your operations manual for the interface commands\) or you can request docking rights manually by opening a communications channel to the station. Use the docking lights and ship speed indicators as a guide on your approach.

You will usually find gates situated at the North, East, West, and South points of a sector. Not all sectors will make use of all four jump points. Layout is dependent on your location in the universe. Be aware that on occasion you will encounter gates that are neither marked nor freely known of within the local sector traffic. An alternative means of travel is the jumpdrive device, for which you will need the minimum of an M4 class vessel and an energy source. It is commonly available from the Гонер Temple in Південно-Західна Хмарна База.

Freight comes in a variety of standardised container sizes, known by their TC class: Small, Medium, Large and Extra Large. Different ships are outfitted to handle different sized containers. You can view the maximum container size handled by your ship and the total cargo capacity in your Ship Details screen. When docked, your ship's information is accessible through the Personal area of the main menu. While flying in space, this information is directly available through the Current Ship area.

This area is your ship's command and control interface. Here you can issue and manage orders for your ships and stations. Purchasing software upgrades and installing other technology may update the command software with additional orders and options.

Пояс Руди is a particularly dense asteroid field. Here many entrepreneurs have earned a fortune through mining. There are a variety of ways you can engage in mining, from purchasing an ore or silicon mining facility at a shipyard, to using mobile drilling apparatus mounted on specially built ships. At close range, a mining rig will pummel an asteroid until it shatters, allowing you to scoop up the debris of ore or silicon into your cargo bay. Special mineral scanning upgrades are also available which can help locate the richest and most profitable deposits.

You have entered a sector that is claimed by the Ксенон. The Ксенон have been the scourge and mortal enemy of the known universe since time immemorial. With no single intelligence, they work purely on directives issued from a distributed AI of Невідомий origin. They do not communicate openly and will not listen to reason. Open combat with the Ксенон is usually considered unwise.

Your ship scanners have reported the presence of a hostile vessel nearby. The targeting system can be placed into threat-prioritisation mode by pressing [VK_NEXTENEMY]. In this mode, the targeting computer will automatically select an enemy target. Should the target lock be lost for any reason, a new target will automatically be selected.
A message has been transmitted to you and received by your ship computer. You can access the message by opening the Pilot menu and selecting the icon for Incoming Message.

Once docked at a station, you have the option to browse through and access data within the online BBS, or Bulletin Board System. Here you will find news, messages, and job opportunities. You may also come across information vendors offering you maps and other technical data.

You have purchased a weapon that requires a specific form of ammunition. It does not feed directly from your ship's energy banks, but instead draws from a supplemental ammunition supply stored in your ship's weapons bay. You can purchase ammunition for such weaponry from various suppliers, although it is likely to be cheapest directly from the manufacturer.

Here you can save and restore your status as you see fit. Saving is available free of charge when docked at any station. In addition, private insurance firms offer salvage policies that will allow you to save your status at any point you wish. Should you encounter any situation that leads to the destruction of your ship or property, and should your body be medically viable for restoration, you will be returned to the status of your last salvage point.

You have locked on to a cargo container. Containers hold a variety of items and are the standard method by which goods are stored for transit. Dependent on the size of the container and your available cargo space, you may be able to pick this container up by opening your cargo bay \(press [VK_OPENBAYDOOR]\) and guiding your ship to the location of the container. Be warned that while your cargo bay is open, your shields are down and your ship will be vulnerable.

Should you accidentally damage or destroy a ship to which you had no hostile intentions, you can contact local sector police or military units to declare the incident, - allowing you to be exonerated. Contacting a capital-class military vessel will allow all ships owned by that vessel in the sector to have their friend or foe status reset. This does not include any ships that are docked within the vessel itself. Smaller ships will of course also accept your amnesty.
WARNING\n\nThe next wave will attack in 30 minutes. You've still got time to prepare yourself. The next warning will be sent 10 minutes before the attack begins.

WARNING\n\nThe next wave will attack in 10 minutes. You should check your weapons and other fighting equipment. If you are flying a transporter you should consider transporting into a fighter ship. A last warning will be sent 1 minute before the attack begins.
WARNING\n\nThe next wave will attack in 1 minute. Prepare for the fight - Good luck!
WAVE 1 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the first attack wave.
WAVE 2 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the second attack wave. Notice that the attack waves get stronger.
WAVE 3 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the third attack wave. You should use the peaceful time between the waves to upgrade your ships.
WAVE 4 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the fourth attack wave.
WAVE 5 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the fifth attack wave. Notice that you can even buy new ships and let your ships protected you.
WAVE 6 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the sixth attack wave.
WAVE 7 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the seventh attack wave.
WAVE 8 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the eighth attack wave.
WAVE 9 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the ninth attack wave.
WAVE 10 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the tenth attack wave.
WAVE 11 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the eleventh attack wave.
WAVE 12 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the twelfth attack wave.
WAVE 13 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the thirteenth attack wave.
WAVE 14 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the fourteenth attack wave.

WAVE 15 DEFEATED\n\nCongratulations. You just survived the fifteenth attack wave. That was the last wave that you were supposed to see. In 30 seconds an ultimate Хаак attack will end this demo version.

page.title: Famous Quotes
page.t: "To consider the Earth as the only populated world in infinite space is as absurd as to assert that in an entire field of millet, only one grain will grow." \n\n- Metrodorus of Chios (400BC)

page.title: Аргон Variation 6
page.t: (Message after first -possibly accidental- hits)Hey, Dimwad! You're paying for that!
(Final warning of fighter, also for Пірат)You're really going to regret that! Try that again and you'll be eating plasma!
(Final warning of transporter)Are you looking for trouble? One more shot and I will call in a support ship!
(Starts fighting/defending)Hey, you'll look really cool as a piece of space debris!
(* Requesting help from anyone)This ship is under attack! Somebody please help!
(* Swear words - superior)You're going to get it now!
(* Shields low - Pilot close to giving up! Panicky)I can't take anymore of this. Give me a chance!

(11..19: Variations for capital ships, slightly arrogant! ==== Warning message after some -possibly accidental- hits)I demand you stop firing or you'll be in more trouble than you could possibly imagine!
(Final warning)You have received your last official warning. Anymore trouble from you and you'll be vapourised!
(Starts fighting)We did warn you! Now prepare to die!
(20..24: General answers ==== Reactions when contacted by player, i.e. Аргон arrogant, Boron friendly)You want something?
(During fight, or if player is public enemy. Can be said by person in a station too!)Go play with asteroids!
(Busy)Leave me alone! I'm too busy to babysit an other space monkey!
(Does not want to answer, possibly too low notoriety)Hey, I'm not an information station! Find someone else who can help you.
(Always the same sentence - Pilot is not responsible for answering a question)Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
(25..29: Answers on Surrender or Drop freight ==== Fighter or pirate makes fun of player, possible even during fight!)Surrender to the likes of you? Dont make me laugh!
(TS pilot or other people)You must be kidding!
(After being attacked)Never! I would rather die!
(Ship giving up STEP 2 - Pilot now leaves the ship)Ok, I give in, here is my ship. Take it, but don't kill me.
(Ship giving up STEP 1 - Dropping some freight)Please spare my life. Here is a part of my freight!
(30..34: Variations of 20..24 for capital ships, slightly arrogant! ==== Captain speaking)Captain speaking. What do you want?
(During fight, or if player is public enemy)We do not communicate with pilots such as you.
(Busy)Can't you see we're a bit busy just now?
(Does not want to answer, possibly too low notoriety)Who do you think you are? We are not an information office.
(35..39: Capital ship answer on Surrender! ==== Captain is amused/annoyed)Heh, heh, heh. That's a funny one. I'll have to tell that to the Admiral next time I see him.

(40.: Player asking for a way to an object, pilot KNOWS the answer. This can be either a station a factory or a sector so do NOT use an article in these sentences. Keep all sentences as general as possible. Gate direction is added behind this answer)That is easy. Try behind the
(Player asking for a way, player is already there. Sentence can answer questions for all kinds of objects so avoid articles)You are already there.
(Player asked for a way to an object. Pilot can not answer)Sorry, I have no idea.
(45..49: Directions added to sentences above)North gate.
(50..54: Different capital ship answer, slightly arrogant! ==== Player is hero)No problem. You have to fly through the
(After telling player the sector)I'm glad we could help you! Good bye.
(60..69: Speaker is Transportation officer aboard a TL ==== Formatted string, do not change) {,61} {1} {,62} (assembles price sentence, param 1 = xxxx Credits)
(Telling price, part 2)credits for every gate we go through.
(Cannot be hired)I'm sorry. We've got our hands full transporting cargo for someone else. We'll be free once our contract is over!
(Player cannot pay or ran out of money)Give me a call back when you can afford us!
(TL hired)We have a deal. We'll follow and charge for every gate we pass through!
(Not enough space for station)There's no room here to drop your freight. I suggest you try moving somewhere else.
(Job finished)Everything's just fine - we'll start unloading here. (followed by Good bye)
(Good bye when job finished/cancelled)It's been a financial pleasure meeting you. Come back soon.
(75..79: Speaker is police ship ==== Illegal goods found)We have detected illegal goods aboard your ship. Drop these items immediately or we will open fire!
(Warning if player does not react)This is your last warning! Drop the illegal goods immediately!
(No illegal goods found)We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thanks for your cooperation.
(80..81: Speaker is passenger aboard player's ship ==== Reminder)Hey, did you forget me, pilot? I have to get to my destination quickly!
(Wants to leave)I demand that you let me off at the next station!
(82..89: Speaker is a pirate ==== Player has good freight)Drop your freight or I will blast you to pieces!
(Player dropped container)Heh, heh, heh. That's what I like - easy credits.
(Pirate wants more)Don't play games with me! I want more or I'll show you the real meaning of firepower!
(Less loud to third ship)Hey, friend. Please help me against this maniac here!
(Less loud, neg.answer)Don't give me that friend rep. Fight for yourself, man!
(Less loud, pos.answer)Ok, I will come by to support you, friend!
(90..99: FOR Аргон PAGES ONLY: Speaker is Гонер, with very gentle voice ==== Preaching)Peace to you, my son. May wisdom guide your steps.
(Message after -possibly accidental- hits)Please do not fire. We come in peace.
(Is enemy, further attacks)We came in peace, but you deal in death!
(Requesting help)Despite our peaceful intent you still fire on us. Now we have no option but to call for fighter support.
(During fight, or if player is public enemy)I don't want to talk to you!
(Surrender after being attacked)Never! I'd rather die!
(curses)Go kiss a moss cow you rectemite!
(Hired)We have a deal. We'll follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location.
(new location confirmed)Affirmative. Moving station to requested location.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the job, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station to its new location.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Hey, you'll really look cool as a piece of nothing!
I got a missile on my tail!
I've got a target lock on me!
(Offers player mission)Pilot, can you assist us? We have a contract that needs someone with a little skill. Awaiting your response.
(Payment for job)Great work! We couldn't have asked for anything better. Your payment is being arranged.
(Job failed)Chelt-for-brains, you failed!? What a waste. Go play elsewhere.
(Thanks for help in combat)Thanks! I don't know how I would have made it without you!
(Agrees to help player)Coordinates locked down. We're on our way.
(Warning of danger, nervous)Pilot, now would be a good time to set jump coordinates...
(Enemies nearby)Chikusho! We have to leave, now! Just jump! (frantic)Incoming!!
(Пірат: police are nearby)Keep your heads down, and don't even think of ditching your cargo!
(Near collision with another ship)You're either a rookie, or your flight-stick's broken. Watch it!
(Pilot is unexpectedly near a fight)Watch it! I didn't ask to be shot at!
(No nearby danger)No visible enemy signatures. Scan complete. Looks like we're clear.
(Under heavy attack)Looks like we have a weapons-free situation out here, need some wingmen to even the odds!
(Ship almost destroyed)Life support failing, we are under attack! Escape vector blocked! Mayday!
(Tell player to bugger off)You just here for small talk, or to give me a lesson in time-wasting? And no, I don't have any noodles!
(Response to HowsItGoing from player)My cargo bay is losing pressure, I have a drunk co-pilot, and I'm all out of noodles. (Sarcasm)Things are going just fine!
(Random words of wisdom)There ain't nothing wrong with a few noodles in your soup. Live a little!
(Something impressive just happened)Now that's something you really don't see every jazura!
(Someone is in the way)You're either a rookie, or you've forgotten where the throttle is. Move it!
(Someone is too slow)What's wrong with you? Someone put soja in your fuel line? Move it!
(Someone is too fast)The heat from your thrusters is starting to make my skin peel. Cut your speed, pilot, this isn't fun from where I'm sitting.
(Pilot is lost)What the...? These coordinates aren't... erm... (embarassed)oh, crap, map's upside down.
(Request for price list)Please transmit current price status for all goods. Awaiting signal.
(Pilot is claiming something)I've already got a lock on that! Go find your own!
(Pilot begs for money)I've seen things you would never believe, but right now, I'd like to see some credits... preferably from you.
(Pilot complains about his ship)Forget about that drink, you dumb bastu, now you owe me for all this hull damage!
(Pilot sees someone else's ship)Your ship looks like it could use some repairs. I'd dock before you end up floating home.

page.title: Аргон Variation 7
page.t: Just don't even think about doing that again!
One more unprovoked attack on our ship and we will launch defence craft.
Some people just don't listen, here we go...
Hey someone get here quick, I am under attack!
Damn it, my shields are almost gone!
Try that again and you get the rep shot out of you!
You sure believe in pushing things to the edge!
I've swatted bigger spacefly than you!
Hey try again when I'm free!
I'm not a tour guide, find someone else to ask.
Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
I'm in a good mood so I'll pretend you didn't say that!
Go away and stop bothering me!
Don't shoot, I'm leaving my ship, you have just put me out of business!
Don't shoot, I'm releasing it. Any more of this and I'm out of business!
We are receiving you loud and clear. What do you require?
It is too late for you. We have nothing to talk about!
Do you really expect me to stop what I'm doing just to chat?
I have neither the time nor the inclination to speak with you just now.
Yeah, yeah. Hit those thrusters and get out of here before I think about taking action.
Hmm, too long in deep space got to you? You're already there.
Hey, I've seen you on the news vids. Glad to help. The area you search for is beyond
I am glad we could help you! Good bye.
credits for every gate we go through.
I'm sorry. We're currently transporting for another customer. Try contacting me again, after we've finished this job!
Sorry but you can't afford our services!
No problem Pilot. We'll follow you to the station and await your freight.
Can't you see that there's no space left here to drop this freight? Move somewhere else first!
It's OK to start unloading your freight now.
It was a pleasure working for you.
This is Аргон Security to pilot - you are suspected of carrying illegal goods - stop and drop this illegal freight immediately - or we fire.
Pilot - when we said drop your freight we meant NOW - otherwise we fire!
We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thank you for your cooperation.
Hey, did you forget me, pilot? I have to get to my destination this jazura!
That's it let me out at the next station, dimwad!
You know what I want, Drop it or I will blast you to pieces!
Are you taking the pizola? I want it all!
Hey, I need pirate help to fight this madman!
Ok. Hang in there - here I come!
(Гонер sentences, gentle voice)Peace to you my child, may peace be your life.
Please do not fire. We come in peace.
We came in peace, but you deal in death!
Despite our peaceful intent you still fire on us. Now we have no option but to call for fighter support.
I don't want to talk to you!
(Hired)That's a deal. Take us to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move it to there.
(new location confirmed)Yep. Moving station right now.
(Location has become invalid)We can't put it down where you want it, the location is no longer valid.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Pow p p pow pow pow!
Hello, I have a job for you.
Thank you. You saved my life.
We are in need of assistance, and running low on time. Pilot, are you available for work?
Looks like we have our contract completed. Excellent work! You shall see your compensation shortly.
You failed? How? Even an argnu couldn't be that stupid!
Chikusho, that was close! Thank you!
Request for assistance accepted. Your vector has been tracked, we're on our way.
You don't know what's out here... you shouldn't be here... (Fear)go... go now!
Place weapons on-line. Enemy units inbound. Prep for combat.
Oh this is NOT good, get your ships out of sight and prepare for evasion.
Chikusho! You fly like my mother! Not a good thing!
Chikusho! Keep firing like that and someone's going to get killed!
Scans negative, no signs of any incursions. We have an open vector.
My shields are taking some damage, hostile signatures have me locked down. Need a little help!
Defence systems offline. Hull breach imminent! Mayday! Mayday! Punching out!
I don't have time for this - and keep your scanners out of my hold! Chikusho you're an ass!
Vector mapped down, engines nominal... we're not perfect, but we'll make it.
Hello there! I was wondering when you would show up!
I'll see you another time, maybe soon.
Shields getting low? Run fast and pray hard!
Impressive, never thought that would happen here!
Chikusho! Get the hell out of my way, you loser!
You're either asleep or dead. Whichever it is, just pick up some thrust!
You know, if I didn't know better, I'd say you were gate racing. You're not, are you? Slow down!
Okay, I really need to stop buying cheap navmaps from Теладі gate vendors... Ahh, chikusho, I'm lost again!
Request price confirmation on all wares. Standing by.
Don't even think of coming anywhere near! It's mine!
I'd like to tell you I'm just lost and out of money. Truth is, I'm an ex-Гонер and out of sandals. Spare me a few?
Chikusho, if I didn't have shields I swear I'd be eating spaceflies right now.
Looks like you've seen some combat, pilot. Glad to see you've made it out alive.
(wasted)Ohhh, ain't you the preeeeettiest little thing? (pause)Munchies... can I (hic)have some noodles?

page.title: Аргон Variation 8
page.t: Who let you lose on the spacelanes?
Are you looking for trouble? I'm gonna call in a support ship!
This ship is under attack! Somebody please help!
(Swearing - Audio currently only has 'german' cursing: no text available)
Damn it! My shields are almost gone!
I'd check your sights before you get into serious trouble!
Weapons systems are online and we are looking for an excuse for target practice.
Ok Pilot. You asked for it.
I don't want to talk to you, dumbnuts!
Sorry, I'm not responsible for that.
Take a realitycheck, you must be kidding!
I'd fry in Bazani before I did that!
I'm leaving my ship, take it!
Ok, ok! Here's some of my freight!
This is the captain speaking. How can we help?
We are not interested in communicating with you!
Sorry, we are rather busy at the moment.
Do you really think our purpose is to help your type of pilot?
Did you say surrender? Quick! Call the sectorsight, this pilot is spacehappy!
Pilot, check your navigation, you are already there.
Sorry, I don't seem to know of that.
Navigation says you need to fly through
I am glad we could help you! Good bye.
credits for every gate we go through.
I'm sorry. Our cargobays are full, but we will be free after we unload!
Transporter Captain speaking. You've run out of credits. No credits - no transport. Come back when you've got the numbers!
We have a deal. We'll follow you and charge for every gate we go through!
There's no room here to drop your freight. I suggest you try moving somewhere else.
Everything's just fine - we'll start unloading here.
You're very welcome. I'm looking forward to doing business with you next time.
This is Аргон security. Bring your ship to a halt immediately. We have detected illegal goods aboard your ship, drop the contraband or we will open fire!
Pilot - Drop your contraband immediately or suffer the consequences!
We have scanned your ship and you're coming up clear. You may continue with your journey.
Pilot, I need to get to my destination quickly, hurry up.
Drop me off as soon as you can pilot.
Guess what... your freight's gonna be mine!
Hey, I need help here! You gonna get this guy off my back?
(Гонер sentences, gentle voice)Peace to you my son, may tranquillity be your path.
We come in peace. Hold your fire.
We came in peace, and you insist on destruction!
Despite our peaceful intent you still fire on us. We have no option but to call for fighter support.
I don't want to talk to you!
In the name of Аргон. I give in.
(Hired)That's a deal. Take us to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move it to there.
(new location confirmed)Yep. Moving station right now.
(Location has become invalid)We can't put it down where you want it, the location is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)It's in place and rocking it!
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Pow p p pow pow pow!
There's a target lock on me.
Hello, I have a job for you.
Hey pilot, if you're not too busy I have some work for you. (Suggestive)My comms are open for you.
Oh that's lovely. Thank you! You'll find your reward is on its way. (Warm, tender)I'm glad I found you, pilot...
Chikusho! How could you possibly fail? Useless! Just useless!
I don't know what to say... except thank you! (Warm, tender)You won't be forgotten.
Transmission received. I'm en-route. Hang in there pilot.
I don't have much time to explain, but you really need to leave. (Very urgent)NOW.
Enemy signatures in visual range. Abort flight! Abort!
Chikusho they're close! Lockdown and stow your wares. We have scanners inbound.
Hey! Too busy scanning my rack? Watch your vector!
Hey! Settle this someplace else, and leave me out of it!
We're in the clear, five by five, no threat within range or vector.
I've got a little heat on my right now. Could do with some backup!
They're coming in at all angles! Can't get a lock! Can you assist?!
You want to talk hey? (Disgusted)Drop your shields and let's really get close and personal.
Oh hi! It's always a pleasure to see you out here, pilot.
Hey, how are you? It's been a while!
May the stars light your way, pilot. Goodbye.
If you've gotta take a leak, at least put your ship on autopilot.
I don't know whether to scream at you or kiss you! Move your ship!
You know, my mom used to fly like you. She didn't get very far.
(sarcastic)Could you go any faster? No, I don't think you could!
Oh no... this isn't the sector I had locked in. Anyone? I need a sector check!
Request current data on all trade material. Ship ID has been transmitted.
I don't have much in this world, but I know what's mine! Not this time, chelt-sucker!
You know, there's a lot I would do for a few credits... try me and find out!
How the hell am I supposed to fly with only one directional thruster?!
Not sure what you've been doing, but your hull looks fried. If I were you, I'd dock.
(very drunk)Ohhh, I've done it again. (sarcasm)I hope your friends are enjoying my unique... (hic)piloting skills.

page.title: Аргон Border Patrol
page.t: Attention Pilot. Leave this sector immediately. Your current status prohibits you from entering all primary Аргон sectors. Failure to leave will result in lethal force being directed against you. You have one mizura to comply.
You have failed to comply with our order to leave all Аргон prime sectors. Attack vector authorised. Prepare to be boarded.

page.title: Boron Variation 6
page.t: You are firing at me - stop!
We are not afraid of giving fight!
Despite my warning you force me to call in a support ship!
We live for peace - someone please help me!
I'm running. Somebody please help me!
This is Boron captain - hopefully this was an accident.
Do you know how close to dying you are?
For the love of the Queen!
I do not want to talk to you!
Do not ask me such questions!
Please repeat the question - I cannot understand, we are at peace!
Do not ask such a question of me!
I will remember you - I'm leaving my ship, I wish to stay living!
I will remember you - I am dropping freight!
This captain does not want to talk with you!
A Boron captain's time is valuable!
You risk angering me. Do not offend me again!
Our Boron knowledge says that it is behind
Our Boron knowledge says that you are there.
We don't know of where you seek!
Boron captain is pleased to assist - You need to go to
The Boron are glad we could help you! Goodbye.
credits for every gate we go through.
This is the captain, We are fully occupied.
This is pointless talk - you cannot afford our services!
Captain speaking - We will follow you and charge for every gate we cross!
Captain speaking. I am very much afraid we have no space here. May I suggest we move somewhere else.
Captain speaking. Everything is fine. We will commence unloading freight now.
It has been a pleasure working for you.
Pilot - While we mean you no harm, Boron police demand you stop immediately! -We have found illegal goods aboard your ship. Drop them or we will fire!
Pilot - This is a member of the Boron Police - You are suspected of smuggling. Drop your freight immediately or we will be forced to fire!
We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thank you for your cooperation.
I am in a rush. I need to get to station quickly!
This Boron demands that you let them out at the next station!
We don't like killing - so you are advised to give up freight!
Your freight is better than your death - your surrender spares us both!
You have more freight - I know you do!
We would like to help but can't!
We don't like fight - but Пірат must stick together!
(Hired)We have a deal. We'll follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location.
(new location confirmed)Affirmative. Moving station to requested location.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the job, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station to its new location.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
I got a missile on my tail!
I've got a target lock on me!
By the Queen, the Boron gracefully request your assistance with a task of the highest order.
Our Queen thanks you. May your journey be graced by her light. Compensation for your efforts will soon be with you.
By the Queen, you are utterly useless! Our time has been wasted by your failure!
By the Queen! The Boron offer thanks for your assistance!
The Boron shall gracefully assist you, pilot.
Pilot, we gracefully ask you to journey elsewhere. The Boron sense much danger ahead.
Queen save us! Enemy ships incoming!
Our presence has been detected. Danger we must face, or hide our ships!
Grace of flight you seem to lack! Check your course!
Boron dislike this agitation! Please cease!
The Queen has shown us a clear path. Our journey will pass in safety.
Boron gracefully request assistance. Ship taking fire. Our enemies are upon us.
Menelaus save us! Our ship cannot last for much longer. Help us please!
By the Queen! Your intrusion is unwelcome!
We fare well, pilot. By the Queen, our journey shall be graced with peace.
Greetings pilot. The pleasure is ours.
Go with grace, for your journey may not always hold peace.
By the Queen! Take heart at this precious sight!
We gracefully ask you to move your ship. It hinders our path!
For the Queen! This journey grows tiresome! Raise your speed, please!
Boron fear much danger in this flight. Your speed concerns us!
The light of the Queen has deserted us. We are lost, truly lost.
Boron request latest price lists, please transmit. Menelaus awaits.
By the Queen, this is now of Boron ownership! Your claim no longer stands.
Our bodies are weak from lack of food. Assist us with credits or we will surely perish before we reach our destination!
By the Queen! We have sustained damage! Most costly will this be!
Your ship appears to be held together with spacefly droppings. Pitiful.
(hyperactive yet brain-dead, singing drunkenly)For the Queeeeen do we fly, so very highhh! (pause, change of tone as if distracted)Mmmmn, bofu!

page.title: Boron Variation 7
page.t: You have pushed my patience too far, help is on its way!
Now a Boron will show you how to fight!
Praise Queen Atreus - Boron transporter needs help!
For the love of the Queen!
No more please. I want peace!
No freight is worth the loss of life!
This Boron captain hopes you did not mean to do that!
I demand you stop firing instantly.
I apologise, but I am now forced to blow you to space debris!
I have the pleasure of asking how we can help?
I'm sorry but I do not have time to help you find the way.
The information you ask is Kingdom classified!
I'm sorry, this Boron is not responsible for that.
Please could you repeat - I cannot understand, we are at peace!
I will does not yield my freight that easily! This is illegal!
The Boron do not want violence - I am leaving my ship!
Please stop this violence - I am dropping my freight!
This Boron Captain is willing to listen to your incoming communication. What do you require?
I'm sorry I'm not going to give you that!
This Boron is busy at the moment.
You are enemy of the Boron and the captain does not communicate with such!
The Boron do not appreciate your actions. Now go before we take offence!
I am most sorry, but you are already there.
I'm sorry I can't help you with that, please accept my apologies.
The Boron race welcomes contact with such as you - The area you seek is behind…
The Boron are very glad to be of help! Good bye.
…credits for every gate we go through.
This is the captain, we are fully occupied.
This is not talk of worth - you cannot afford our services!
Captain speaking - we happily accept and will follow you, though we must charge for each gate we cross.
Captain speaking. I am very much afraid we have no space here. May I suggest we move somewhere else.
Captain speaking. Everything is fine. We will commence unloading the freight now.
It has been a pleasure working for you.
Boron Kingdom Police to pilot - we suspect you are carrying illegal goods - stop and drop your illegal freight or we will fire!
Pilot - when the Boron Police say drop illegal freight we meant NOW!
We scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. Thank you for your cooperation.
I am in rush, please get me to the station at your fastest convenience!
Please let me out at the next station, my patience is exhausted!
We do not like killing - so you are advised to give up your freight!
It is better to give than to die!
You have more freight - I can detect it!
We would like to help but can't!
(Hired)We gratefully conclude deal. We will follow you to the station you wish moved.
(Not enough space for station)My apologies but we cannot move the station to there.
(new location confirmed)Certainly. We are moving the station to requested location.
(Location has become invalid)Apologies, we cannot complete our task, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station to its new location.
(Negative/can't execute command)I'm sorry can't do that.
(Negative/can't execute command)This is an impossibility, sir.
(Returning home)I am returning to home base.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
(Under attack)I am the victim of aggression!
Oh, dear, the reactor is about to blow!
There is a missile targeting me!
Hello, I have a job for you.
Thank you. You saved my life.
Pilot, we would be eternally grateful for your help. We have work in need of completion.
Your payment is being transferred now. The Boron thank you for your assistance.
You do us great injustice by failing to abide by our agreement. Failure was not an option.
We thank you for all you have done. You will always be welcome in the Boron kingdom.
We shall help you. By the Queen's light we are on our way.
There is much we can offer you pilot, but by the Queen, safety is not one of them.
Our enemies approach! We must take our leave now!
May the Queen blind those who seek to scan our ship. Sector patrols are near.
For the Queen, do us no harm!
By the Queen, please maintain peace!
By the light of Menelaus, we travel in peace and protection.
By the Queen, we have unfriendly ships in our domain, kindly assist us at your convenience.
We are under attack! The Queen has forsaken us! Save us! (half-mad with fear)Save us!!
The Boron request you withdraw communications. We must have quiet!
I am very well, thank you. May the Boron be blessed by your presence.
Welcome, in the name of the Queen!
The light of the Queen shall shine in all the dark places you must travel.
Pay heed pilot! Ahead lies a truly wondrous sight.
May your ship change course soon. We grow tired of seeing your engines.
Could you please go a little faster? My tentacles are drying up.
For the Queen! We do not wish to reach the afterlife so soon! Slow your ship!
This sector does not offer us the route we desired. Perhaps we shall turn back.
We gracefully request your trade material status.
For the grace of Menelaus, allow us our rights. This belongs to the Boron!
By the Queen, we have great need for assistance. Your credits would help us greatly.
The Boron have lost grace. Our damage is unworthy of the Queen's light.
By the Queen! If you were not to have shields active, you would indeed be taken by the afterlife.
(slow, slurred, and stoned)I cannot feel my tentacles... (squeal)Menelaus save me, my waters have broken!

page.title: Boron Border Patrol
page.t: The Boron gracefully request you leave this sector immediately. Your are prohibited from entering all primary Boron sectors due to your poor status. Failure to do so will result in force being directed against you. You have one mizura to comply with our wishes.
You have failed to comply with our order for you to leave all Boron Prime sectors. Intercept vector authorised. With regret we will now neutralise your ship.

page.title: Спліт Variation 6
page.t: Спліт hope that was accident! You shoot again you eat own liver!
Спліт say, if you look for fight - you get one!
Спліт Ship. Join battle. Being shot - bring ships to fight!
Спліт now show you how battle fought!
Shields going. Death in battle is my fate!
Peace wasn't my idea, try that again!
Next Спліт warning come with warhead!
Now Спліт get to blow you out of space!
Are you wanting something from the Спліт?
Спліт never talk to likes of you!
Спліт say you must be mistaken?
Спліт does not beg for life but offers ship! My death is for another day!
Спліт gives you freight! Another day I will take yours!
This is Captain of Спліт. What you want?
Спліт want no talk with you!
Come back when Спліт finished with enemy!
It is too late for talk with Спліт!
That is insult. The Спліт never surrender never forget!
Спліт say you are already there!
The Спліт offer help to such as you. Fly behind…
We have helped. Спліт Captain Out.
credits every gate we travel. Take it, leave it.
We already have full cargo, go away!
You cannot afford our services, speerak! We leave you. Maybe talk again if and when you can pay!
The Спліт will follow - but we charge for every gate!
Speerak - there's no space to drop freight. Move another place.
We have now finished working. Captain out.
Rhonkar Family Police demand you stop immediately! Illegal goods on ship. Drop or we destroy!
Pilot - Rhonkar Family Police demand you drop Illegal freight or we blow you into pieces!
Спліт scanned ship and find no illegal goods.
Pilot forget Спліт! Pilot find they lose head. Get to destination quickly.
Спліт make demand, drop at next station!
Спліт pirate unbeatable - give up freight!
Спліт pirate not fooled - you give all freight!
Спліт offer help to no one!
(Hired)Deal struck. We will follow to the station.
(Not enough space for station)It can't move there.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot do this, the location you specified is no longer valid.
(Successfully moved)We have finished moving the station.
(Negative/can't execute command)There is no glory in that.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
There are many, it is a worthy fight.
Hello, I have a job for you.
You have my thanks. You saved my life.
Спліт need pilot for work! You have skill! Request you contact us!
Спліт offer thanks! Pay is here! We go now!
Спліт not happy! You fail! You bring shame on us!
Pilot save Спліт! Thanks we offer, and shame we hold! We go away!
Спліт shall aid pilot! Maintain position! Maintain survival!
Pilot! Bring weapons on-line! Much danger lurks. No time for heroes, you go!
Спліт see enemy nearby! Weapons ready! Спліт ready! We fight!
Спліт not want to risk goods! Keep cargo locked down! All ships evade!
Спліт have no battle here! Stop shooting!
Спліт scans negative. No enemy detected! We go freely!
Спліт request assistance, under fire! You assist us!
Спліт life in danger! No fight worth the loss of a Спліт life! You help Спліт! NOW!
Спліт not want you near! No talk! No scan! You go away!
Спліт not about to show status! You go away!
You leave now! Спліт resume business!
Спліт say weapons more important than shields. Shoot first. Ask questions later!
You look! Look now! Great things arise in this sector!
You in Спліт way! You move now!
Спліт have little time for snails! Snails for majaglit! Not for pilots!
Спліт not about to race! You slow down!
Спліт not know where ship is! I bring shame upon my family! Lost I am!
Спліт need prices! You transmit now! Спліт waiting!
Спліт not want to share! You not take! (screaming)You go AWAY!
Спліт not above you! Need credits! Hunger greater than shame!
Спліт in shame! Ship not worthy of combat! Not worthy of pilot!
Спліт see the ship of true fighter. Honoured we are to see such damage.
(slightly guilty, but mostly just wasted)Shame... much shame! And much spacefuel! Spaceweed! (delighted, drunken screech)Waheeey!!

page.title: Спліт Variation 7
page.t: Спліт hope that was accident! You shoot again you feel great fire, Сплітський Вогонь!
You have no shame! You die!
Спліт say, last battle upon you! You not live long!
Спліт Ship. Assist now! Under fire - bring ships to battle!
Спліт show you true fear, battle fought not over till your death!
Спліт feel your fear! You will die!
Shame is upon me! Shields no more! Death I see before me!
Peace not much fun, you try again foolish one!
Спліт not warn again, you soon no more than space debris!
Now Спліт get to blast you back to your mother!
You want something from Спліт? Show yourself!
Спліт not talk to one such as you! (screams, then says)You go away!
Спліт not in mood for smalltalk!
Спліт have no care for your problems. Cry elsewhere!
Спліт rather die before bring shame upon family!
Спліт say you smoke too much spaceweed?
I bring shame upon my line! Offer you ship! Death with honour another time!
Спліт give you cargo! Remember me, soon I will take yours!
This is Captain of Спліт. Why you bother us?
Спліт not about to talk with one such as you!
Спліт busy killing enemy. You come back later!
Time for talk long gone! No talk with Спліт now!
You insult family! Спліт remember you! Revenge is ours!
Спліт say you drink too much spacefuel, you are already there!
Спліт not know that sector! Look elsewhere pilot!
The Спліт give help to the shameless one. Fly behind...
We have assisted. Спліт Captain Out.
credits every gate we travel. Take it, leave it. Choice is yours!
We already have full cargo, go away! No time for you now!
You cannot afford our services, speerak! We leave you. Maybe talk again when you learn to count!
The Спліт will follow - but we collect credits for every gate we pass through!
Speerak - we see no space to drop freight. We move another place.
Rhonkar Family Police say you stop immediately! Illegal goods onboard! Empty bays or we attack!
Pilot - Rhonkar Family Police demand you drop Illegal freight or we spread your ashes across sector!
Спліт scan ship. We find no illegal goods. You go now!
Pilot forget Спліт! Pilot find they lose head. Waste too much time, fly faster!
Спліт demand you stop at next station! Спліт get off find better pilot!
Спліт pirate invincible - you not have chance! Give up cargo now!
Спліт pirate take freight! Pitiful fight do you give!
Спліт pirate not stupid - you give all freight or we burn you in ship!
Пірат - join battle now! Fight with honour!
Спліт not about to assist! No help to you!
Спліт will help only for honour and own need!
Until next battle, we salute you!
Спліт make deal. We follow to station.
It not move there. You think again stupid!
Спліт unable to do this, location specified no longer valid. Rethink! We wait!
There is no glory in that.
Hold on, help is under way.
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
There are many, it is a worthy fight.
Raaka, I have a job for you!
You have my thanks. You saved my life.
Спліт want pilot. Much work ahead! You have skill! Request you contact us!
Спліт offer thanks! Pay is here! We go now!
Спліт not happy! You fail! You bring shame on us!
Pilot save Спліт! Thanks we offer, and shame we hold! We go away!
Спліт shall aid pilot! Maintain position! Maintain survival!
Pilot! Bring weapons on-line! Much danger lurks. No time for heroes, you go!
Спліт see enemy nearby! Weapons ready! Спліт ready! We fight!
Спліт not want to risk goods! Keep cargo locked down! All ships evade!
Ship too close! You move AWAY!
Спліт have no battle here! Stop shooting!
Спліт scans negative. No enemy detected! We go freely!
Спліт request assistance, under fire! You assist us!
Спліт life in danger! No fight worth the loss of a Спліт life! You help Спліт! NOW!
Спліт not want you near! No talk! No scan! You go away!
Спліт not about to show status! You go away!
You leave now! Спліт resume business!
Спліт say weapons more important than shields. Shoot first. Ask questions later!
You look! Look now! Great things arise in this sector!
You in Спліт way! You move now!
Спліт have little time for snails! Snails for majaglit! Not for pilots!
Спліт not about to race! You slow down!
Спліт not know where ship is! I bring shame upon my family! Lost I am!
Спліт need prices! You transmit now! Спліт waiting!
Спліт not want to share! You not take! You go AWAY!
Спліт not above you! Need credits! Hunger greater than shame!
Спліт in shame! Ship not worthy of combat! Not worthy of pilot!
Спліт see the ship of true fighter. Honoured we are to see such damage.
Shame... much shame! And much spacefuel! Spaceweed! Waheeey!!

page.title: Спліт Border Patrol
page.t: Спліт to Pilot! You leave sector immediately! Not allowed to be here! You not have rank high enough to enter all primary Спліт sectors. Failure to leave mean we use force against you! You have one mizura to comply.
You not comply with order to leave all Спліт Prime sectors. We set intercept vector for your ship! We attack now!

page.title: Паранід Variation 6
page.t: You give offence to the Паранід empire unclean one!
You will feel the wrath of the Паранід Empire!
For the honour of the Priest Emperor!
Support call! Паранід seeks vengeance against lowerlife aggressor!
See an end to your miserable life!
Do not trouble the Паранід empire.
The Priest Emperor Xaar's gunners have you in sights. We will be happy to purge ourselves of another unclean one!
Learn the error of your ways!
You want something from me? Are you empty of the mind?
I have no time for you lowlife!
Паранід's have better things to do than help pilots like you!
That is not the business of my magnificent self.
There is no honour in surrender!
My ears are deaf as you are blind to the power of the three!
Take my ship and know I despise you!
Take this freight! May it choke your life.
The Паранід Empire graciously answers your communication. What do you beg for?
Your capacity for stupidity is beyond measure!
The commander is busy - he advises you seek sterilization to help the galactic genepool!
Clear Паранід communication channels of your unpure voice!
Surrender? To someone of two dimensions?!
Your race is as empty as space. You are already here.
The Паранід empire will not trouble to answer that.
Паранід assistance is charity to lowerlife. Take leave from us.
Credits soothe the loss of honour in dealing with you.
payment is demanded for every gate we go through.
Паранід cargo bays are full we have no space for your custom, you seek our grace another time!
That is not enough to satisfy our honour!
Contract accepted. We will follow you to your destination! Every minute in your presence demeans our honour.
There is no space here, lowerlife. Try elsewhere.
We unload freight here and now.
Паранід honour is soothed by Credits. Praise Xaar.
This is a Police Enforcer of the Priest Emperor! We believe you carry illegal goods in Паранід Space. Drop them now or suffer the Emperor's wrath!
Drop your freight immediately or feel the power of the Empire!
No illegal goods detected. Паранід security suggests you leave.
My time is worth more than your useless genes. Take me to my destination!
Let me out at the next station, lowerlife!
Give us the freight and live lowerlife!
This freight pays for the fact you have dishonoured my space!
Give me all the freight now!
We won't help you - fight better! !
We won't help - kill the Pirate yourself!
(greeting)I give you gracious leave to share my space.
(bye)Take leave and feel honoured by my presence
(excuse)If I were a low life you would receive an apology.
(Hired)You have engaged our services over our honour. We will follow you to the station you want moved.
(Not enough space for station)We can't move the station to that location, lowerlife, engage your pitiful brain, unholy one.
(new location confirmed)Moving station to requested site. You are fortunate for our patience.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the duty, the location you specified is no longer valid. You have much to learn of the third dimension
(Successfully moved)We have moved the station and are sanitizing our connection cables.

(Player near Gate to closed sector)Паранід Central sectors are closed to all lower life forms by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Cease your approach, or see the end of your pitiful life.

(Player near Gate to clsoed sector)Паранід central sectors are closed by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Any attempt to enter will meet with lethal force and the ending of your pathetic life.
(Player entered closed sector)Central sectors are closed to inferior lifebeings. You have thirty sezuras to leave.
(Player entered closed sector)This is Паранід Border Control. Central sectors are closed to lower life forms. Depart alive by choice, or stay to die.
(Final warning)This is your final warning, continue your approach and see destruction.
(Attack)The great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia has decreed the destruction of any ship attempting to enter. Weapon systems are online. You are being targeted.
My ship is damaged, repairs required
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility
Hey, you'll really look cool as a bit of space debris!
I got a missile on my tail
I've got a target lock on me
The Priest Duke deigns to tolerate your assistance. Would the unholy one work for us?
The unholy one's work has been most impressive. A bounty in recognition of this shall be passed into your ownership.
Our faith in you was misplaced. Your failure was most unfortunate, unholy one.
Honour and strength have you shown. Our thanks we offer to you!
The Паранід have heeded the call of the unwashed. Patience little one, salvation is coming!
The holy light of the Priest Emperor Xaar will not protect your unholy form here.
Safety is not something you will find here. Be on your guard!
The unholy sector patrols are upon us. May their light not shine upon our cargo.
We fear collision. Do not defile our ship, pilot!
Your aggression brings danger to the affairs of Xaar. Stop immediately.
The Priest Xaar sends his compliments. We see the light once more, our path is clear.
The Паранід request the assistance of nearby ships. Our holy vessel comes under fire from the unclean.
I feel as if death is upon me. Priest Xaar forgive my sins. Assistance is urgently required... (solemn)but perhaps futile.
The unholy one would be wise to leave us in peace! Foolish are you for intruding upon us!
I do not care to speak of my status to the unholy one. My ship is sacrosanct.
The Паранід greet you with holy light.
The Паранід give thanks. Redemption is yours.
Choose your enemies with care, unholy one. Your world is finite.
The Priest Xaar commands your attention, unholy one. Behold!
Your course defiles the path of the Паранід. Move!
I feel as if I may die of old age before I reach my destination.
The unholy one clearly chooses to fly like a blinded heretic. I ask that you cease this madness.
Our course has brought us to places we do not recognise. Our concern grows.
The Priest Xaar sends word of trading pricing requirements. Please transmit your data to us.
Bounty is mine! The unholy one has chosen unwisely.
Honour and strength have deserted us. All I require are credits. Nothing else matters.
Core temperature is critical. If our ship is consumed, then by the light, I shall see you in hell!
It looks as if war you have seen. The Priest Xaar sends you his compliments.
(drunken, slurred)Shomethingsssh... are bedder left unsaid. (hic, struggling to sound serious and honest)No, matriarch, by the holy light I am quite... quite... sooober.

page.title: Паранід Variation 7
page.t: I recommend you stop shooting now, faithless one!
I give lowerlife one final warning then I extinguish you!
The empire will aid me, support contacted!
For the honour of Priest Emperor!
There will be no second chance!
Get here with rapidity aid bringers- shields are almost gone!
For the sake of Priest Emperor Xaar you try my patience lowerbeing!
It would bring my family pleasure to see your end, know this deficient one.
I have other things on my superior mind!
Such trivial matters are not my concern!
That is of no interest to me.
I would rather force feed myself to a rani!
My ears are deaf to you!
On this occasion you have bettered me, the ship is yours!
Паранід freight is being released, this action has been noted!
Your request has reached the Паранід Captain. How may we assist you?
Enemies of Паранід are not allowed to communicate!
Паранід captain is fully occupied. Take your offensive self off our communication channel immediately!
You dare to ask information? Do be careful not to offend Паранід!
Our Priest map puts it near to…
You confirm our view of your race, you are already there….
As our Priest map does not contain this information it can be of no relevance.
Word of your fame reaches the ears of Priest Emperor himself. We are instructed to help you, seek behind…
Паранід found you worthy of aid. You may now depart.
We will lower ourselves to aid you. Our service costs
Credits for every gate go through.
We are already transporting another customer's freight. Contact us once our job is finished!
You challenge our honour? You cannot afford our fee!
We accept and will follow you charging for every gate we cross.
There is no space here, lowerlife, we suggest you try somewhere else.
We are unloading your freight here and now before disinfecting our holds.
Your credits serve the emperor. Praise Xaar!
This is a Police Enforcer of the Priest Emperor - Stop immediately! - We believe you carry illegal goods, lowerlife. Drop them now or we will fire!
Pilot - Drop your freight immediately or suffer the consequences of our Police action!
We have scanned your ship and did not find any illegal goods aboard. The Паранід Empire gives you leave depart.
I do not wish to spend my entire life on this ship lowerlife, get to the destination quickly!
Let me off at the next station, unclean one!
Pirate ship damaged - I need help!
We cannot give help - we are too busy ourselves!
(greeting)I give you gracious leave to share my space.
(bye)Take leave and feel honoured by my presence.
(excuse)If I were a low life you would receive an apology.
(Hired)You have engaged our services over our honour. We will follow you to the station you wished moved.
(Not enough space for station)We cannot move the station to that location, lowerlife, engage your pitiful brain, unholy one.
(new location confirmed)Moving station to requested site. You are fortunate for our patience.
(Location has become invalid)We cannot complete the duty, the location you specified is no longer valid. You have much to learn of the third dimension.
(Successfully moved)We have relocated the station and are sanitizing our connection cables.

(Player near Gate to closed sector) Паранід Central sectors are closed to all lower life forms by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Cease your approach, or see the end of your pitiful life.

(Player near Gate to closed sector)Паранід central sectors are closed by order of the great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia. Any attempt to enter will meet with lethal force and the ending of your pathetic life.
(Player entered closed sector)Central sectors are closed to inferior lifebeings. You have thirty sezuras to leave.
(Player entered closed sector)This is Паранід Border Control. Central sectors are closed to lower life forms. Depart alive by choice, or stay to die.
(Final warning)This is your final warning, continue your approach and see destruction.
(Attack)The great Pontifex Maximus Paranidia has decreed the destruction of any ship attempting to enter. Weapon systems are online. You are being targeted.
(Negative/can't execute command)That is not possible, sir
(assistance)Stay where you are, help is on the way!
My ship is damaged, repairs required.
My ship is damaged, heading for closest repair facility.
I have an ememy in pursuit.
Suffer the wrath of the Паранід!
I bring your destruction with pleasure!
There's a missile got a lock on my ship!
Greetings, I have employement for you, lowerlife!
Are you willing to accept my gracious offer?
The job was well done, lowerbeing.
I am in need of assistance.
Unwashed and of little worth, yet worthy of our work you are. Make contact.
Our thanks, unholy one. A job truly well done; may salvation and honour shine upon you. Your reward awaits you.
Failure, ah yes, the Паранід are hardly surprised at your inability to perform.
Much have you done to aid us. The unholy one shall be praised. May the Priest Duke's light shine upon you.
Your distress is clear, unholy one. We shall assist you.
I do not feel as if luck you have, perhaps it is time to reconsider your journey.
I fear great loss may come upon us. Strength and honour in the battle ahead.
The sacred cargo of our ships is in peril. Fade away brethren. Patrol ships are near.
Your skills in piloting are weak, unholy one. Maintain your distance!
Silence weapons! Do not profane holy vessel!
The unholy choose not to disturb us. No threat appears to come our way.
The Priest Xaar requests assistance. Our sacred ship has fallen under attack.
I fear the end is upon me. Redeem yourselves, assist the Паранід in their time of great need!
The Priest Emperor Xaar sends you his displeasure at this intrusion. Be gone!
By the Priest's light we journey with strength and honour.
May you be cleansed by our contact. Welcome.
Until we meet again, may Xaar guide you.
Our light shines upon you, pilot. Thank you.
Strength, honour, courage - these you cannot buy, or sell, or win.
Pilot, take heed of the events around you! Wondrous they are!
Much you have to learn of navigation. You would be wise to adjust your course!
There are many qualities your unholy ship possesses. Speed apparently is not one of them.
Your ship chooses to fly at speeds I have no wish to experience. Slow down, unholy one.
We are truly with the unwashed in this place! Lost and without honour are the Паранід.
By the light of Priest Xaar, send your trade entity data. The Паранід await.
If your life do you value, you will honour us by leaving. This is ours!
Credits would indeed aid us in our journey. We ask of you little else.
There is much wrong with this ship. Very little right. There is no honour in flying such junk.
The holy light has indeed shone in your favour. You are alive and, though damaged, still worthy of our attention.
(half-drunken, guilty)I feel unholy, unwashed... Perhaps it was not wise to partake of the Аргон elixir they call spacefuel.

page.title: Паранід Variation 8
page.t: You give offence to the Паранід empire unclean one!
You will feel the wrath of the Паранід Empire!
For the honour of the Priest Emperor!
Support call! Паранід seeks vengeance against lowerlife aggressor!
See an end to your miserable life!
Do not trouble the Паранід empire.
The Priest Emperor Xaar's gunners have you in sights. We will be happy to purge ourselves of another unclean one
